Key.Original: Omega
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"

Key.Original: Crossroads
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"

Key.Original: Sigma
Key.Chinese: "西格瑪"
Key.Chinesesimp: "西格玛"

Key.Original: Gamma
Key.Chinese: "伽馬"
Key.Chinesesimp: "伽马"

Key.Original: Slingshot
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"

Key.Original: Spotter
Key.Chinese: 偵察兵
Key.Chinesesimp: 观察手

Key.Original: Ice
Sniper
Key.Chinese: "狙擊手"
Key.Chinesesimp: "狙击手"

Key.Original: Kappa
Key.Chinese: "卡帕"
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡帕"

Key.Original: Ice-1
Ice-2

Cut off from the outside world, the surviving NATO forces make their way to the Altis mainland seeking the assistance of local guerrilla forces.

Complete the previous episode to unlock the next.
Key.Chinese:
與外界失去聯繫，北約部隊的倖存者們想辦法抵達了阿爾蒂斯主島並尋求當地反抗軍的幫助。

要遊玩本章節，請先完成前一章節。
Key.Chinesesimp:
与外界失去联系的北约部队幸存者们想办法抵达了阿尔蒂斯主岛并寻求当地反抗军的帮助。

要游玩本章节，请先完成前一章节。

Key.Original: Adapt
Key.Chinese: 適應
Key.Chinesesimp: 适应

Container.name: B_Warn_No_Leader
Container.situation: stavrou warns player about leaving the ao

Key.Original: American, you are heading into a minefield. I recommend that you return to the mission area.
Key.Chinese: 美國佬，你正走進一處地雷區。我建議你最好趕快返回任務區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 美国佬，你正走进一处地雷区。我建议你最好赶快返回任务区域。

Key.Original: Corporal Kerry, you are approaching a minefield. I suggest that you return to your AO, over.
Key.Chinese: 下士克里，你正在靠近一處地雷區。我建議你趕快返回行動區域，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里下士，你正在靠近一处地雷区。我建议你赶快返回行动区域，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Kerry, this is Slingshot. You are heading into a minefield. I suggest that you turn around. Over.
Key.Chinese: 克里，這裡是"彈弓"。你正走進一處地雷區。我建議你趕快走回頭路。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，这里是"弹弓"。你正走进一处地雷区。我建议你赶快走回头路。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Choose your equipment and link up with the rest of your team at the assembly point.
Key.Chinese: 選擇你的裝備，並跟你剩下的隊友在集合點碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择你的装备，并跟你剩下的队友在集合点碰面。

Container.name: 082_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Well, you know as much as I do.
Key.Chinese: 這個，你知道的跟我知道的差不多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个，你知道的跟我知道的差不多。

Key.Original: That I do.
Key.Chinese: 是的，我是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，我是。

Key.Original: But it's more than these poor bastards.
Key.Chinese: 但總比那些可憐蟲還多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但总比那些可怜虫还多了。

Key.Original: Hah. You know that's not a lot, mate.
Key.Chinese: 哈。你知道的並不是很多，伙計。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈。你知道的并不是很多，伙计。

Container.name: 081_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Miller can't let it go, either. The man's possessed by it.
Key.Chinese: 米勒就是不能放開手。他緊緊握住了它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒就是不肯放过。他简直是对它着了迷。

Key.Original: And, between you and me... Ah, forget it.
Key.Chinese: 還有，你跟我之間...呵，忘了它吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，你跟我之间...呵，忘了它吧。

Key.Original: No, it's nothing. Forget it.
Key.Chinese: 沒，當我沒說。忘了它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没，当我没说。忘了它。

Key.Original: I'd noticed.
Key.Chinese: 我有發現到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我有发现到。

Key.Original: What?
Key.Chinese: 什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么？

Container.name: 080_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: We know it likely to be east of the main airport.
Key.Chinese: 我們知道它可能位在主要機場的東方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们知道它可能位在主要机场的东面。

Key.Original: No kidding, but we do know that CSAT operates its own airfield in the south.
Key.Chinese: 不開玩笑了，但我們確實知道廣協同盟正在南方運作他們的機場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不开玩笑了，但我们确实知道广协正在南方运作他们的机场。

Key.Original: And we don't have eyes on that. Not yet. We've tried.
Key.Chinese: 而且我們並沒有監視他們。是還沒有。我們已經嘗試過了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且我们并没有监视他们。是还没有。我们已经尝试过了。

Key.Original: Yeah. It's the only place that makes sense. The north west is a fortress.
Key.Chinese: 是阿。這才說得通。它的西北方是一片要塞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。这是唯一说得通的地方。它的西北面是一处要塞。

Container.name: 079_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Aye, Red Pegasus.
Key.Chinese: 是呀，紅色飛馬。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是呀，红色飞马。

Key.Original: Oh, before spring, for sure.
Key.Chinese: 喔，一定是在春天之前。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，一定是在春天之前。

Key.Original: Yeah. They don't take that long to construct.
Key.Chinese: 是呀。那些東西是不用建造那麼久的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是呀。建造那些东西是花不了那么久的。

Key.Original: I thought so. When did the construction start?
Key.Chinese: 我是這麼認為。話說工程啥時開始的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是这么认为。话说工程是什么时候开始的？

Key.Original: Oh, really?
Key.Chinese: 喔，真的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，真的吗？

Key.Original: No - I just - I thought it was longer in general.
Key.Chinese: 不-我只是-我只是認為通常會花比較長一點的時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不—我只是—我只是认为那东西比正常情况花的时间要长。

Container.name: 078_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Aye, but you gotta remember, that's why they were here in the first place.
Key.Chinese: 是呀，不過你要記住，這就是為什麼他們會先來到這裡的原因。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是呀，不过你要记住，这也是他们来这儿的首要目的。

Key.Original: Well, yes, but, c'mon, their actual intention was clear to anyone with half a brain.
Key.Chinese: 這個，它的確是，但是他們的意圖，任何人只要花半個腦子想也會知道的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个的确，但拜托，连弱智都明白他们的真实意图。

Key.Original: I mean, you don't need that many people to train a small army.
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是，你並不需要這麼多人來訓練一支小軍隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说，训练一支小军队不需要这么多人。

Key.Original: Wasn't it 'training', officially?
Key.Chinese: 難道'訓練'不是其目的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 对外说法不是"训练"吗？

Key.Original: Not even one as shite as the Greenbacks.
Key.Chinese: 本來他們就沒有想過好好訓練綠軍了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 本来他们就没有想过好好训练绿军。

Container.name: 077_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: We don't know yet.
Key.Chinese: 我們還不知道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们还不知道。

Key.Original: Jimbo's got an idea but, well, you know Jimbo.
Key.Chinese: 吉姆博有一個想法，但，你也知道吉姆博是怎樣的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 吉姆博有个想法，但你也知道吉姆博那人啥样。

Key.Original: Heh. Actually, I don't think I do.
Key.Chinese: 嘿。實際上，我不認為我真的知道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。实际上，我不认为我真的知道。

Container.name: 076_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: CSAT are still bringing in reinforcements. More each day now.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟仍然再把援軍調過來中。每一天都在增加。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协仍然在不断调来援军。每一天都在增加。

Key.Original: At least, mate.
Key.Chinese: 至少，伙計。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至少，伙计。

Key.Original: It was a lot simpler when you could count the number of their officers on your hands.
Key.Chinese: 這在你還能用雙手算出他們的軍官前都還算是簡單了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你用两只手数数他们军官的数量的话就简单多了。

Key.Original: Shit. They must be three times the force we first encountered.
Key.Chinese: 該死。他們比我們第一次遇到時還多出了三倍的兵力吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。他们比我们第一次遇到时还多出了三倍的兵力吧。

Key.Original: Aye, that's what I'm worried about.
Key.Chinese: 嗐，這正是我所擔心的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 唉，这正是我所担心的。

Key.Original: Well, one things for sure, it can't carry on like this indefinitely.
Key.Chinese: 至少，有一件事是能確認的，就是這情況不能再這麼下去了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至少，有一件事是能确认的，就是不能再这样下去了。

Container.name: 075_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Did you get the briefing?
Key.Chinese: 你有聽到簡報嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有听到简报吗？

Key.Original: Good. Just pay attention to the execution. A lot of moving parts, you know?
Key.Chinese: 很好。專心做好自己的任務。此次任務有很多的環節，你知道嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。专心做好自己的任务。此次任务有很多的环节，你知道吗？

Key.Original: Well, CSAT's got it locked down tight. It's the only way.
Key.Chinese: 這麼說吧，廣協同盟已經逐漸在縮小包圍網了。而這是唯一的辦法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这么说吧，广协已经逐渐在缩小包围网了。而这是唯一的办法。

Key.Original: Uh, yeah. Jimbo talked to us this morning, why?
Key.Chinese: 恩，有的。吉姆博說是這個早上，為什麼要問?
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，有的。吉姆博早上跟我们说了，为什么要问？

Key.Original: No kidding.
Key.Chinese: 沒開玩笑吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没开玩笑吧。

Key.Original: I mean, those areas are off limits even to the Greenbacks these days.
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是，那些區域在近日就連綠軍都被限制進出。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是，那些区域近日来就连绿军都被限制进出。

Key.Original: No argument here. I get it.
Key.Chinese: 看來是沒有討論的空間了。我知道了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不争论。我知道了。

Container.name: 074_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: But, c'mon, the food is shit.
Key.Chinese: 但是，拜託，這食物跟狗屎沒兩樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是，拜托，这食物跟狗屎没两样。

Key.Original: Aye, like a fucking fungus, maybe.
Key.Chinese: 嗐，大概就像是真菌一樣吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗐，大概就像是真菌一样吧。

Key.Original: I don't know that about, mate. It's, er - you know - it's grown on me.
Key.Chinese: 我並不知道，伙計。這，呃-你知道的-我們也就只有這些了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我并不知道，伙计。这，呃—你知道的—我们也就只有这些了。

Container.name: 073_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: What do you mean?
Key.Chinese: 你的意思是?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的意思是？

Key.Original: Heh. Yeah, I know. Uh, it's 3 months. 3 months yesterday, actually.
Key.Chinese: 哈。是的，我了你的意思了。呵，已經過了三個月了吧。到昨天剛好滿三個月。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈。是的，我了你的意思了。呵，已经过了三个月了吧。到昨天刚好满三个月。

Key.Original: How long's it been now?
Key.Chinese: 到底過多久了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 到底过多久了？

Key.Original: Yeah, but the situation changed, didn't it.
Key.Chinese: 是呀，但情況已經改變了，不是嗎。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是呀，但情况已经改变了，不是吗。

Key.Original: I mean - I think lost track of how long we've been out here, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是-我已經逐漸忘記了我們到底在這待多久了，你知道嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是—我已经逐渐忘记了我们到底在这待多久了，你知道吗？

Key.Original: You just have to adapt to that.
Key.Chinese: 你只需要去適應這些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你得去适应这些。

Key.Original: Christ. And to think, it was supposed to be done by the summer.
Key.Chinese: 天啊。我本來認為，這將在夏天時就完結了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊。我本来认为这将在夏天时就该结束了。

Container.name: 072_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: That's because he wasn't. The intended target was different.
Key.Chinese: 那是因為他本來就沒有。因為預期的目標本來就是別的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是因为他本来就没有。因为预期的目标本来就是别的。

Key.Original: Yeah. Different.
Key.Chinese: 是的。不一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。不一样。

Key.Original: Stavrou didn't sound too impressed, though.
Key.Chinese: 儘管斯塔夫魯看起來並沒有預期中那麼的感動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管斯塔夫鲁看起来并没有预期中那么的感动。

Key.Original: Different?
Key.Chinese: 不一樣嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 不一样吗？

Key.Original: Oh, right. Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 喔，好吧。我瞭了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，好吧。我懂了。

Container.name: 071_B_HUB_Ambient_Talk
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: No, we were operating east of Oreakastro.
Key.Chinese: 沒，我們是在奧雷奧卡斯特羅的東方進行任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没，我们当时是在奥雷奥卡斯特罗以东执行任务。

Key.Original: It was a no-go. Other priorities.
Key.Chinese: 別再問了。我們討論點別的事情吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别再问了。我们讨论点别的事情吧。

Key.Original: Oh. But, I thought Miller moved you up north?
Key.Chinese: 喔。但是，我以為米勒是讓你們往北方移動?
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔。但是，我以为米勒是让你们往北方移动？

Container.name: 319_POI_Weapon_Smugglers_02_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Alright, that looks like the last of them.
Key.Chinese: 好的，看起來剛剛那個是他們最後的人了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，看起来刚刚那个是他们最后的人了。

Container.name: 318_POI_Weapon_Smugglers_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Okay. Should be clear now.
Key.Chinese: 好。現在應該安全了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。现在应该安全了。

Container.name: 317_POI_UAV_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: This should help keep us a little safer.
Key.Chinese: 這應該能使我們安全些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这应该能使我们安全些。

Container.name: 316_POI_Special_Forces_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Shit. Those guys weren't fucking around.
Key.Chinese: 該死。那些傢伙並不在這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。那些家伙并不在这里。

Container.name: 315_POI_Sniper_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: It's done.
Key.Chinese: 搞定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞定。

Container.name: 314_POI_Pilots_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Shit. Okay. It's done.
Key.Chinese: 該死。好吧。這件事完成了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。好吧。这件事完成了。

Container.name: 313_POI_Mysterious_Cache_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Damn, this might help us out.
Key.Chinese: 天呀，這可能可以幫助我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天呀，这可能可以帮助我们。

Container.name: 312_POI_Immobile_Armor_02_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: It's just scrap metal now.
Key.Chinese: 它現在只是一團廢鐵了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它现在只是一坨废铁了。

Container.name: 311_POI_Immobile_Armor_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: One less for us to have to worry about.
Key.Chinese: 少了一件讓我們憂心的事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 少了一件让我们忧心的事。

Container.name: 310_POI_First_Aid_02_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Right. We should be able to put this to good use.
Key.Chinese: 太棒了。這將對我們產生極大的幫助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太棒了。这将对我们产生极大的帮助。

Container.name: 309_POI_First_Aid_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Okay. This should be enough for now.
Key.Chinese: 好的。這對目前來說應該是足夠了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。这对目前来说应该是足够了。

Container.name: 308_POI_Crashed_Plane_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Damn. Poor bastard.
Key.Chinese: 該死。可憐的混蛋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。可怜的混蛋。

Container.name: 307_POI_Crashed_Helicopter_02_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Shit. Hard landing.
Key.Chinese: 真是糟糕。是一個硬著陸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真糟糕。硬着陆。

Container.name: 306_POI_Crashed_Helicopter_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Jesus... what a mess.
Key.Chinese: 天啊...真是一團混亂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊...真是一团混乱。

Container.name: 305_POI_Checkpoint_03_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: That should free up our supply network a bit.
Key.Chinese: 這應該能使我們的補給網安全些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这应该能使我们的补给网安全些。

Container.name: 304_POI_Checkpoint_02_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: I hope they get the message now.
Key.Chinese: 我希望他們現在已經收到警告了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我希望他们现在已经收到警告了。

Container.name: 303_POI_Checkpoint_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: This should send a message.
Key.Chinese: 這應該能對他們產生一點警告。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这应该能给他们一点警告。

Container.name: 302_POI_Abandoned_Battlefield_03_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Well, that APC's not going anywhere.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，看來那臺裝甲運兵車不能去任何地方了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，看来那台装甲输送车不能去任何地方了。

Container.name: 301_POI_Abandoned_Battlefield_02_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Christ. Must have been some firefight.
Key.Chinese: 天啊。看來這裡的確經歷過一場大戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊。看来这里的确经历过一场大战。

Container.name: 300_POI_Abandoned_Battlefield_01_Player
Container.situation: player to himself

Key.Original: Damn, a whole platoon could get lost in this forest...
Key.Chinese: 該死，在這種森林中就算是一個排也可能會迷失...
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，在这种森林中能走丢一个排...

Container.name: 214_POI_Pilots_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible pilots v.1 poi.

Key.Original: You won't believe what I've just heard.
Key.Chinese: 你不可能會相信我剛剛所聽到的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不可能会相信我刚刚所听到的。

Key.Original: We received a message from someone sympathetic to our cause.
Key.Chinese: 我們從別的線人中收到了一項情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们从别的线人中收到了一项情报。

Key.Original: He said that pilots from AAF's 2nd Helicopter Squadron set up a small 'HQ' in an abandoned coastal resort, just south of Kavala.
Key.Chinese: 他說阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的第二飛行中隊在一個廢棄的海濱度假勝地中設立了一個小指揮部，就在卡瓦拉的南方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他说 AAF 第二直升机中队的飞行员在一处废弃的海滨度假胜地中设立了一个小指挥部，就在卡瓦拉的南方。

Key.Original: Try me.
Key.Chinese: 怎樣了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎样了。

Key.Original: If we manage to eliminate them, AAF air power will take a serious blow.
Key.Chinese: 假如我們能殲滅掉他們，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的空中力量將會被大大的削弱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如我们能歼灭掉他们，AAF 的空中力量将被大大削弱。

Key.Original: Yes, of course, they are not so stupid as to go there alone. They will have protection.
Key.Chinese: 是的，當然，他們還不至於笨到獨自前往那裡。他們是有保護的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，当然，他们还不至于傻到独自前往那里。他们是有保护的。

Key.Original: This type of thing requires a delicate touch. Go in quietly - do the job - disappear before they know what's happened.
Key.Chinese: 這種活兒需要靈巧的人來執行。悄悄進去-做好工作-然後在他們了解發生了什麼事情前就離開那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这种活儿需要灵巧的人来执行。悄悄进去—做好工作—然后在他们了解发生了什么事情前就离开那里。

Key.Original: So, what's the catch?
Key.Chinese: 所以，有什麼情報?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，有什么情报？

Container.name: 403_welcome_b_hub03
Container.situation: player approaches b_hub03 for the first time.

Key.Original: American, come - please - walk with me now.
Key.Chinese: 美國佬，來-這邊請-請跟我一起走一會兒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 美国佬，来—这边请—请跟我一起走一会儿。

Key.Original: My name is Nikos Panagopoulos and, from what I hear, I owe you a debt of gratitude.
Key.Chinese: 我的名字是尼科斯·帕納戈普洛斯，據我所聽到的，我好像是欠你一份人情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我叫做尼科斯·帕纳戈普洛斯，而据我所知我好像是欠你一份人情。

Key.Original: The situation has now changed.
Key.Chinese: 現在整個狀況都改變了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在整个状况都改变了。

Key.Original: I will let Commander Stavrou share the details but, let me say, it is good news.
Key.Chinese: 我會讓指揮官斯塔夫魯跟你分享更多的細節，不過聽我說，都是些好消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会让指挥员斯塔夫鲁跟你分享更多的细节，不过听我说，都是些好消息。

Key.Original: I am - we together are - determined to change the status quo.
Key.Chinese: 我是-我們在這一起-決心改變現狀。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我—我们所有人—决心改变现状。

Key.Original: Ever since our legitimate government was overthrown, we have waited for such a day.
Key.Chinese: 自從我們合法的政府被推翻之後，我們已經等了太久太久了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 自从我们的合法政府被推翻之后，我们已经等了太久太久了。

Key.Original: Thanks in part to you and, of course, our British friends over all these years, we are much closer to being able to do that.
Key.Chinese: 感謝你的努力，當然，也要感謝那些英國朋友近幾年的支持，我們離成功不遠了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢你的努力，当然，也要感谢那些英国朋友长年以来的支持，我们离成功不远了。

Key.Original: So, thank you, Corporal Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 所以，非常謝謝你，下士Kerry。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，非常谢谢你，克里下士。

Key.Original: Now, come, Stavrou will debrief everyone soon.
Key.Chinese: 現在，跟我來，斯塔夫魯將會對大家進行報告。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在跟我来，斯塔夫鲁将会对大家进行报告。

Container.name: 402_welcome_b_hub02
Container.situation: player approaches b_hub02 for the first time.

Key.Original: Ah, good, I am glad to see that you made it here.
Key.Chinese: 啊，非常好，我真高興你成功抵達了這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，非常好，我真高兴你成功抵达了这里。

Key.Original: Moving our camp at this time was - ah - a rather unexpected task.
Key.Chinese: 在這種時刻移動我們的營地-只能說-是個令人相當意外的任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这种时刻转移我们的营地—只能说—是个令人相当意外的任务。

Key.Original: I can not say how long we will find ourselves here, but we must be ready to move again.
Key.Chinese: 我不能保證我們什麼時候又會被發現，所以我們要做好隨時再移動的準備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不能保证我们什么时候又会被发现，所以我们要做好随时再移动的准备。

Key.Original: Our enemy is increasing the pressure upon us.
Key.Chinese: 我們的敵人給予我們越來越大的壓力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的敌人给予我们越来越大的压力。

Key.Original: We must now pick our moves with great caution.
Key.Chinese: 我們現在的每一步都要小心謹慎。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们现在的每一步都要小心谨慎。

Key.Original: They grow stronger, but slower. We must adapt to this new threat.
Key.Chinese: 他們變得越來越強大，但這也拖慢了他們的速度。我們必須適應這個新威脅。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们变得越来越强大，但这也拖慢了他们的速度。我们必须适应这个新威胁。

Container.name: 401_welcome_b_hub01
Container.situation: player approaches b_hub01 for the first time.

Key.Original: Cosy.
Key.Chinese: 真溫馨的小基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真温馨的小基地。

Key.Original: Wait, he's Stavrou? That explains a lot.
Key.Chinese: 等等，他是斯塔夫魯?這倒解釋了很多事情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，他是斯塔夫鲁？这倒解释了很多事情。

Key.Original: Oh, uh, don't mention it, Captain.
Key.Chinese: 哦，喔，不要客氣，上尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，喔，不要客气，上尉。

Key.Original: Well, it's better than nothing.
Key.Chinese: 哈，這總比啥都沒有還好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈，这总比啥都没有还好。

Key.Original: So, that's Stavrou over there, I believe you two have met.
Key.Chinese: 你看，斯塔夫魯就在那邊，我相信你們早已經認識了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你看，斯塔夫鲁就在那边，我相信你们早已经认识了。

Key.Original: Yes, he leads this cell.
Key.Chinese: 是的，他領導著這個分部。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，他领导着这个分部。

Key.Original: He's holding a debrief now. After what happened to them in Kavala, I can hardly blame him.
Key.Chinese: 他正準備要進行報告。在卡瓦拉發生那種事情之後，我幾乎不能指責他什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他正准备要进行行动后简报。在卡瓦拉发生那种事情之后，我也没法指责他什么。

Key.Original: They're expecting us - let's not keep them waiting.
Key.Chinese: 他們已經在等我們了-讓我們加快點腳步。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们已经在等我们了—让我们加快点脚步。

Key.Original: And, Kerry... Thanks for your help earlier.
Key.Chinese: 還有件事，克里...感謝你早些時候的幫助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有件事，克里...感谢你早些时候的帮忙。

Container.name: 219_POI_Weapon_Smugglers_02
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible weapon smugglers v.2 poi.

Key.Original: Jesus. Just look at what we have left - so few weapons, such little ammunition!
Key.Chinese: 天啊。看看我們只剩下些什麼-那麼少的武器，以及一點點的彈藥!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊。看看我们只剩下些什么—那么少的武器，以及一点点的弹药！

Key.Original: I hope he'll talk. We need every single weapon, every single bullet...
Key.Chinese: 我希望他能供出一切。我們太需要任何一把槍枝，任何一顆子彈...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我希望他能供出一切。我们太需要哪怕一支枪一发子弹...

Key.Original: Yeah, I know. But we're making gains - little by little.
Key.Chinese: 是阿，我知道。但我們也有在補充資源-一點一點的積累。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，我知道。但我们也在补充资源—一点一点的积累。

Key.Original: Just yesterday, Yannis' group captured a well-known weapon dealer on the southern coast while on long-range patrol.
Key.Chinese: 剛好昨天，楊尼斯的小隊在南邊的海岸做長距離巡邏時，抓到了一個知名的武器商人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 刚好昨天，扬尼斯的小队在南边的海岸做长距离巡逻时，抓到了一个知名的武器商人。

Key.Original: He's no small fish - part of a large international gang. They had access to almost everything.
Key.Chinese: 他不是什麼小人物-他屬於一支跨國犯法集團的一部分。他們幾乎什麼都有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他可不是什么小人物—他属于一个跨国犯法集团。他们几乎什么都有。

Key.Original: They definitely have a cache here on Altis. Stavrou's interrogating him now, but the bastard's not saying anything.
Key.Chinese: 他們在阿爾蒂斯這絕對有藏些存貨。斯塔夫魯正在拷問他，但那個混蛋啥都不說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们在阿尔蒂斯绝对有些存货。斯塔夫鲁正在拷问他，但那个混蛋啥都不说。

Container.name: 218_POI_Weapon_Smugglers_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible weapon smugglers v.1 poi.

Key.Original: You know, my cousin was in the police before the civil war - I remember he was investigating local weapon smugglers.
Key.Chinese: 你知道嗎，我的表弟在內戰前曾是警察-我記得當時他正在查緝當地的武器走私犯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道吗，我的表弟在内战前曾是警察—我记得当时他正在查缉当地的武器走私犯。

Key.Original: It was no big deal, but... could be something.
Key.Chinese: 雖然這情報有段日子了，但...應該還能供參考。
Key.Chinesesimp: 虽然这算不上什么，但...应该还能供参考。

Key.Original: Apparently they were set up somewhere out in the wilderness west of Syrta, but the conflict escalated before they were able to catch them.
Key.Chinese: 顯然那群走私者把根據地設立在西爾塔西方的曠野中，但在準備查緝前，內戰就爆發了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看起来那些走私者把根据地设立在西尔塔西方的旷野中，但在准备查缉前，内战就爆发了。

Container.name: 217_POI_UAV_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible uav v.1 poi.

Key.Original: Shit, really? That's funny, though, I heard Andreas saying he picked up some strange radio signal from the southern woods.
Key.Chinese: 該死，這是真的嗎?說到這點，我曾聽安德里亞說過他有截獲一個奇怪的無線電訊號，好像是在我們南方的樹林中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，这是真的吗？说到这个，我曾听安德里亚斯说过他有截获过一个奇怪的无线电信号，好像是在我们南方的树林中。

Key.Original: Stavrou needs us to camouflage our camps more. He thinks CSAT will deploy drones to find us and bomb the hell out of us.
Key.Chinese: 斯塔夫魯需要我們為基地做更多的偽裝。他認為廣協同盟將會部署無人載具來找到並炸的我們七葷八素。
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯塔夫鲁需要我们为基地做更多的伪装。他认为广协将会部署无人机找到我们，然后炸飞我们。

Key.Original: You should tell Stavrou. Who knows if the bastards aren't watching us right now.
Key.Chinese: 你應該把這跟斯塔夫魯講。天知道那些混蛋現在是不是正在觀察著我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你应该把这跟斯塔夫鲁讲讲。天知道那些混蛋现在是不是正在观察着我们。

Container.name: 216_POI_Special_Forces_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible special forces v.1 poi.

Key.Original: I overheard Stavrou speaking with Miller. CSAT have sent in their recon forces to use special 'COIN tactics' against us.
Key.Chinese: 我曾偷聽到斯塔夫魯與米勒的談話。廣協同盟好像已經派遣了他們的'反叛亂'特種部隊來對付我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我曾偷听到斯塔夫鲁与米勒的谈话。广协好像已经派遣了侦察部队来执行针对我们的特殊'反叛乱战'任务。

Key.Original: Perhaps, but now we face a whole new level of risk.
Key.Chinese: 大概吧，但我們現在所面對的威脅卻又高了一個層級。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大概吧，但我们现在所面对的威胁却又高了一个层级。

Key.Original: We've already lost contact with two scouting teams near Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經與兩支在西爾塔附近的偵察小隊失去聯繫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经与两支在西尔塔附近的侦察小组失去联系。

Key.Original: Well, that's no surprise. The AAF have not exactly been successful in finding our hideouts.
Key.Chinese: 是嗎，這還真不令人意外。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量一直都沒有辦法找到我們的藏身處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是吗，这还真不令人意外。AAF 一直都没有办法找到我们的藏身处。

Key.Original: Exactly.
Key.Chinese: 的確是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 的确是。

Key.Original: Damn.
Key.Chinese: 該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。

Container.name: 215_POI_Sniper_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible sniper v.1 poi.

Key.Original: Yeah, I - it was an ambush.
Key.Chinese: 恩，那-那是一場伏擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，那—那是一场伏击。

Key.Original: His team was hit by a sniper - near the large factory close by Kore.
Key.Chinese: 他與他的小隊中了狙擊手的埋伏-就在靠近科雷附近的大型工廠中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他与他的小组中了狙击手的埋伏—就在靠近科雷附近的大型工厂中。

Key.Original: Shit, man... I'm sorry to hear about Nikolo - what happened?
Key.Chinese: 該死，老兄...真不敢相信尼科洛就這樣走了-到底發生了什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，老兄...真不敢相信尼科洛就这样死了—到底发生了什么？

Key.Original: Before we got the chance to put together a team, his radio went silent.
Key.Chinese: 在我們來得及準備救援隊前往之前，他的無線電就安靜了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们来得及准备救援队前往之前，他的无线电就沉默了。

Key.Original: Goddamn snipers. Don't worry. We'll make them pay for this.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的狙擊手。不要擔心。我們會算這筆帳的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的狙击手。不要担心。我们会算这笔帐的。

Container.name: 213_POI_Mysterious_Cache_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible mysterious cache v.1 poi.

Key.Original: As if it wasn't bad enough standing alone against AAF, now these CSAT dogs bring their army, their armor, their gunships!
Key.Chinese: 好像我們單獨對付阿爾蒂斯武裝力量還不夠的樣子，現在又來了這些廣協同盟混帳，帶來了他們的軍隊，裝甲載具，武裝直升機!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好像我们单独对付 AAF 还不够的样子，现在又来了这些广协混帐，带来了他们的军队，装甲车，武装直升机！

Key.Original: What can we possibly do against that?
Key.Chinese: 這是要我們怎麼做對抗?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这要我们怎么对抗？

Key.Original: And you believe him?
Key.Chinese: 而你相信他?
Key.Chinesesimp: 而你相信他？

Key.Original: Look, I don't know - we have to be smart. Take advantage of our opportunities.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，我並不知道-我們必須變得更加聰明。我們必須把握到每次的機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，我并不知道—我们必须变得更加聪明。我们必须把握到每次机会。

Key.Original: Like, for example, I heard talk of some AAF soldiers wanting to defect.
Key.Chinese: 就像，舉個例子，我曾聽到有一些阿爾蒂斯武裝力量士兵想要投誠到我們這邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就像，举个例子，我曾听说有一些 AAF 士兵想要投诚到我们这边。

Key.Original: Some guy here mentioned a weapons cache they set up somewhere - serious equipment - AA launchers and shit.
Key.Chinese: 那些人曾提過他們設置了一個武器藏匿點-裝著一些大傢伙-防空飛彈與其他玩意兒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些人曾提过他们设置了一个武器藏匿点—装着一些大家伙—防空导弹和什么其他玩意儿。

Key.Original: It's supposed to be in some abandoned warehouse or something in the bay east of Polliako
Key.Chinese: 它應該是被藏匿在波利亞科東方某個海灣中廢棄倉庫之類的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它应该是被藏匿在波利亚科东方某个海湾中废弃仓库之类的地方。

Key.Original: Whether it's true or not, I can't say. But, surely, it's worth a look.
Key.Chinese: 我不確定這情報到底是真是假。但能確定的是，這值得我們去看一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不确定这情报到底是真是假。但能确定的是，这值得我们去看一下。

Container.name: 212_POI_Immobile_Armor_02
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible immobile armor v.2 poi.

Key.Original: You know, I could get used to lady luck being at our side.
Key.Chinese: 你知道嗎，我已經開始習慣勝利的女神是站在我們這邊了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道吗，我已经开始习惯胜利的女神是站在我们这边了。

Key.Original: A local just told us about an immobilized CSAT APC.
Key.Chinese: 一個當地人告訴我們有一臺廣協同盟的裝甲運兵車卡在路邊動彈不得。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个当地人刚告诉我们有一辆广协的装甲输送车在路边抛锚了。

Key.Original: He doesn't know exactly what happened - broken transmission, fucked up engine - whatever.
Key.Chinese: 他並不知道到底發生了什麼事情-可能是傳輸系統斷掉，引擎壞了都有可能。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他并不知道到底发生了什么事情—传动断掉，引擎坏了，都有可能。

Key.Original: As would we all, brother - what happened?
Key.Chinese: 我也有同感，兄弟-發生了什麼事?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我也有同感，兄弟—发生了什么事？

Key.Original: Not quite. It may be much simpler to kill its crew.
Key.Chinese: 不完全是。我覺得殺死它的組員還比較簡單些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不完全是。我觉得杀死它的乘员还比较简单些。

Key.Original: After all, if there's no one operate it, it's just useless heap of metal.
Key.Chinese: 畢竟，如果它沒有人去駕駛，它就只不過是路邊的一團廢鐵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 毕竟，如果它没有人去驾驶，它就只不过是路边的一坨废铁。

Key.Original: Interesting. You think we might use this opportunity to strike it?
Key.Chinese: 有意思。你覺得我們應該掌握這個機會來摧毀它?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有意思。你觉得我们应该掌握这个机会来摧毁它？

Container.name: 211_POI_Immobile_Armor_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible immobile armor v.1 poi.

Key.Original: Yeah, it was another well worked ambush.
Key.Chinese: 哇呼，又是一場成功的伏擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 耶，又是一场成功的伏击。

Key.Original: It was a Gorgon. The explosion didn't kill the crew, but the IFV is a write off.
Key.Chinese: 是一臺"蛇髮女妖"。雖然組員並沒有被炸死，但那臺步兵戰車肯定是報廢了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是一辆"蛇发女妖"。虽然乘员并没有被炸死，但那台步兵战车肯定是报废了。

Key.Original: Well, the wreck is still there for now - on the crossroad between Syrta and Kore.
Key.Chinese: 話說，那團廢鐵現在應該還留在原地-就位在西爾塔和科雷之間的交叉路口上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 话说，那堆废铁现在应该还留在原地—就位于西尔塔和科雷之间的交叉路口上。

Key.Original: Good to hear. So, who was unlucky today?
Key.Chinese: 真高興聽見這消息。所以，是誰這麼倒楣遇上了你們?
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴听见这消息。所以是谁这么倒霉遇上了你们？

Key.Original: Good news, indeed. Those things are lethal - a pity I didn't get to see that.
Key.Chinese: 真是幹的棒極了。那臺載具的確很倒楣-很遺憾我沒能親自看見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是干的棒极了。那些东西威力真的好大—很遗憾我没能亲自看见。

Container.name: 210_POI_First_Aid_02
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible first aid v.2 poi.

Key.Original: Shit. We've got a couple of guys in really bad shape.
Key.Chinese: 該死。我們隊上有幾個人的狀況非常糟糕。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。我们队上有几个人的状况非常糟糕。

Key.Original: Yeah. Desperate.
Key.Chinese: 是阿。而且已經快用完了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。而且已经快用完了。

Key.Original: We're still low on medical kits?
Key.Chinese: 我們的醫療補給還是不夠嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的医疗补给还是不够吗？

Key.Original: You know, there's a veterinary clinic in Fotia. I lived nearby it.
Key.Chinese: 你知道嗎，在福蒂亞附近有一間獸醫診所。我曾住在那附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道吗，在福蒂亚附近有一间兽医诊所。我曾住在那附近。

Key.Original: If it hasn't been destroyed or looted - I dunno - maybe there's something we can salvage?
Key.Chinese: 假如那邊沒有被摧毀或是洗劫-我不知道-或許還有些什麼我們可以拿來利用?
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如那边没有被摧毁或是洗劫—我不知道—或许还有些什么我们可以拿来利用？

Container.name: 209_POI_First_Aid_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible first aid v.1 poi.

Key.Original: You got a spare medical pack?
Key.Chinese: 你有一個備用的醫療包?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有备用的医疗箱？

Key.Original: Damn. We're really running low - and it's not like we can just walk into the Kavala hospital and ask for help.
Key.Chinese: 該死。我們的醫療補給真的快用完了-而且現在的狀況也不像我們可以直接走進卡瓦拉的醫院並尋求幫助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。我们的医疗补给真的快用完了—而且现在我们也不可能走进卡瓦拉医院寻求帮助。

Key.Original: Hm. There is but the village was abandoned long time ago.
Key.Chinese: 恩。是有一個，不過他位在一個廢棄已久的村莊內。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。是有一个，不过在一个废弃已久的村庄内。

Key.Original: Uh, not spare, really, just my own.
Key.Chinese: 喔，並不是備用的，真的，我就只有這個了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，并不是备用的，真的，我就只有这个了。

Key.Original: I'm afraid there might be nothing left by now...
Key.Chinese: 恐怕那邊已經沒有剩下任何東西了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 恐怕那边已经没有剩下任何东西了...

Key.Original: No, but... isn't there a small clinic in Oreokastro?
Key.Chinese: 當然沒辦法，不過...難道奧雷奧卡斯特羅附近沒有一間小診所嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然没办法，不过...奥雷奥卡斯特罗附近是不是有间小诊所？

Container.name: 208_POI_Crashed_Plane_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible crashed plane v.1 poi.

Key.Original: Did you hear what Kostas reported?
Key.Chinese: 你有聽到科斯塔斯的回報嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有听到科斯塔斯的报告吗？

Key.Original: They were watching a Buzzard - on patrol, as usual - but suddenly it started burning and went down.
Key.Chinese: 他們負責監視"禿鷹"戰機-一如往常，戰機在空中巡邏-但突然之間，它的引擎開始燃燒，然後它就墜機了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们负责监视"秃鹰"战机—日常巡逻—但突然之间它的发动机起火，然后它就坠机了。

Key.Original: They don't know if the pilot ejected, but it could be worth investigating before the AAF get a chance to respond.
Key.Chinese: 他們並不知道飛行員有沒有來得及逃生，但值得我們在阿爾蒂斯武裝力量過去前先去查看一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们并不知道飞行员有没有来得及逃生，但值得我们在 AAF 过去前先去查看一下。

Key.Original: No, what happened?
Key.Chinese: 沒，怎麼了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 没，怎么了？

Container.name: 207_POI_Crashed_Helicopter_02
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible crashed helicopter v.2 poi.

Key.Original: You know, even the mighty Kajman has its weak spot...
Key.Chinese: 你知道嗎，就算是強如"鰐魚"這樣的載具，也是有其弱點的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道吗，哪怕是无敌的"鳄鱼"也是有弱点的...

Key.Original: Exactly. Some lucky bastard managed to hit an engine with .50 cal.
Key.Chinese: 對阿。某個幸運的混蛋使用.50口徑的子彈擊中了它的引擎。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对啊。某个幸运儿用.50口径的子弹击中了它的发动机。

Key.Original: It went down in some forest.
Key.Chinese: 然後它就墜機在森林裡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然后它就坠毁在森林里了。

Key.Original: No... somebody managed to bring one down?
Key.Chinese: 不是吧...聽說有人成功射下一架來?
Key.Chinesesimp: 不是吧...有人能成打下一架来？

Key.Original: Ouch. A painful loss!
Key.Chinese: 哎呀。多漂亮的一擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 哎呀。多漂亮的一击！

Container.name: 206_POI_Crashed_Helicopter_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible crashed helicopter v.1 poi.

Key.Original: Did you hear? One of our guys managed to sabotage an AAF helicopter.
Key.Chinese: 你聽說了嗎?我們的其中一個隊友成功破壞了一臺阿爾蒂斯武裝力量直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你听说了吗？我们的人成功破坏了一架 AAF 直升机。

Key.Original: They sent it on a mission few hours ago - after some time, they lost contact with it.
Key.Chinese: 數小時前，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量派遣了那臺直升機去做任務-但是剛過不久，他們就與它失去聯繫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 数小时前，AAF 派那架直升机出任务—刚过不久，他们就与它失去了联系。

Key.Original: No, really? What happened?
Key.Chinese: 不是吧?發生了什麼事情?
Key.Chinesesimp: 不是吧？发生了什么事情？

Key.Original: No shit. I wonder if they made it down or...
Key.Chinese: 真不錯。我真想知道它是有成功迫降還是說...
Key.Chinesesimp: 真不错。我真想知道它是成功迫降还是...

Container.name: 205_POI_Checkpoint_03
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible checkpoint v.3 poi.

Key.Original: It seems these bastards won't rest until they control all the roads on our island.
Key.Chinese: 看來這些混蛋在成功控制我們島嶼的每個道路前，是不會輕易休息的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来这些混蛋在成功控制我们岛屿的每条道路前是不会轻易休息的。

Key.Original: What else?
Key.Chinese: 還能有什麼呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 还能有什么呢？

Key.Original: This time, CSAT brought in their troops to guard it.
Key.Chinese: 此時此刻，廣協同盟已經派遣了部隊在那邊了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此时此刻，广协已经派遣了部队守卫那边了。

Key.Original: What, another checkpoint?
Key.Chinese: 什麼，又一個檢查哨?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么，又一个检查哨？

Key.Original: There's enough of them, but they placed the checkpoint right between two forests...
Key.Chinese: 防守的力量頗強，不過他們盡然把檢查哨設置在兩座森林中間...
Key.Chinesesimp: 防守的力量颇强，不过他们竟然把检查哨设置在两座森林中间...

Key.Original: Well, that was a mistake.
Key.Chinese: 哈，那是個天大的錯誤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈，那是个天大的错误。

Container.name: 204_POI_Checkpoint_02
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible checkpoint v.2 poi.

Key.Original: Tell me about it. A day behind enemy lines on patrol does this to a man.
Key.Chinese: 你告訴我。整天在敵後做巡邏會是一般人每天都要做的事情嗎。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你说的是。在敌后巡逻一天之后人就会变成这样。

Key.Original: We did. The AAF are building another checkpoint. It seems we have less and less freedom by the day.
Key.Chinese: 我們有。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量又在建造一個新的檢查哨。看來我們的自由每天都在被壓縮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们有。AAF 又在建造一个新的检查哨。看来我们的自由每天都在被压缩。

Key.Original: My friend, no offense, but you look like hell.
Key.Chinese: 我的朋友，我沒有冒犯的意思，但你看起來糟透了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的朋友，我没有冒犯的意思，但你看起来糟透了。

Key.Original: I agree, brother but - right now - I can barely walk, let alone fight. Another day.
Key.Chinese: 我同意，但是-就現在來說-我現在幾乎快走不動，更別說是去戰鬥了。改天吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我同意，但是—就现在来说—我现在走都走不动，更别说是去战斗了。改天吧。

Key.Original: True. Did you at least see some activity?
Key.Chinese: 恩，你們真的很辛苦。不過你們有偵察到任何情報嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，你们真的很辛苦。不过你们有侦察到敌方活动吗？

Key.Original: Of course. Rest easy.
Key.Chinese: 現在。我要去休息了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在。我要去休息了。

Key.Original: Shit. We should get some men together. We should demonstrate just how unwelcome they truly are.
Key.Chinese: 該死。我們應該招集一些人馬。然後我們要向他們證明他們在這裡是多麼的不受歡迎。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。我们应该招集一些人马。然后我们要向他们证明他们在这里是多么的不受欢迎。

Container.name: 203_POI_Checkpoint_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible checkpoint v.1 poi.

Key.Original: The AAF do not learn quickly.
Key.Chinese: 看來阿爾蒂斯武裝力量很不會吸取教訓。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来 AAF 很不会吸取教训。

Key.Original: Well, one of our contacts gave us a tip.
Key.Chinese: 這麼說吧，我們的線人告訴了我們一個情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这么说吧，我们的线人告诉了我们一个情报。

Key.Original: They were to build a new checkpoint - part of this new offensive - near the northern coast.
Key.Chinese: 敵人正在建立一處新檢查哨-當作攻擊計劃的一部分-位置在北海岸附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌人正在建立一处新检查哨—当作攻击计划的一部分—位置在北海岸附近。

Key.Original: What do you mean?
Key.Chinese: 你的意思是?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的意思是？

Key.Original: They first dispatched smaller team to prepare the ground for the others.
Key.Chinese: 他們已經派出了一支小隊做事前預備工作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们已经派出了一支小组做准备工作。

Key.Original: Shit, this is child's play.
Key.Chinese: 該死，這根本就是小孩子的把戲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，这根本就是小孩子的把戏。

Key.Original: It is. Although, I cannot say if it is CSAT pushing them harder, or their own bloody arrogance.
Key.Chinese: 的確。儘管我不能確定他們是被廣協同盟逼的，還是說是對自己太有信心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 的确。尽管我不能确定他们是被广协军逼的，还是说是对自己太有信心。

Container.name: 202_POI_AbandonedBattlefield_03
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible abandoned battlefield v.3 poi.

Key.Original: Oh, shit. I feel totally ruined.
Key.Chinese: 喔，該死。我的感覺糟透了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，该死。我的感觉糟透了。

Key.Original: Let me tell you, it's no easy work hauling RPGs across mountains.
Key.Chinese: 讓我告訴你，一直在山頂扛著火箭筒不是件簡單的事情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我告诉你，背着火箭筒翻山越岭不是容易事。

Key.Original: Indeed we did.
Key.Chinese: 我們有的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们有的。

Key.Original: A CSAT mechanized group searching the village there.
Key.Chinese: 有一支廣協同盟機械化小隊在搜索那裡的村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有一个广协的机械化小队在搜索那里的村庄。

Key.Original: Oh, yeah, your team was sent out to scout the western coast - did you find something?
Key.Chinese: 喔，對了，你的小隊不是被派往西海岸做偵察的工作嗎-你們有發現什麼嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，对了，你的小队不是被派往西海岸做侦察的工作吗—你们有发现什么吗？

Key.Original: They've really stepped up their operations - but guess who took out their APC?
Key.Chinese: 他們的確比較強大-但你猜猜是誰幹掉了他們的裝甲運兵車?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们的确比较强大—但你猜猜是谁干掉了他们的装甲输送车？

Key.Original: Hah! Good work, brother!
Key.Chinese: 哈!幹的好，我的兄弟!
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈！干的好，我的兄弟！

Container.name: 201_POI_AbandonedBattlefield_02
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible abandoned battlefield v.2 poi.

Key.Original: Hey, are you okay, brother? What happened?
Key.Chinese: 嘿，你還好嗎，兄弟?發生什麼事了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你还好吗，兄弟？发生什么事了？

Key.Original: Fucking coward.
Key.Chinese: 該死的懦夫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死的懦夫。

Key.Original: We've lost some men - an ambush on an AAF squad near the great dump.
Key.Chinese: 我們損失了些弟兄-當時我們正在垃圾堆存場附近埋伏阿爾蒂斯武裝力量。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们损失了些弟兄—当时我们正在垃圾堆存场附近埋伏 AAF。

Key.Original: We killed them all but - Stavrou - he was afraid of CSAT reinforcements. Ordered us to retreat.
Key.Chinese: 我們把他們幹翻了-但是斯塔夫魯-它太過害怕廣協同盟的援軍。竟然命令我們撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们把他们干翻了—但是斯塔夫鲁—他害怕广协的援军。竟然命令我们撤退。

Key.Original: We didn't even have time to take care of our fallen...
Key.Chinese: 我們甚至沒有時間去把陣亡的弟兄給帶走...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们甚至没有时间去把阵亡的弟兄给带走...

Container.name: 200_POI_AbandonedBattlefield_01
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible abandoned battlefield v.1 poi.

Key.Original: What's it like out there?
Key.Chinese: 那裡有啥風景?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里有啥风景？

Key.Original: Any contact?
Key.Chinese: 有任何敵人跟你們交戰嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有任何敌人跟你们交战吗？

Key.Original: Ah, I see. A pity in times like these.
Key.Chinese: 恩，我知道了。常常天公都會不做美。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，我知道了。天公常常不做美。

Key.Original: Ah, as last time. Dense fog. Little visibility.
Key.Chinese: 恩。超大的濃霧。能見度非常低。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩。超大的浓雾。能见度非常低。

Key.Original: Yes, a recon team. In the large forest by the coast.
Key.Chinese: 有的，一支偵察小隊。在海岸邊的森林裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有的，一支侦察小队。在海岸边的森林里。

Key.Original: I think we managed to get them all, but - the fog - it got so thick.
Key.Chinese: 我認為我們是把他們都解決了，但是-由於濃霧作祟-這讓我不是那麼的肯定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我认为我们是把他们都解决了，但是—由于浓雾作祟—这让我不是那么的肯定。

Key.Original: It took an hour just to regroup and find our way back - we simply did not have the chance to grab any equipment.
Key.Chinese: 我們花了近一個小時才重新集合大家並找到回來的路-我們甚至沒有任何機會可以去撿拾任何戰利品。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们花了近一个小时才重新集合大家并找到回来的路—我们甚至没有任何机会可以去捡拾任何战利品。

Key.Original: ASSEMBLY POINT
Key.Chinese: 集合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合点

Key.Original: Assemble
Key.Chinese: 集合
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合

Key.Original: Stavrou has organized a debriefing. Meet with the rest of the guerrillas at his position.
Key.Chinese: 斯塔夫魯正要向大家進行報告。跟其他的反抗軍一同前往他的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯塔夫鲁正要向大家进行行动后报告。跟其他的游击队员一起去找他。

Key.Original: MOVE
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: Attend Debriefing
Key.Chinese: 參加簡報
Key.Chinesesimp: 参加简报

Key.Original: Leave the camp at your discretion to start scouting the surrounding area.
Key.Chinese: 視你需要，你可以離開營地到周邊區域進行偵察任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 视你需要，你可以离开营地到周边区域进行侦察任务。

Key.Original: Scouting (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 偵察(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察（支线任务）

Key.Original: Finish up by returning to the camp.
Key.Chinese: 回到營地即可結束偵察任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 回到营地即可结束侦察任务。

Key.Original: RETURN
Key.Chinese: 返回
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回

Key.Original: Return to Camp (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 返回營地(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回营地（支线任务）

Key.Original: Pick your loadout.%1%1Be aware, when you've finished a mission briefing, your weapons and equipment may be adjusted to best fit the mission profile.
Key.Chinese: 選擇你的裝備。%1%1請注意，當你完成任務簡報之後，你的武器與裝備將會自動調整成最適合該任務的狀態。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择你的装备。%1%1请注意，当你完成任务简报之后，你的武器与装备将会自动调整成最适合该任务的状态。

Key.Original: REARM
Key.Chinese: 重新武裝
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新武装

Key.Original: Rearm (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 重新武裝(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新武装（支线任务）

Key.Original: Report in with one of the guerilla fighters preparing to go on an operation.
Key.Chinese: 與準備要執行任務的反抗軍戰士報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与准备要执行任务的游击队战士报到。

Key.Original: REPORT IN
Key.Chinese: 報到
Key.Chinesesimp: 报到

Key.Original: Report in
Key.Chinese: 報到
Key.Chinesesimp: 报到

Container.name: 017_b_out2_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by stavrou.

Key.Original: Brothers, join me in welcoming Nikos home!
Key.Chinese: 兄弟們，我們很高興尼科斯終於回家了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 兄弟们，我们很高兴尼科斯终于回家了！

Key.Original: With him back at our side, the return of a legitimate government is a little closer.
Key.Chinese: 隨著他回到我們的身邊，我們也離創立合法政府的日子更靠近點兒了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着他回到我们的身边，我们也离重建合法政府更接近点儿了。

Key.Original: We will draw the bulk of the AAF from the defence of the main airport, leaving NATO with CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 我們將吸引住阿爾蒂斯武裝力量在主機場防禦的注意力，把廣協同盟留給北約來處理。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将吸引住 AAF 在主要机场防御的注意力，把广协留给北约来处理。

Key.Original: This is where the tides turn, brothers. We are stronger than ever before.
Key.Chinese: 現在正是風水輪流轉的時刻，各位弟兄。我們現在比以往任何時候都還要強盛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在正是转折时刻，兄弟们。我们现在比以往任何时候都还要强盛。

Key.Original: While it is unfortunate that our British friends could not be here themselves to celebrate this victory, there are more pressing matters at hand.
Key.Chinese: 雖然很可惜我們的英國朋友沒法在這邊一同分享我們的喜悅，但我們的手頭上還有別的事情要做。
Key.Chinesesimp: 虽然很可惜我们的英国朋友没法在这边一同分享我们的喜悦，他们手头上还有别的事情要做。

Key.Original: Nikos has brought new information.
Key.Chinese: 尼科斯帶來了新的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尼科斯带来了新的情报。

Key.Original: Although we’re still trying to verify his intel, we now believe that NATO is ready to launch an invasion.
Key.Chinese: 儘管我們還在設法核對他的情報，但我們相信，北約已經準備好要發動入侵了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管我们还在设法核对他的情报，但我们相信，北约已经准备好要发动入侵了。

Key.Original: Miller and his team have already moved north.
Key.Chinese: 米勒和他的小隊已經事先往北方移動了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒和他的小队已经事先往北方移动了。

Key.Original: Their objective is to watch enemy movement and, if possible, establish contact with NATO command.
Key.Chinese: 他們的任務是監視敵人的動向，還有如果可能的話，建立與北約指揮官的通訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们的任务是监视敌人的动向，还有如果可能的话，建立与北约指挥部的通信。

Key.Original: So, while we do not know any specifics, only one target makes sense: the main airport, which operates under joint CSAT-AAF control.
Key.Chinese: 所以，儘管我們不大確定所有的事情，但有一件事是肯定的:主機場目前是被廣協同盟與阿爾蒂斯武裝力量一同掌控。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，尽管我们不大确定所有的细节，但有一件事是肯定的：主机场目前被广协与 AAF 一起控制。

Key.Original: We’ll watch the situation carefully, and prepare to make our own strike when the moment comes.
Key.Chinese: 我們將仔細觀察，當時機來臨時，我們將會發動攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将仔细观察，当时机来临时，我们将会发动攻击。

Key.Original: Our target will be the AAC airfield to the south, operated entirely by the AAF.
Key.Chinese: 我們的目標將會是南邊的阿爾蒂斯空中俱樂部機場，它是由阿爾蒂斯武裝力量負責把守。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的目标将会是南边的阿尔蒂斯空中俱乐部机场，它由 AAF 把守。

Key.Original: An end to our struggle is finally within our grasp. Let us not waste it.
Key.Chinese: 終結戰爭的門票終於握在我們的手中。讓我們不要浪費了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 争取最终胜利的斗争主动权终于在我们手里了。让我们不要浪费了。

Container.name: 016_b_m06_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by stavrou.

Key.Original: Okay, so here's the situation.
Key.Chinese: 好的，現在的狀況如下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，现在的状况如下。

Key.Original: The recent attack on Kavala hit us hard.
Key.Chinese: 最近敵人對卡瓦拉的那次攻擊，著實讓我們損失慘重。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最近敌人对卡瓦拉的那次攻击着实让我们损失惨重。

Key.Original: We lost valuable equipment and munitions - many months of supplies.
Key.Chinese: 我們失去了寶貴的裝備與彈藥-以及好幾個月的補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们失去了宝贵的装备与弹药—以及好几个月的补给。

Key.Original: And - to make matters worse – with Nikos still missing in action, we've lost a key link in our supply network.
Key.Chinese: 還有-更糟的是–尼科斯現在仍然下落不明，我們失去了補給網路的核心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有—更糟的是–尼科斯现在仍然下落不明，我们失去了补给网路的核心。

Key.Original: We're not desperate - not yet, at least - but the situation is only going to get worse from here.
Key.Chinese: 我們還沒有絕望-至少現在還沒-但從現在開始，情況只可能變得更糟。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们还没有绝望—至少现在还没—但从现在开始，情况只可能变得更糟。

Key.Original: We must act now. We must strengthen our hand while we still can. Our British friend here has offered us a solution.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須行動。我們必須趁我們還有能力掌握狀況時行動。我們的英國朋友在這邊提供了一個解決方案。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须行动。我们必须趁我们还有能力掌握状况时行动。我们的英国朋友在这边提供了一个解决方案。

Key.Original: Part of Miller's team has been scouting enemy movement to the south.
Key.Chinese: 米勒的部分隊員偵察到敵人在南部的動靜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒小组的一部分侦察到敌人在南部的动静。

Key.Original: There's a weekly supply run between Agios Dionysios and a CSAT outpost in Fotia.
Key.Chinese: 那裡有一個每個禮拜都會進行補給運輸的補給線，介於聖迪奧尼西奧斯和廣協同盟在福蒂亞的前哨之間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里有一个每周都会在圣迪奥尼西奥斯和广协在福蒂亚的哨所之间进行补给运输的补给线，。

Key.Original: His team will move in, ambush the convoy, and deliver the supply truck to one of our teams.
Key.Chinese: 他的小隊將會移動到那邊，然後埋伏那個車隊，然後運輸補給卡車給我們的其中一個小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他的小组将会移动到那边，伏击车队，然后把补给卡车交给我们的一个小组。

Key.Original: So - unless there are any objections - I say we do this.
Key.Chinese: 所以-除非各位有反對的意見-要不我們就幹這票吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以—除非各位有反对的意见—要不我们就干这票吧。

Container.name: 015_b_m05_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by stavrou.

Key.Original: Alright, I'll get straight to the point.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我就直接講重點了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我就直接讲重点了。

Key.Original: A sympathetic AAF officer has approached us looking for a way out.
Key.Chinese: 一名阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的軍官靠近我們，表示他想投誠的決心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一名 AAF 的军官靠近我们，表示他想投诚的决心。

Key.Original: He's been uncomfortable for many months, but the recent CSAT offensive - the bloody attack on Kavala, the ongoing crackdown - has proven to be the last straw.
Key.Chinese: 他的心底已經忐忑不安好幾個月了，隨著廣協同盟猛烈且血腥的掃蕩卡瓦拉，這壓倒了他的最後一根稻草。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他已经摇摆不定好几个月了，但广协猛烈且血腥地扫荡卡瓦拉，成了压倒了他的最后一根稻草。

Key.Original: Now he and a few trusted comrades are ready to defect.
Key.Chinese: 現在，他與幾名他信任的同志準備要投奔我們這邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，他与几名他信任的同志准备要投奔我们这边。

Key.Original: As part of the deal - and before our enemy learns what's going on - we'll use his position of authority to strike a blow against the very CSAT forces that decimated Kavala.
Key.Chinese: 作為交易的一部分-也趕在我們的敵人了解發生什麼事之前-我們打算利用他現在的職權，設置埋伏來重創殘忍掃蕩卡瓦拉的廣協同盟部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 作为交易的一部分—也赶在我们的敌人了解发生什么事之前—我们打算利用他现在的职权，设置埋伏来重创残忍扫荡卡瓦拉的广协部队。

Key.Original: We've arranged to link up with this officer - codename Orestes - along with some of his men at an abandoned farm to the north.
Key.Chinese: 他的代號將被稱為"奧雷斯泰斯"，而且我們已經跟他聯繫好了，將在北邊的一個廢棄農場中碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们成功地和这名军官—代号"奥雷斯泰斯"-取得了联系，将在北边的一个废弃农场中碰面。

Key.Original: We'll then use his security clearance to set the trap.
Key.Chinese: 我們將利用他的職權來設置陷阱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将利用他的职权来设置陷阱。

Key.Original: This is both a great risk and a great opportunity. Let us not waste it.
Key.Chinese: 這對我們雙方來說都是個很大的賭注，同時也是一個絕佳的機會。讓我們不要浪費了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这既是个很大的赌注，也是一个绝佳的机会。让我们不要浪费了。

Container.name: 013_b_m03_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by stavrou.

Key.Original: Come on, gather round.
Key.Chinese: 過來，靠緊點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 过来，在这儿集合。

Key.Original: So, as you know, AAF and CSAT forces have stepped up their operations against us.
Key.Chinese: 所以，就如你們所知，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量與廣協同盟的部隊已經加緊腳步對我們進行打擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，就如你们所知，AAF 与广协部队已经加紧脚步对我们进行打击。

Key.Original: It looks like a significant, coordinated and ongoing effort.
Key.Chinese: 看來他們一時半刻是不會停下腳步的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这次看起来是一次重大的、经协调且持续的行动。

Key.Original: Now we need to be more mobile - able to move at a moment's notice. To do that, we need fuel for our vehicles.
Key.Chinese: 所以我們必須變得更機動-能在任何時刻移動到別的位置。要做到這點，我們的車必須要有油料。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以我们必须变得更机动—能在任何时刻移动到别的位置。要做到这点，我们的车必须要有油料。

Key.Original: However, as part of the recent offensive, several of our civilian supply trucks have been seized.
Key.Chinese: 然而，由於敵人近幾次的進攻，我們擁有的幾輛民用補給卡車被他們扣押了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，由于敌人近几次的进攻，我们拥有的几辆民用补给卡车被他们扣押了。

Key.Original: Many of them - including one of our fuel trucks - are being held at a small industrial complex to the south of the Kavala highway, the main road from the airport to the old capital.
Key.Chinese: 他們大部分都被收押在一座小工業區裡，其中包括了油料車，工業區在卡瓦拉南方的公路上，這條公路連接著機場與前首都。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们大部分—包括一辆油料卡车在内—都被收押在卡瓦拉高速路以南的一座小工业区里，这条公路连接着机场与前首都。

Key.Original: We're asking Corporal Kerry here to lead a small team south of the road and raid that complex.
Key.Chinese: 我們請求下士克里帶領一支小隊潛入到道路的南方，並準備突襲工業區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们要求克里下士带领一支小组潜入到道路的南方，并准备突袭工业区。

Key.Original: We'll stash the vehicle in a safe house nearby - and wait - until it's safe to move again.
Key.Chinese: 我們將會把搶到的車藏匿到附近安全的地方，並等待，等到局勢安定下來再移動他。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将会把抢到的车藏匿到附近安全的地方，并等到局势安定下来再移动他。

Key.Original: Good luck and Godspeed.
Key.Chinese: 祝好運，一路順風。
Key.Chinesesimp: 祝好运，一路顺风。

Container.name: 012_b_m02_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by stavrou.

Key.Original: Ok, quiet now; I have some important news to share with you all.
Key.Chinese: 好的，請先安靜;我有一些重要的訊息要與你們分享。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，请先安静;我有一些重要的新闻要与你们分享。

Key.Original: Since his defection, Orestes has further briefed us on what he knows about the situation.
Key.Chinese: 自從奧雷斯泰斯向我們投誠後，他就不斷的向我們分享他所知道的情況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 自从奥雷斯泰斯向我们投诚后，他就不断的向我们分享他所知道的情况。

Key.Original: Based on this information, we believe that one of our own - Nikos - is being held by the AAF on Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 基於他的情報，我們相信我們的戰友-尼科斯-被阿爾蒂斯武裝力量關在斯特拉蒂斯上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 基于他的情报，我们相信我们的战友—尼科斯—被 AAF 关押在斯特拉蒂斯岛上。

Key.Original: I don’t need to tell you how important he is to our cause, brothers.
Key.Chinese: 我並不需要像你們特別說明，你們自己也明白，失去他對我們來說是有多麼大的打擊，各位弟兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我并不需要解释他对我们的事业有多重要，兄弟们。

Key.Original: Not only is he the lynchpin of our supply network, he’s the one man that truly unifies our cause.
Key.Chinese: 不只是因為他是我們供給網路的關鍵人物，更重要的，他是那個真正讓大家今天站在這裡的最大推手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不只是因为他是我们不及网络的关键人物，更重要的，他是把我们统一在同一面旗帜下的灵魂人物。

Key.Original: We plan to set him free.
Key.Chinese: 我們計劃要去救他。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们计划去救他。

Key.Original: However, time is of the essence. Orestes believes that they will move Nikos deep into CSAT territory.
Key.Chinese: 然而，時間是不等人的。奧雷斯泰斯相信尼科斯即將要被轉移到廣協同盟的領地上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而时间不等人。奥雷斯泰斯相信尼科斯即将要被转移到广协的控制区内。

Key.Original: It’s imperative we get to him before he’s taken beyond our reach.
Key.Chinese: 這任務是目前的當務之急，我們不能讓他離開到我們手不能及的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这任务是目前的当务之急，我们不能让他被带到我们手不能及的地方。

Key.Original: Right now, our British friend is putting together a plan to extract him and is finding the boats we will need to get to and from Stratis. We deeply appreciate this assistance.
Key.Chinese: 現在我們的英國朋友正在策畫要如何救出他，並且也在找一艘船來載我們去斯特拉蒂斯。我們很感謝他們的協助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在我们的英国朋友正在策划要如何救出他，并且也在找船来载我们去斯特拉蒂斯。我们很感谢他们的协助。

Key.Original: For now, we’ll wait for Miller’s signal and move to his position when the time is right.
Key.Chinese: 目前，讓我們先等待米勒的信號，然後再去拯救我們的戰友出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 目前，让我们先等待米勒的信号，然后再去救我们的战友出来。

Container.name: 011_b_m01_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by stavrou.

Key.Original: I’ve got some news, so listen carefully.
Key.Chinese: 我這邊有一些新消息，所以仔細聽好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这边有一些新消息，所以仔细听好了。

Key.Original: It begins to look more and more like the offensive against us is part of a bigger strategy.
Key.Chinese: 目前看來對我們進行的這些攻擊，是屬於一個更大戰略的其中一環。
Key.Chinesesimp: 目前看来对我们进行的这些攻击是属于一个更大战略的一环。

Key.Original: Our enemy is pushing back into territory they abandoned long ago, setting up a forward operating base to the north west of Frini.
Key.Chinese: 我們的敵人正在向以前他們拋棄多時的領地推進，並在夫里尼的西北方建立了一個前進作戰基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的敌人正在向以前他们抛弃多时的领地推进，并在夫里尼的西北方建立了一个前进作战基地。

Key.Original: Yes, this is bad news for us, but, if we play our hand well, it’s also a rare opportunity.
Key.Chinese: 是的，這是個壞消息，但是，假如我們能好好處理這個狀況，它也可以成為我們難得的一個機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，这是个坏消息，但是，假如我们能好好处理这个状况，它也可以成为我们难得的一个机会。

Key.Original: CSAT forces are driving this offensive too quickly, over-stretching both themselves and the AAF.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟的部隊在此次進攻中推進的太快了，過度延長他們與阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的防線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协部队在此次进攻中推进的太快了，过度延展了他们与 AAF 的防线。

Key.Original: If we can hit this position right now, I think we have a chance to catch them off-guard.
Key.Chinese: 假如我們趁現在攻擊他們，我認為我們可以打得他們一個措手不及。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如我们趁现在攻击他们，我认为我们可以打他们一个措手不及。

Key.Original: The base is still under construction, with supplies arriving by the hour.
Key.Chinese: 該基地還在建設當中，正在等待補給品的到達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该基地还在建设当中，正在等待补给品的到达。

Key.Original: I say we strike quickly, seize whatever weapons and ammo we can, and fall back.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須快速攻擊，然後奪取任何有用的武器與彈藥，然後就撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须快速攻击，夺取任何有用的武器与弹药，然后撤退。

Key.Original: We need to send a message to our enemy: they cannot expand with such impunity, and we cannot expect to last much longer if we let them do so.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須對我們的敵人發出警告:那就是他們不能在這麼囂張了，我們不能再放任他們這麼為所欲為。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须对我们的敌人发出警告：他们不能在这么嚣张了，我们不能再放任他们这么为所欲为。

Container.name: 010_b_hub_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by stavrou.

Key.Original: Welcome, everyone, it is good to see you all here.
Key.Chinese: 歡迎各位，真高興在這邊見到你們每一個人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 欢迎各位，真高兴在这边见到你们每一个人。

Key.Original: So, for the sake of our new friends, my name is Kostas Stavrou.
Key.Chinese: 所以，先讓我對我們的新朋友自我介紹一下，我的名字是科斯塔斯·斯塔夫魯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，先让我对我们的新朋友自我介绍一下，我的名字是科斯塔斯·斯塔夫鲁。

Key.Original: The last we heard, Pyrgos blamed NATO for supporting a terrorist attack on Stratis. Their CSAT partners have stood behind them.
Key.Chinese: 我們最後聽到的消息，皮爾戈斯的政府指責北約支持一些恐怖分子攻擊斯特拉蒂斯。而廣協同盟已經站在他們的後面為他們撐腰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据我们最后听到的消息，皮尔戈斯当局指责北约支持了针对斯特拉蒂斯岛的恐怖袭击。而广协则为他们撑腰。

Key.Original: The global situation has become critical and, in these troubled times, it is good to see a familiar face.
Key.Chinese: 現在世界的局勢變得越來越險峻，但在這種艱難的時刻，我還是很欣慰可以看到幾個熟悉的面孔。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在世界局势变得越来越险峻，但在这种艰难的时刻，我还是很欣慰可以看到几个熟悉的面孔。

Key.Original: Together with my brothers here today, we form one cell of the FIA.
Key.Chinese: 再加上今天在現場的所有弟兄，我們是自由獨立同盟的其中一個支部。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再加上今天在现场的所有兄弟，我们是 FIA 的一个支部。

Key.Original: We reject the false regime in our nation. We fight to restore our freedom.
Key.Chinese: 我們拒絕我們國家現在正種虛假的政府。我們為自己的自由來打拼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们不承认我国现在的伪政府。我们为重新获得自由而战。

Key.Original: The situation, as it stands, is complex.
Key.Chinese: 就目前的種種狀況來說，還是在很複雜的狀態。
Key.Chinesesimp: 局势，就现在而言，十分复杂。

Key.Original: For many months now, CSAT forces have been a blight upon our homeland.
Key.Chinese: 幾個月下來，廣協同盟的部隊漸漸的滲透到我們的家園。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几个月下来，广协的部队逐渐渗透到我们的家园。

Key.Original: They have trained and supported the AAF – the right hand of the government in Pyrgos.
Key.Chinese: 他們訓練並支持著阿爾蒂斯武裝力量-是屬於皮爾戈斯虛假政府的軍隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们训练并支持着 AAF–皮尔戈斯当局的左右手。

Key.Original: Yet now they have militarised. They have moved into our towns and villages.
Key.Chinese: 他們已經蛻變成正規軍隊。並且入侵了我們的城鎮與村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在他们已经正规化。他们入侵了我们的城镇与村庄。

Key.Original: They have brought bloodshed to our homes.
Key.Chinese: 他們把流血事件帶進了我們的家園。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们在我们的家园制造血案。

Key.Original: Communication with the outside world has become increasingly difficult.
Key.Chinese: 而現在我們與外界的通訊變得越來越困難。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而现在我们与外界的通信变得越来越困难。

Key.Original: I would like to welcome back our British friend here, and his men.
Key.Chinese: 我很歡迎我們的英國朋友和他的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我很欢迎我们的英国朋友和他的人。

Key.Original: So, welcome, Scott. May the future bring good fortune, with you at our side.
Key.Chinese: 我很歡迎你，斯考特。希望由於你站在我們這邊，可以為我們的未來帶來好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我很欢迎你，斯考特。希望你站在我们这边可以为我们的未来带来好运。

Container.name: 007_b_out_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller/stavrou' soldier.

Key.Original: Kerry, great job bringing Nikos home - it's a real game changer.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你在把尼科斯帶回來的任務上真是幹的太棒了-你改變了戰爭的走向。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你在把尼科斯带回来的任务上真是干的太棒了—你改变了战争的走向。

Key.Original: Stavrou wants to debrief us now. You ready?
Key.Chinese: 斯塔夫魯現在想要跟我們進行報告。你準備好了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯塔夫鲁现在想要跟我们进行报告。你准备好了吗？

Container.name: 006_b_m06_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller/stavrou' soldier.

Key.Original: Alright, Kerry. Glad to see you made it.
Key.Chinese: 非常好，克里。真高興見到你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 非常好，克里。真高兴见到你。

Key.Original: Anyway, Miller's put together a plan with Stavrou. You coming?
Key.Chinese: 先不管其他事了，米勒正在跟斯塔夫魯擬定一個計劃。你要來嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 先不管其他事了，米勒正在跟斯塔夫鲁拟定计划。你要来吗？

Container.name: 005_b_m05_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller/stavrou' soldier.

Key.Original: Big news: we've got word of an enemy officer who's ready to switch sides.
Key.Chinese: 好消息:我們剛聽到有一個敵方軍官想要向我們投誠。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好消息：我们刚听说有个敌方军官想要向我们投诚。

Key.Original: Want to go find out what's going on?
Key.Chinese: 想要過來了解發生了什麼事情嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 想要过来了解发生了什么事情吗？

Container.name: 003_b_m03_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller/stavrou' soldier.

Key.Original: Hey, we've just got some informaton about a vehicle depot - just south of the Kavala highway.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，我們剛獲得一項情報，指出一個載具倉庫的位置-就在卡瓦拉南方的公路上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，我们刚获得一项情报，指出一个车辆仓库的位置—就在卡瓦拉南方的公路上。

Key.Original: Sounds like some of our vehicles are held there - Stavrou wants to talk. Come on, you in?
Key.Chinese: 聽起來像我們的幾輛載具被關押在那邊-斯塔夫魯想要說幾句。來吧，你要加入嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来好像说我们的几辆车被羁押在那边—斯塔夫鲁想要说几句。来吧，你要加入吗？

Container.name: 002_b_m02_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller/stavrou' soldier.

Key.Original: You know that officer you helped out? He's given us some more intel.
Key.Chinese: 你知道你幫助的那個軍官嗎?他給了我們更多的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道你帮助的那个军官吗？他给了我们更多的情报。

Key.Original: Sounds important - Stavrou's putting a briefing together. You ready to go?
Key.Chinese: 聽起來蠻重要的-斯塔夫魯正在準備進行簡報。你準備好要來了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来蛮重要的—斯塔夫鲁正在准备进行简报。你准备好要来了吗？

Container.name: 001_b_m01_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller/stavrou' soldier.

Key.Original: Kerry, did you hear? There's been some AAF activity quite close by.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你聽說了嗎?我們附近有阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的部隊正在活動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你听说了吗？我们附近有 AAF 部队正在活动。

Key.Original: Stavrou wants to talk to us about it. Are you ready?
Key.Chinese: 斯塔夫魯將要跟我們說明狀況。你準備好了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯塔夫鲁将要跟我们说明状况。你准备好了吗？

Key.Original: Take the Radio
Key.Chinese: 拿起無線電
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿起无线电

Key.Original: TAKE
Key.Chinese: 拿起
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿起

Key.Original: Take the comms equipment from the body.
Key.Chinese: 從屍體身上拿起無線電。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从尸体身上拿起无线电。

Key.Original: Adapt
Key.Chinese: 適應
Key.Chinesesimp: 适应

Key.Original: ADAPT
Key.Chinese: 適應
Key.Chinesesimp: 适应

Key.Original: You've washed up alone on foreign shores. Find help.
Key.Chinese: 你獨自被沖上了外國的海岸。請尋找幫助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你孤身一人被冲上了外国的海岸。请寻找帮助。

Key.Original: Supplies
Key.Chinese: 補給品
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给品

Key.Original: Contact
Key.Chinese: 交戰
Key.Chinesesimp: 交战

Key.Original: Signal Lost
Key.Chinese: 失去訊號
Key.Chinesesimp: 失去信号

Container.name: x20_Head_Down
Container.situation: james tells kerry to keep his head down

Key.Original: Kerry, mate, keep your head down. We can't afford to get spotted up here.
Key.Chinese: 克里，夥計，保持姿態壓低。我們不能保證我們不被觀察到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，伙计，保持姿态压低。在这儿被发现我们就完了。

Container.name: x15_Mines
Container.situation: kerry approaches the mine field and james shouts at him about it.

Key.Original: Kerry, for fucks sake, watch out for the mines!
Key.Chinese: 克里，看在老天的份上，小心一下地雷!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，看在老天的份上，小心一下地雷！

Key.Original: I told you, we set up a defensive perimeter on our six.
Key.Chinese: 我已經跟你講了，我們在我們六點鐘的方向設置了防禦地雷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我已经跟你讲了，我们在我们六点钟的方向设置了防御地雷。

Key.Original: Approach from the south - I don't need your stupidity giving away our position.
Key.Chinese: 請從南方接近-我不需要因為你的白目而讓我們的位置暴露。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请从南方接近—我不像因为你的愚蠢而让我们的位置暴露。

Container.name: x10_No_Radio_Meeting
Container.participants: EPB B James;EPB B Player;EPB B Echo Lead;
Container.situation: kerry finds group without contacting james

Key.Original: Hey, kid, I've got a spare shirt and vest here. It's going to get cold after dark.
Key.Chinese: 嗨，小子，我這裡有備用的襯衫與背心。這裡在晚上會變冷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，小子，我这里有备用的衬衫与背心。这里在晚上会变冷。

Key.Original: What the fuck? Kerry, is that you?!
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?克里是你嗎?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼？克里是你吗？！

Key.Original: Well, fuck me. You jammy cunt.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，我認了。你真他媽的神出鬼沒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，我认了。你真他妈的神出鬼没。

Key.Original: A piece of him.
Key.Chinese: 一部分的他。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一部分的他。

Key.Original: Alright then, Corporal, get your head down and make yourself comfortable.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，下士，保持低調並讓自己舒服點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，下士，保持低调放松一下。

Key.Original: We'll be here for a while yet.
Key.Chinese: 我們將在這裡待一陣子。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将在这里待一阵子。

Key.Original: I - uh - thanks. Appreciate it.
Key.Chinese: 我-痾-謝謝。感激不盡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我—啊—谢谢。感激不尽。

Container.name: x05_Has_Map_Kavala
Container.situation: james tells kerry about kavala. kerry has a map

Key.Original: Oh, and keep clear of Kavala. It's getting fucked up.
Key.Chinese: 喔，還有請遠離卡瓦拉。那裡的狀況非常混亂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，还有请远离卡瓦拉。那里的状况非常混乱。

Key.Original: Understood.
Key.Chinese: 了解了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解了。

Container.name: x01_Has_Map_RV
Container.situation: alternate responding to being asked if he has a map (he does)

Key.Original: Good. We're at grid 039-143.
Key.Chinese: 很好。我們的座標在039-143。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。我们的座标在039-143。

Key.Original: Try to make your way to our position. We'll be here until dark, understood?
Key.Chinese: 請試著前往我們的位置。我們會在這待到晚上，了解嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 请试着前往我们的位置。我们会在这待到晚上，了解吗？

Key.Original: Yup.
Key.Chinese: 有的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有的。

Container.name: i05_Contact
Container.situation: james explains about enemy forces

Key.Original: Both AAF and CSAT forces are operating in the area. Mopping up after some offensive against the guerrillas.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量與廣協同盟的部隊都在區域內活動。正在掃蕩反抗軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 与广协部队都在区域内活动。他们正在完成反抗军扫荡作战后打扫战场。

Key.Original: The situation's still pretty fucked up. Scattered pockets of resistance. You might use that to your advantage.
Key.Chinese: 現在狀況仍是一團混亂。反抗軍到處分散。你可能可以用它來當作你的優勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在状况仍是一团混乱。反抗军作鸟兽散。你可能可以用它来当作你的优势。

Key.Original: Lieutenant, I see infantry close by. What's the situation?
Key.Chinese: 上尉，我在附近有看到步兵。請問現在的狀況是怎樣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉，我在附近有看到步兵。请问现在的状况怎样？

Key.Original: I'd suggest you avoid contact where possible but, if your back's against the wall, just pray it's an isolated patrol.
Key.Chinese: 我建議你避免任何一切交戰，不果如果還是不幸遇上了，你最好祈禱你只是遇到了一個孤單的巡邏隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我建议你避免任何一切交战，不果如果还是不幸遇上了，你最好祈祷你只是遇到了一个孤立的巡逻队。

Key.Original: And, remember, CSAT is going to be better trained, better armed.
Key.Chinese: 還有請記住，廣協同盟的訓練與裝備都比較精良。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有请记住，广协的训练与装备都比较精良。

Key.Original: Be fucking careful. Don't get swarmed. Play the odds. Over.
Key.Chinese: 千萬要小心。不要被圍攻。利用好機會。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 千万要小心。不要被围攻。利用机会。完毕。

Key.Original: Got it. Appreciate the intel. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到了。感謝你的情報。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到了。感谢你的情报。通话完毕。

Container.name: i01_Supplies
Container.situation: james helps kerry find supplies

Key.Original: Go ahead, Corporal.
Key.Chinese: 請講，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请讲，下士。

Key.Original: ... I thought you Yanks couldn't get enough freedom?
Key.Chinese: ...我認為你這美國佬還無法得到夠多的自由?
Key.Chinesesimp: ...我认为你这美国佬还觉得自由不够多？

Key.Original: Lieutenant, do you read me? Over.
Key.Chinese: 上尉，你是否有聽到?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉，收到了吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Listen carefully. The FIA just took a massive beating.
Key.Chinese: 仔細聽好了。自由獨立同盟才剛遭受嚴重的打擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 仔细听好了。FIA 才刚遭受到严重打击。

Key.Original: I could really use some help, I got nothing here. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我真的需要一些幫助，我這裡什麼都沒有。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我真的需要一些帮助，我这里什么都没有。完毕。

Key.Original: There's still a lot of enemy activity in the area. Move carefully and keep your eyes open.
Key.Chinese: 這裡仍有許多敵人在區域內活動。小心移動並眼觀四方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里仍有许多敌人在区域内活动。小心移动并眼观四方。

Key.Original: With respect, Lieutenant, fuck you.
Key.Chinese: 先說聲抱歉，上尉，去你媽的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 讲道理，上尉，去你妈的。

Key.Original: Try searching the through the ruins; you might find something useful.
Key.Chinese: 試著搜索廢墟;你應該可以找到能用的裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 试着搜索废墟;你应该可以找到能用的装备。

Key.Original: How's that for you? Over.
Key.Chinese: 這消息對你如何?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这消息对你如何？完毕。

Key.Original: Yeah, that's something, thanks. See you soon. Out.
Key.Chinese: 哈，這還差不多，謝了。期待見到你。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈，这还差不多，谢了。期待见到你。通话完毕。

Container.name: 45_Has_Radio_Meeting
Container.participants: EPB B James;EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: kerry rendezvous with james after contacting him

Key.Original: Hey, kid, I've got a spare shirt and vest here. It's going to get cold after dark.
Key.Chinese: 嗨，小子，我這裡有備用的襯衫與背心。這裡在晚上會變冷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，小子，我这里有备用的衬衫与背心。这里在晚上会变冷。

Key.Original: Good to see you, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 真高興見到你，Kerry。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴见到你，克里。

Key.Original: Get your head down and make yourself comfortable. We'll be here for a while yet.
Key.Chinese: 保持低調並讓自己舒服點。我們將在這裡待一陣子。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持低调并让自己舒服点。我们将在这里待一阵子。

Key.Original: I - uh - thanks. Appreciate it.
Key.Chinese: 我-痾-謝謝。感激不盡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我—啊—谢谢。感激不尽。

Container.name: 43_Approach_From_South
Container.situation: kerry is told by james to approach their position from the south and that mines have been placed in the north

Key.Original: Kerry, watch it, we've placed defensive mines to our rear.
Key.Chinese: 克里，小心點，我們放置了防禦地雷在我們的後方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，小心点，我们在后方放置了防御地雷。

Key.Original: Be sure to approach our position from the south. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 請確保從我們位置的南方接近我們。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 请确保从我们位置的南方接近我们。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Understood, Lieutenant. Appreciate the head's up. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解了，上尉。正在接近會合點。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解了，上尉。正在接近会合点。通话完毕。

Container.name: 40_Map_Found
Container.situation: kerry finds a map after contacting james

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Good work, Corporal. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。幹的好，下士。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。干的好，下士。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Lieutenant, update, I managed to pick up a map.
Key.Chinese: 上尉，狀況更新，我搞到一張地圖了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉，状况更新，我搞到地图了。

Key.Original: Proceeding to your location now. 039-143, over.
Key.Chinese: 正在前往你們的位置。039-143，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在前往你们的位置。039-143，完毕。

Container.name: 35_Moving
Container.situation: james has told kerry everything he can

Key.Original: Alright. Good luck, Kerry. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好的。祝好運，克里。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。祝好运，克里。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Got it.
Key.Chinese: 知道了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了。

Container.name: 30_No_Map_RV
Container.situation: james informs kerry of the rendezvous. kerry doesn't have a map

Key.Original: First off, get someplace where you've got a view of the city.
Key.Chinese: 首先，你要先到一個可以看到整座城市的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 首先，你要先到一个可以看到整座城市的地方。

Key.Original: If you look north, you'll see two hills - one with a radio mast.
Key.Chinese: 如果你向北看，你會看到兩座山-其中一個有無線電塔。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你向北看，你会看到两座山—其中一个有无线电塔。

Key.Original: That's not it.
Key.Chinese: 先別急，我們並不在那。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先别急，我们并不在那。

Key.Original: We're dug in on the other hillside. Just in case, our gridref is 039-143.
Key.Chinese: 我們是躲在其他的山坡上。以防萬一，我們的座標位置是在039-143。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们是躲在另一个座山上。为防万一，我们的坐标是039-143。

Key.Original: Radio mast. Got it.
Key.Chinese: 無線電塔。知道了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 无线电塔。知道了。

Key.Original: Try to make your way to our position. We'll be here until dark. Understood?
Key.Chinese: 請試著前往我們的位置。我們會一直待到晚上。了解嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 请试着前往我们的位置。我们会一直待到晚上。了解吗？

Key.Original: Oh.
Key.Chinese: 喔。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔。

Container.name: 25_More_Than_One
Container.situation: kerry is surprised james isn't alone

Key.Original: 'We?'
Key.Chinese: '我們?'
Key.Chinesesimp: '我们？'

Container.name: 20_No_Map_Kavala
Container.situation: kerry doesn't have a map already

Key.Original: Right. Listen carefully. It sounds like you're nearby the old capital, Kavala.
Key.Chinese: 好吧。仔細聽好。聽起來你在在舊首都卡瓦拉的附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。仔细听好。听起来你在在旧首都卡瓦拉附近。

Key.Original: That's where the fighting is; we're just to the north of it, on overwatch.
Key.Chinese: 那裡是戰鬥聲所發出的地方;而我們的位置剛好就在他的北方，正在進行監視。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里是发生战斗的地方;而我们的位置刚好就在他的北方，正在进行监视。

Key.Original: Uh, negative.
Key.Chinese: 痾，沒有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，没有。

Container.name: 15_Radio_Contact
Container.situation: kerry answers the radio

Key.Original: What the fuck? Kerry, is that you?
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?克里，真的是你嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼？克里，真的是你吗？

Key.Original: What's your status? Where's Sergeant Hardy?
Key.Chinese: 你的狀況如何?中士哈爾迪在哪?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的状况如何？哈尔迪中士在哪？

Key.Original: Hello, Lieutenant? I read you, it's Kerry here!
Key.Chinese: 哈囉，上尉?我收到了，這裡是克里!
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈啰，上尉？我收到了，这里是克里！

Key.Original: Lieutenant, do you copy? Over!
Key.Chinese: 上尉，你是否收到?通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉，你是否收到？通话完毕！

Key.Original: Shit ... Alright, can you pick out any landmarks? Any choppers or shelling?
Key.Chinese: 該死...好吧，你是否能看見任何地標?任何直升機或砲擊聲?
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死...好吧，你是否能看见任何地标？任何直升机或炮击声？

Key.Original: A piece of him.
Key.Chinese: 一部分的他。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一部分的他。

Key.Original: You got a map at least?
Key.Chinese: 你至少有地圖吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你至少有地图吧？

Key.Original: He - Hardy didn't make it, I'm sorry - I found him washed up on the beach - I - I have absolutely no idea where I am.
Key.Chinese: 恩-哈爾迪沒有撐過去，我很抱歉-我在岸邊找到了他-我-我對我在哪完全沒有頭緒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩—哈尔迪没有撑过去，我很遗憾—我发现他也被冲上了沙滩—我—我完全不知道我在哪儿。

Key.Original: Yeah, uh, both, I think ... Look, I'm on a beach - can't see shit from here.
Key.Chinese: 是，痾，我想兩個都有吧...聽著，我現在在海灘上-無法從這裡看見任何鬼東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，啊，我想两个都有吧...听着，我现在在海滩上—从这儿什么也看不到。

Container.name: 10_Apologies
Container.situation: kerry starts looking through the dead body for gear

Key.Original: Shit ... sorry about this, buddy.
Key.Chinese: 該死...抱歉了，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死...真遗憾，老兄。

Container.name: 05_Radio_Babble
Container.situation: looped, intermittent radio babble with static silence in between, which the player hears waking up on the beach

Key.Original: Hardy, come in. Over.
Key.Chinese: 哈爾迪，接進。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈尔迪，请回答。完毕。

Key.Original: Do you read me, Sergeant?
Key.Chinese: 你有聽見嗎，中士?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有听见吗，中士？

Key.Original: I say again, do you read me? Over.
Key.Chinese: 我再說一遍，你有聽見嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我再说一遍，你有听见吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Sergeant Hardy, how copy?
Key.Chinese: 中士哈爾迪，有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈尔迪中士，有收到吗？

Key.Original: Damnit, do you copy?
Key.Chinese: 該死，你有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，你有收到吗？

Container.name: 01_Lost
Container.situation: kerry wakes up on the beach and struggles to stand up; sfx prompt, shouldn't be implemented as conversation in mission, but should be in db

Key.Original: Kerry faces the consequences of a botched withdrawal.
Key.Chinese: 克里正面臨一場拙劣撤退的後果。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里正面临一场拙劣撤退的后果。

Key.Original: Rendezvous
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: Await Orders
Key.Chinese: 等待命令
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待命令

Key.Original: WAIT
Key.Chinese: 等待
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: Wait for further orders from Commander Stavrou.
Key.Chinese: 請等待指揮官斯塔夫魯的進一步命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请等待指挥员斯塔夫鲁的进一步命令。

Key.Original: Protect Supply Truck
Key.Chinese: 保護補給卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 保护补给卡车

Key.Original: PROTECT
Key.Chinese: 保護
Key.Chinesesimp: 保护

Key.Original: Do what you can to protect our truck as it's loaded with supplies.
Key.Chinese: 盡你所能保護我們的補給卡車，它上面載滿了我們需要的補給品。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽你所能保护我们的补给卡车，它上面载满了我们需要的补给品。

Key.Original: Neutralize Guards
Key.Chinese: 殲滅守衛
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭守卫

Key.Original: NEUTRALIZE
Key.Chinese: 殲滅
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭

Key.Original: While remaining undetected, eliminate the guards in the watch towers.
Key.Chinese: 趁我們還沒被發現，殲滅掉看守塔上的守衛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 趁我们还没被发现，歼灭掉看守塔上的守卫。

Key.Original: RETREAT
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Friendlies have successfully evacuated from Kavala, retreat back to the forest.
Key.Chinese: 友軍已經成功從卡瓦拉中撤退，現在請撤退回森林之中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军已经成功从卡瓦拉撤退，现在撤退回森林之中。

Key.Original: Defend Outpost
Key.Chinese: 防禦前哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御前哨

Key.Original: DEFEND
Key.Chinese: 防禦
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御

Key.Original: The enemy has launched a counter-offensive on the outpost. Make sure they do not succeed.
Key.Chinese: 敵人已經對前哨發動反攻。請確保他們不會成功。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌人已经对前哨发动反攻。请确保他们不会成功。

Key.Original: Assault Outpost
Key.Chinese: 突擊前哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击前哨

Key.Original: ASSAULT
Key.Chinese: 突擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击

Key.Original: Assault and secure the AAF outpost near Frini.
Key.Chinese: 突擊並肅清阿爾蒂斯武裝力量靠近夫里尼的前哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击并肃清 AAF 在夫里尼附近的前哨站。

Key.Original: ELIMINATE
Key.Chinese: 殲滅
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭

Key.Original: Eliminate the enemy mortar in the village of Frini.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅掉敵軍在夫里尼村莊裡的迫擊砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭掉敌军在夫里尼村里的迫击炮。

Key.Original: RETREAT
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Fall back to the outpost by fleeing the incoming enemy air strike on Frini.
Key.Chinese: 撤退回前哨當中，以避免敵軍對夫里尼的空襲行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退回前哨站，以躲避敌军对夫里尼的空袭。

Key.Original: Suppressive Fire
Key.Chinese: 火力壓制
Key.Chinesesimp: 火力压制

Key.Original: Outpost
Key.Chinese: 前哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 前哨

Key.Original: Mortar
Key.Chinese: 迫擊砲
Key.Chinesesimp: 迫击炮

Key.Original: Machine Gunner
Key.Chinese: 機槍手
Key.Chinesesimp: 机枪手

Key.Original: Falcon
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"

Key.Original: Neutralize Targets
Key.Chinese: 殲滅目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭目标

Key.Original: Mortar Hunt
Key.Chinese: 獵捕迫擊砲
Key.Chinesesimp: 猎捕迫击炮

Key.Original: Defend Outpost
Key.Chinese: 防禦前哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御前哨

Key.Original: Despite being sucessfully assaulting the enemy outpost, the supply truck was damaged before it could return to our camp.
Key.Chinese: 儘管我們成功突擊了敵人的前哨，但我們的補給卡車在來得及安全回來之前就被摧毀掉了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管我们成功突击了敌人的前哨，但我们的补给卡车在来得及安全回来之前就被摧毁掉了。

Key.Original: You successfully assaulted the enemy position and protected the truck. Given the circumstances, these supplies should prove to be invaluable.
Key.Chinese: 你成功突擊了敵人的前哨並保護了卡車。鑒於目前的情況，這些物資對我們來說將會是無比珍貴。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功突击了敌人的前哨并保护了卡车。鉴于目前的情况，这些物资对我们来说将会是无比珍贵。

Key.Original: You failed to follow the orders assigned to you and you didn't attacked the outpost when required. That kind of behaviour will not be tolerated.
Key.Chinese: 你並沒有照著任務計劃走，而且在我們需要你攻擊前哨時你卻不見了。你做的這些行為都是無法被容忍的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你并没有照着任务计划走，而且在我们需要你攻击前哨时你却不见了。你做的这些行为都是无法被容忍的。

Key.Original: You failed to go back to the outpost in time, weakening our defense and allowing our enemy to immobilize the supply truck.
Key.Chinese: 你沒能來得及趕回前哨，這使我們的防禦力大減，並讓敵人有機會癱瘓掉我們的卡車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你没能来得及赶回前哨，这使我们的防御力大减，并让敌人有机会瘫痪掉我们的卡车。

Key.Original: You failed to protect the supply truck.
Key.Chinese: 你沒能保護好補給卡車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你没能保护好补给卡车。

Key.Original: I’ve got some news, so listen carefully.%1%1It begins to look more and more like the offensive against us is part of a bigger strategy. Our enemy is pushing back into territory they abandoned long ago, setting up a forward operating base to the north west of Frini.%1%1Yes, this is bad news for us, but, if we play our hand well, it’s also a rare opportunity. CSAT forces are driving this offensive too quickly, over-stretching both themselves and the AAF. If we can hit this position right now, I think we have a chance to catch them off-guard.%1%1The base is still under construction, with supplies arriving by the hour. I say we strike quickly, seize whatever weapons and ammo we can, and fall back.%1%1We need to send a message to our enemy: they cannot expand with such impunity, and we cannot expect to last much longer if we let them do so.
Key.Chinese: 我這邊有一些新消息，所以仔細聽好了。%1%1目前看來對我們進行的這些攻擊，是屬於一個更大戰略的其中一環。我們的敵人正在向以前他們拋棄多時的領地推進，並在夫里尼的西北方建立了一個前進作戰基地。%1%1是的，這是個壞消息，但是，假如我們能好好處理這個狀況，它也可以成為我們難得的一個機會。廣協同盟的部隊在此次進攻中推進的太快了，過度延長他們與阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的防線。假如我們趁現在攻擊他們，我認為我們可以打得他們一個措手不及。%1%1該基地還在建設當中，正在等待補給品的到達。我們必須快速攻擊，然後奪取任何有用的武器與彈藥，然後就撤退。%1%1我們必須對我們的敵人發出警告:那就是他們不能在這麼囂張了，我們不能再放任他們這麼為所欲為。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这边有一些新消息，所以仔细听好了。%1%1目前看来对我们进行的这些攻击是属于一个更大战略的其中一环。我们的敌人正在向以前他们抛弃多时的领地推进，并在夫里尼的西北方建立了一个前进作战基地。%1%1是的，这是个坏消息，但是，假如我们能好好处理这个状况，它也可以成为我们难得的一个机会。广协部队在此次进攻中推进的太快了，过度延长他们与 AAF 的防线。假如我们趁现在攻击他们，我认为我们可以打他们一个措手不及。%1%1该基地还在建设当中，正在等待补给品的到达。我们必须快速攻击，然后夺取任何有用的武器与弹药，然后就撤退。%1%1我们必须对我们的敌人发出警告，那就是他们不能在这么嚣张了，我们不会再放任他们这么为所欲为。

Key.Original:
%3Omega%2 - Your Team
%4Sigma%2 - Support Team
%5Gamma%2 - Support Team
%6Kappa%2 - Supply truck
Slingshot - Headquarters
Key.Chinese:
%3"歐米加"%2-你的小隊
%4"西格瑪"%2-支援小隊
%5"伽馬"%2-支援小隊
%6"卡帕"%2-補給卡車
"彈弓"-指揮官
Key.Chinesesimp:
%3"欧米加"%2-你的小队
%4"西格玛"%2-支援小队
%5"伽马"%2-支援小队
%6"卡帕"%2-补给卡车
"弹弓"-指挥员

Key.Original: Together with the support teams, assault the enemy %3outpost%2 and steal their %4supplies%2.
Key.Chinese: 與支援小隊一起突擊%3前哨%2，並偷取他們的%4補給%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与支援小队一起突击%3前哨站%2，并偷取他们的%4补给%2。

Key.Original:
1. Assault enemy %3outpost%2
2. Protect Kappa's %4truck%2 while re-supplying
3. Move back to the %5forest%2
Key.Chinese:
1. 突擊敵人的%3前哨%2
2. 當"卡帕"正在補給物資時，保護好他的%4卡車%2
3. 撤退回%5森林%2
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 突击敌人的%3前哨站%2
2. 当"卡帕"正在补给物资时，保护好他的%4卡车%2
3. 撤退回%5森林%2

Key.Original: Alarm: Deactivate
Key.Chinese: 關閉警報
Key.Chinesesimp: 关闭警报

Key.Original: Breaking Even
Key.Chinese: 損益兩平
Key.Chinesesimp: 平衡收支

Container.name: 125_retreat
Container.participants: EPB B Miller;EPB I Stavrou;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: stavrou reports enemy incoming (air and armored) and requires all teams to move back to the forest

Key.Original: Copy that, Slingshot, falling back now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"彈弓"，正在撤退。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"弹弓"，正在撤退。通话完毕。

Key.Original: This is Falcon, we see fast-movers vectoring on your position – If I were you I'd fall back now!
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"獵鷹"，我們看到了有戰機正在向你們的位置靠近–如果我是你們的話我現在就會進行撤退!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"猎鹰"，我们看到有战机正在向你们的位置靠近–如果我是你们的话我现在就会进行撤退！

Key.Original: All teams, get back to the forest, retreat!
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，請返回森林裡，撤退!
Key.Chinesesimp: 各组都有，请返回森林里，撤退！

Container.name: 35_suppressiveFireStop
Container.situation: kerry let's all groups know that friendlies reached the outpost perimeter, signaling the machine gunners to stop the suppressing fire

Key.Original: Be advised, friendlies now in the outpost.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，友軍已經進入前哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，友军已经进入前哨。

Key.Original: Support gunners, hold your fire. Out.
Key.Chinese: 支援槍手，請停火。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援炮手，请停火。通话完毕。

Container.name: x50_casualtiesCharlie
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla B;EPB I Stavrou;
Container.situation: charlie team suffers heavy casualties

Key.Original: Slingshot, this is Sigma, Nicolo and Kostas are both down! Please advise. Over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，這裡是"西格瑪"，尼科洛跟科斯塔斯都已經倒下了!請指示。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，这里是"西格玛"，尼科洛跟科斯塔斯都已经倒下了！请指示。完毕。

Key.Original: We need you to stay in the fight, Sigma! Pull through!
Key.Chinese: 我們需要你們繼續戰鬥，"西格瑪"!想辦法撐過去!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要你们继续战斗，"西格玛"！想办法撑过去！

Container.name: x46_alarm
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
