Container.situation: one of the team leader reminds about the alarm still playing, another will suggest the terminal is is the hq bunker

Key.Original: Goddammit, can someone please find and kill that alarm?
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，有人能找到並關掉這個警報嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，有人能找到并关掉这个警报吗？

Container.name: x45_casualtiesBravo
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Stavrou;
Container.situation: bravo team suffers heavy casualties

Key.Original: This is Gamma, we've suffered heavy losses. Slingshot, please advise! Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"伽馬"，我們損失慘重。"彈弓"，請指示!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"伽马"，我们损失惨重。"弹弓"，请指示！完毕。

Key.Original: Just keep fighting, Gamma - retreating now will do more harm than good! Slingshot Out.
Key.Chinese: 請繼續戰鬥，"伽馬"-現在就撤退的話我們將前功盡棄!"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请继续战斗，"伽马"-现在就撤退的话我们将前功尽弃！"弹弓"通话完毕。

Container.name: x40_casualtiesAlpha
Container.situation: alpha team suffers heavy casualties

Key.Original: This is Omega, we've suffered heavy casualties. Please advise. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"歐米加"，我們傷亡慘重。請指示。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"欧米加"，我们伤亡惨重。请指示。完毕。

Key.Original: Stay in the fight, Omega - we're committed now! Out.
Key.Chinese: 繼續戰鬥，"歐米加"-我們現在必須堅持住!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续战斗，"欧米加"-我们现在必须坚持住！通话完毕。

Container.name: x35_friniLeaveFailed
Container.situation: kerry fails to retreat frini and return to the outpost, failing the mission

Key.Original: Goddammit Kerry! The outpost is being over-run by enemy forces.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的克里!前哨已經被敵軍給淹沒了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的克里！前哨已经被敌军给淹没了。

Container.name: x30_friniLeaveWarning
Container.situation: kerry is taking a long time to return to the outpost after having to leave frini

Key.Original: I got it - we're on the way. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到-我們在路上了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到—我们在路上了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Omega, where the hell are you? We need you back at the outpost now. Over.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，你們天殺的在哪裡?我們需要你們返回前哨。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，你们天杀的在哪里？我们需要你们返回前哨。完毕。

Container.name: x25_mortarNeutralizeFailed
Container.situation: kerry is not able to neutralize the enemy mortar

Key.Original: Goddammit, Omega, a mortar just hit our truck.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，"歐米加"，有一發迫擊砲擊中了我們的卡車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，"欧米加"，有一发迫击炮击中了我们的卡车。

Container.name: x20_getIntoOutpostFailed
Container.situation: kerry reports that the supplies truck was destroyed

Key.Original: Fuck! Slingshot, come in, the supply truck's hit. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 幹!"彈弓"，接進，補給卡車被擊中了。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 操！"弹弓"，请回答，补给卡车被击中了。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Oh, Shit. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 喔，該死。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，该死。请稍等。

Container.name: x15_getIntoOutpostFailed
Container.situation: kerry failed to follow the order to charge the enemy outpost

Key.Original: What the hell, Omega? Your actions are unacceptable!
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼，"歐米加"?你們的行動真是令人無法接受!
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼，"欧米加"？你们的行动真是令人无法接受！

Container.name: x10_getIntoOutpost
Container.situation: kerry is taking a long time to get into the outpost on the initial attack

Key.Original: Goddammit, Omega, get back to the Outpost and assist the other teams!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，Omega，趕快回到前哨並協助其他小隊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，"欧米加"，赶快回到前哨并协助其他小组！

Container.name: x05_guardsDetected
Container.situation: kerry team is detected by the tower guards

Key.Original: Dammit, Omega, I said stay undetected!
Key.Chinese: 該死，"歐米加"，我說過要保持隱藏的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，"欧米加"，我说过要保持隐蔽的！

Container.name: x00_guardsAlive
Container.situation: kerry team is not able to neutralize the guard towers in time

Key.Original: Dammit, Omega, we can't wait any longer! You have missed your window of opportunity.
Key.Chinese: 該死，"歐米加"，我們不能再等了!你們已經失去機會了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，"欧米加"，我们不能再等了！你们已经失去机会了。

Container.name: i10_defendOutpost
Container.situation: kerry is told how he can properly protect the outpost using his team effectivly

Key.Original: Understood.
Key.Chinese: 了解。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。

Key.Original: Kerry, the enemy forces are approaching from the south.
Key.Chinese: 克里，敵人正從南方靠近中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，敌人正从南方靠近中。

Key.Original: They have a small path with cover on your south east, make sure you don't get flanked from there.
Key.Chinese: 他們在東南方的方向有一條擁有掩體的小通道，請確保你們不會遭受到包夾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们在东南方的方向有一条拥有掩体的小通道，请确保你们不会遭受到包夹。

Key.Original: Take up a good defensive position. Out.
Key.Chinese: 找尋良好的防守位置。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找寻良好的防守位置。通话完毕。

Container.name: i05_friniMortar
Container.situation: kerry is told how to find and neutralize the enemy mortar

Key.Original: Kerry, if you move quickly, you have a chance to neutralize that mortar before the enemy overwhelms us.
Key.Chinese: 克里，假如你移動的夠快，你就可以在敵人來得及淹沒我們之前幹掉迫擊砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，假如你移动的够快，你就可以在敌人来得及淹没我们之前干掉迫击炮。

Key.Original: Once you're in Frini, listen carefully for the distinctive sound of that mortar and hunt it down. Out.
Key.Chinese: 等你進入夫里尼後，仔細聽迫擊砲獨特的聲音，找到並幹掉它。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等你进入夫里尼后，仔细听迫击炮独特的声音，找到并干掉它。通话完毕。

Container.name: i00_neutralizeTargets
Container.situation: kerry is told how he can engage and neutralize the guard towers

Key.Original: Omega, you should have a good line of sight on the guard towers.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，你從那邊應該可以很輕易的瞄準到看守塔。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，你从那边应该可以很轻易的瞄准到看守塔。

Key.Original: Ahead of our raid, you must assign those targets to your team.
Key.Chinese: 在我們進攻之前，你們必須先幹掉那些守衛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们进攻之前，你们必须先干掉那些守卫。

Key.Original: Once you think you have a shot on the sentries, order your men to open fire. Out.
Key.Chinese: 假如你一認為你有機會對守衛進行開火，就請你對你的隊員下達開火的命令。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你一认为你有机会对守卫进行开火，就请你对你的队员下达开火的命令。通话完毕。

Container.name: 95_outpostLastStand
Container.situation: hq requests all teams to make a last stand against the enemy offensive in order for the truck to be filled with supplies

Key.Original: All teams, enemy units advancing on your position.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，敵人正在向你們的位置靠近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各组都有，敌人正在向你们的位置靠近。

Key.Original: Make a stand - hold them off until we have secured the supplies. Out.
Key.Chinese: 堅守住-拖延他們直到我們的補給卡車準備好。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚守住—拖延他们直到我们的补给卡车准备好。通话完毕。

Container.name: 90_friniLeaveGroup
Container.situation: kerry tells his units they need to leave frini and get back to the outpost asap

Key.Original: Guys, we've gotta move back to the outpost, let's go!
Key.Chinese: 大夥，我們必須返回前哨了，我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 大伙，我们必须返回前哨了，我们走！

Container.name: 85_friniLeave
Container.participants: EPB B Miller;EPB I Stavrou;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: miller intervenes and reports unusual enemy movement in direction of frini

Key.Original: Copy that, we're moving now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，我們在路上了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们在路上了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Slingshot, this is Falcon.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，這裡是"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，这里是"猎鹰"。

Key.Original: At least one mechanized unit reaching Frini in 60 seconds. What's going on there?
Key.Chinese: 至少有一支機械化小隊將在60秒後抵達夫里尼。那邊的狀況怎樣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 至少有一支机械化部队将在60秒后抵达夫里尼。那边的状况怎样？

Key.Original: Shit! Omega, get out of there, return to the Outpost ASAP!
Key.Chinese: 該死!"歐米加"，趕快離開那裡，盡快返回前哨!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！"欧米加"，赶快离开那里，尽快返回前哨！

Container.name: 80_mortarDestroyed
Container.situation: kerry reports to hq that the mortar was neutralized

Key.Original: Slingshot, this is Omega. Mortar team neutralized. How copy?
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，這裡是"歐米加"。迫擊砲已殲滅。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，这里是"欧米加"。迫击炮已歼灭。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Great work. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好。请稍等。

Container.name: 75_friniReached
Container.situation: kerry tells his team members to be careful in the city and to look for the mortar

Key.Original: Okay, everyone, be careful. Move from cover to cover.
Key.Chinese: 好，所有人，請小心。利用掩體來移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，所有人，请小心。利用掩体来移动。

Key.Original: Keep your eyes and ears open for that mortar team!
Key.Chinese: 持續用你的眼睛與耳朵來找到迫擊砲!
Key.Chinesesimp: 用你的眼睛与耳朵来找到迫击炮！

Container.name: 70_mortarDestroyGroup
Container.situation: player tells his team about the mortar task assigned to them, that they will have to move into frini and search for the weapon

Key.Original: You heard it, guys: we need to neutralize that mortar. Let's move!
Key.Chinese: 你們都聽到了，兄弟們:我們必須殲滅掉那些迫擊砲。我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们都听到了，兄弟们：我们必须歼灭掉那些迫击炮。我们走！

Container.name: 65_mortarDestroy
Container.situation: player reports contact on the mortar in frini and hq orders him to take his team and neutralize the mortar

Key.Original: Slingshot, mortar spotted in Frini. Over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，我們在夫里尼發現到迫擊砲。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，我们在夫里尼发现迫击炮。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, Slingshot. Omega is moving. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"彈弓"。"歐米加"正在移動了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"弹弓"。"欧米加"正在移动了。完毕。

Key.Original: Okay. Listen carefully, Omega, we cannot afford to get pinned down.
Key.Chinese: 好。仔細聽好了，"歐米加"，我們不能忍受一直被轟炸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。仔细听好了，"欧米加"，我们不能忍受一直被轰炸。

Key.Original: We need take out that mortar - hit and run - move quickly.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須幹掉那些迫擊砲-打帶跑-快速做掉他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须干掉那些迫击炮—打完就跑—快速做掉他们。

Key.Original: Gamma, Sigma, hold your position at the outpost.
Key.Chinese: "伽馬"，"西格瑪"，堅守你們在前哨的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: "伽马"，"西格玛"，坚守你们在前哨的位置。

Key.Original: Kappa, finish loading up whatever supplies you can. Out.
Key.Chinese: "卡帕"，盡你所能的趕快裝載物資。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡帕"，尽你所能赶快装载物资。通话完毕。

Container.name: 60_mortarDetected
Container.situation: player shouts on the radio about incoming mortar round, after hearing the mortar round still on the air

Key.Original: Everyone take cover! We've got incoming!
Key.Chinese: 所有人找掩護!我們遭受砲擊了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有人找掩护！我们遭受炮击了！

Key.Original: Goddammit!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的！

Key.Original: Okay, Omega, try to find out the position of that mortar. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好的，"歐米加"，試著找到這些迫擊砲的位置。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，"欧米加"，试着找到这些迫击炮的位置。通话完毕。

Container.name: 55_deltaArrives
Container.participants: EPB I Stavrou;EPB I Guerrilla C;
Container.situation: truck driver let's all teams know he just arrived at the outpost and will start to put the supplies on the truck, while other defend the outpost

Key.Original: Kappa in position, starting to fill the truck. Over.
Key.Chinese: "卡帕"就定位了，開始裝運物資。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡帕"就位了，开始装运物资。完毕。

Key.Original: Good. Just remember: we don't have much time. Out.
Key.Chinese: 很好。但請記住:我們沒有很多時間。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。但请记住：我们没有很多时间。通话完毕。

Container.name: 50_deltaMoveIn
Container.participants: EPB I Stavrou;EPB I Guerrilla C;
Container.situation: hq orders the truck driver to move into the outpost, other teams will cover him

Key.Original: Okay, we're on our way now. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解，我們在路上了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，我们在路上了。完毕。

Key.Original: Kappa, the outpost is ours. Move in and load up, understood? Over.
Key.Chinese: "卡帕"，前哨已經是我們的了。開始進入並進行裝運，了解嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡帕"，前哨站已经是我们的了。开始进入并进行装运，了解吗？完毕。

Key.Original: All teams, the truck will be there shortly - cover them while they load the supplies. Out.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，卡車一下就會抵達那邊-掩護他們裝運物資。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各组都有，卡车一下就会抵达那边—掩护他们装运物资。通话完毕。

Container.name: 45_outpostSecure
Container.situation: kerry reports to hq that the teams now have control over the outpost

Key.Original: Slingshot, this is Omega. We now control the outpost. How copy?
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，這裡是"歐米加"。我們已經控制住前哨了。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，这里是"欧米加"。我们已经控制住前哨了。有收到吗？

Key.Original: All teams, great work! Stand by.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，幹的好!請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各组都有，干的好！请稍等。

Container.name: 40_outpostReport
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: teams discuss with each other that the outpost seems clear, but kerry stays alert, giving sense of professionalism comparing to the guerrillas

Key.Original: This place seems clear.
Key.Chinese: 這區看來已經安全了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这区看来已经安全了。

Key.Original: Good job, guys, it's ours!
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，夥伴，它是我們的了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，伙伴，它是我们的了！

Key.Original: All teams, spread out. Search and verify the buildings.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，開始展開隊形。搜尋並確認建築物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各组都有，开始展开队形。搜寻并确认建筑物。

Key.Original: Let's first make sure this place is actually clear.
Key.Chinese: 讓我們先確定這裡是真的安全了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我们先确定这里是真的安全了。

Container.name: 30_outpostAttackGroup
Container.situation: kerry tells his team members to follow him and attack the outpost

Key.Original: You heard it guys, let's move!
Key.Chinese: 大夥你們都聽到了，我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 大伙你们都听到了，我们走！

Container.name: 25_outpostAttack
Container.situation: hq gives the go signal for the teams to charge the outpost

Key.Original: Machine gunners, lay down suppressive fire on the outpost.
Key.Chinese: 機槍手，開始向前哨進行火力壓制。
Key.Chinesesimp: 机枪手，开始向前哨站进行火力压制。

Key.Original: All teams, move in, I say again, move in! Seize that position! Godspeed, brothers. Out.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，開始前進，我重複一遍，開始前進!肅清前哨!祝好運，兄弟們。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各组都有，开始前进，我重复一遍，开始前进！肃清前哨！祝好运，兄弟们。通话完毕。

Container.name: 20_guardsDead
Container.situation: kerry reports that the guards were successfully neutralized

Key.Original: Slingshot, targets down. Over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，目標倒下。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，目标倒下。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, good job Omega.
Key.Chinese: 收到，幹的好"歐米加"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，干的好"欧米加"。

Container.name: 15_engage
Container.situation: kerry tell his team members to get ready to engage on his order

Key.Original: Okay. Get set to engage those targets on my order!
Key.Chinese: 好的。大家聽我命令，準備開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。大家听我命令，准备开火！

Container.name: 13_Go
Container.situation: last details about how to proceed with the operation are laid down, kerry is ordered to neutralize the visible targets in the outpost

Key.Original: Omega - make it fast - light them up. Out.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"-手段俐落點-開火吧。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"-利落点—开火吧。通话完毕。

Container.name: 120_supplyTruckProtected
Container.situation: stavrou felicitates all the teams for the amazing effort protecting the truck

Key.Original: Everyone, good work protecting the truck.
Key.Chinese: 所有人，你們在保護卡車的這件事上都幹得不錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有人，你们在保护卡车的这件事上都干得不错。

Container.name: 115_suppliesReady
Container.participants: EPB I Stavrou;EPB I Guerrilla C;
Container.situation: truck driver reports that all the supplies are ready to be moved back to the forest

Key.Original: Kappa here, we're ready. Load is secure. Over.
Key.Chinese: "卡帕"在這，我們準備好了。貨物都已經上車。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡帕"呼叫，我们准备好了。货物都已经上车。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Container.name: 110_suppliesSitrep
Container.participants: EPB I Stavrou;EPB I Guerrilla C;
Container.situation: hq requests sitrep from the truck driver about the supplies

Key.Original: We're almost ready. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們幾乎快好了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们几乎快好了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Kappa, what the hell? Report! We can't wait any longer. Over.
Key.Chinese: "卡帕"，搞什麼鬼?請回報!我們不能再繼續等下去了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡帕"，搞什么鬼？请回报！我们不能再继续等下去了。完毕。

Container.name: 10_plan
Container.situation: last details about how to proceed with the operation are laid down, kerry is ordered to neutralize the visible targets in the outpost

Key.Original: Once Omega neutralizes those targets, I want everyone ready to move in.
Key.Chinese: 等到Omega殲滅掉那些目標，我要你們每一個人準備開始移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦"欧米加"歼灭掉那些目标，我要你们全体开始突击。

Key.Original: Kappa, hold position with the truck until the outpost is ours.
Key.Chinese: "卡帕"，你跟卡車留在原地，等到前哨是我們的你再進來。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡帕"，你跟卡车留在原地，等到我们控制了前哨站你再进来。

Container.name: 105_outpostIsImpossible
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;EPB I Guerrilla C;EPB I Stavrou;
Container.situation: discussion of the fighting teams about how impossible it is to hold the outpost any longer

Key.Original: We need to get out of here, guys, what's the status?
Key.Chinese: 大夥，我們必須離開這裡了，大家狀況如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 大伙，我们必须离开这里了，大家状况如何？

Container.name: 100_outpostIsHot
Container.situation: discussion of the fighting teams about how bad the situation is becoming, outpost is not sustainable

Key.Original: We're not gonna be able to hold this position much longer.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經沒法再繼續守住這裡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经没法再继续守住这里了。

Container.name: 05_engagePrepare
Container.situation: player let's his team members know they will be engaging the targets in the outpost and that there is no room for failure

Key.Original: Get ready. We go loud on Stavrou's mark.
Key.Chinese: 準備好了。Stavrou一下令我們就開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备好了。斯塔夫鲁一下令我们就开火。

Container.name: 00_sitrep
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;EPB I Guerrilla C;EPB I Stavrou;
Container.situation: all involved groups give a quick situation report to stavrou

Key.Original: Gamma here, in position.
Key.Chinese: "伽馬"在這，就定位了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "伽马"在这，就定位了。

Key.Original: Sigma ready for orders.
Key.Chinese: "西格瑪"正在等待命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: "西格玛"正在等待命令。

Key.Original: All call-signs, report in! Over.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，請回報狀況!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，请回报状况！完毕。

Key.Original: Slingshot, Kappa is waiting in position with the truck.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，"卡帕"與卡車正在出發點等待中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，"卡帕"与卡车正在出发点等待中。

Key.Original: Omega standing by.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"準備好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"准备好了。

Key.Original: We've got eyes on two sentries over-watching our attack vector. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們發現到有兩個哨兵正在觀察我們的攻擊方向。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们发现到有两个哨兵正在观察我们的攻击方向。完毕。

Key.Original: Assign targets; wait for the order. Wilco. Out.
Key.Chinese: 瞄準目標;等待開火命令。一切照辦。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 瞄准目标;等待开火命令。一切照办。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that. Omega, how does it look from there? Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。"歐米加"，你們那邊看過去怎樣?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。"欧米加"，你们那边看过去怎样？完毕。

Key.Original: Okay, understood.
Key.Chinese: 好的，了解了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，了解了。

Key.Original: Listen, we must neutralize those guards before we hit the base.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，在進攻基地前我們必須先幹掉那些哨兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，在进攻基地前我们必须先干掉那些哨兵。

Key.Original: Omega, target and prepare to engage those sentries. How copy?
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，瞄準並準備幹掉那兩個哨兵。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，瞄准并准备干掉那两个哨兵。有收到吗？

Key.Original: The guerrillas plan a hit and run attack on an AAF outpost.
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍準備對阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的前哨發動一場突襲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 反抗军准备对 AAF 的前哨站发动一场突袭。

Key.Original: Fall Back
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Neutralize Mortar
Key.Chinese: 殲滅迫擊砲
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭迫击炮

Key.Original: Retreat to the Forest
Key.Chinese: 撤退回森林
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退回森林

Key.Original: Stay Undetected
Key.Chinese: 保持不被發現
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持不被发现

Key.Original: INFILTRATE
Key.Chinese: 潛入
Key.Chinesesimp: 潜入

Key.Original: Avoid enemy contact en route to Miller's position.
Key.Chinese: 在前往米勒位置的路上，避免與敵人交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在前往米勒位置的路上，避免与敌人交战。

Key.Original: Meet CTRG
Key.Chinese: 與戰研大隊碰面
Key.Chinesesimp: 与战研大队碰面

Key.Original: RENDEZVOUS
Key.Chinese: 會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点

Key.Original: Meet the CTRG team at the beach and prepare to leave Altis.
Key.Chinese: 與戰研大隊在海灘碰面，並準備離開阿爾蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与战研大队在海滩碰面，并准备离开阿尔蒂斯。

Key.Original: Road Block
Key.Chinese: 路障
Key.Chinesesimp: 路障

Key.Original: Boats
Key.Chinese: 船
Key.Chinesesimp: 船

Key.Original: Stay Undetected
Key.Chinese: 保持不被發現
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持不被发现

Key.Original: Ok, quiet now; I have some important news to share with you all.%1%1Since his defection, Orestes has further briefed us on what he knows about the situation. Based on this information, we believe that one of our own - Nikos - is being held by the AAF on Stratis.%1%1I don’t need to tell you how important he is to our cause, brothers. Not only is he the lynchpin of our supply network, he’s the one man that truly unifies our cause. We plan to set him free.%1%1However, time is of the essence. Orestes believes that they will move Nikos deep into CSAT territory. It’s imperative we get to him before he’s taken beyond our reach.%1%1Right now, our British friend is putting together a plan to extract him and is finding the boats we will need to get to and from Stratis. We deeply appreciate this assistance.%1%1For now, we’ll wait for Miller’s signal and move to his position when the time is right.
Key.Chinese: 好的，請先安靜;我有一些重要的訊息要與你們分享。%1%1自從奧雷斯泰斯向我們投誠後，他就不斷的向我們分享他所知道的情況。基於他的情報，我們相信我們的戰友-尼科斯-被阿爾蒂斯武裝力量關在斯特拉蒂斯島上。%1%1我並不需要像你們特別說明，你們自己也明白，失去他對我們來說是有多麼大的打擊，各位弟兄。不只是因為他是我們供給網路的關鍵人物，更重要的，他是那個真正讓大家今天站在這裡的最大推手。我們計劃要去救他。%1%1然而，時間是不等人的。奧雷斯泰斯相信尼科斯即將要被轉移到廣協同盟的領地上。這任務是目前的當務之急，我們不能讓他離開到我們手不能及的地方。%1%1現在我們的英國朋友正在策畫要如何救出他，並且也在找一艘船來載我們去斯特拉蒂斯。我們很感謝他們的協助。%1%1目前，讓我們先等待米勒的信號，然後再去拯救我們的戰友出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，请先安静;我有一些重要的信息要与你们分享。%1%1自从奥雷斯泰斯向我们投诚后，他就不断的向我们分享他所知道的情况。基于他的情报，我们相信我们的战友—尼科斯—被 AAF 关在斯特拉蒂斯岛上。%1%1我并不需要特别强调他对我们的事业有多重要，弟兄们。不只是因为他是我们供给网络的关键人物，更重要的，他是让我们团结在一起的灵魂人物。我们计划要去救他。%1%1然而时间不等人。奥雷斯泰斯相信尼科斯即将要被转移到广协的控制区内。这任务是目前的当务之急，我们不能让他被转移到我们手不能及的地方。%1%1现在我们的英国朋友正在策划要如何救出他，并且也在找船来载我们去斯特拉蒂斯。我们很感谢他们的协助。%1%1目前，让我们先等待米勒的信号，然后再去拯救我们的战友出来。

Key.Original:
%3Omega%2 - You
%4Falcon%2 - Miller
CTRG are preparing %4the boats%2 that will take you to Stratis. Avoid detection and link up with them.
Key.Chinese: 戰研大隊準備了一艘%4船%2，準備要載你前往斯特拉蒂斯島。避免被發現並跟他們會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战研大队准备了一艘%4船%2，准备要载你前往斯特拉蒂斯岛。避免被发现并跟他们会合。

Key.Original:
1. Inserted near %3Athanos%2
2. Stay undetected
3. RV with Miller at %4the beach%2
Key.Chinese:
1. 潛入%3阿塔諾斯%2的附近
2. 保持不被發現
3. 與米勒在%4海灘%2邊會合
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 潜入%3阿塔诺斯%2附近
2. 保持不被发现
3. 与米勒在%4海滩%2边会合

Key.Original: Within Reach
Key.Chinese: 觸手可及
Key.Chinesesimp: 触手可及

Container.name: 20_endDetected
Container.situation: kerry meets miller at the beach, succeeding his mission but was detected by the enemy

Key.Original: For goodness sake, Kerry, did you have to bring the whole army with you?
Key.Chinese: 看在老天爺的份上，克里，你必要把他們的一整支軍隊都引到這邊來嘛?
Key.Chinesesimp: 看在老天爷的份上，克里，你有必要把他们的一整支军队都引来吗？

Key.Original: Quickly now, let's get to the boats.
Key.Chinese: 快點，讓我們趕快上船走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快点，让我们赶快上船走吧。

Container.name: 15_end
Container.situation: kerry meets miller at the beach, succeeding his mission

Key.Original: Oh, and there I was worried worried you wouldn't make it, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 喔，我還以為你沒法來了呢，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，我还以为你没法来了呢，克里。

Key.Original: Come on then, lets get to the boats.
Key.Chinese: 來吧，讓我們上船走了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧，让我们上船走吧。

Container.name: x15_detected
Container.situation: kerry takes to much time to meet miller and fails the mission

Key.Original: This is Falcon, where are you?
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"獵鷹"，你在哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"猎鹰"，你在哪里？

Key.Original: Look, we simply can't wait any longer - looks like you're staying. Out.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，我們不能在等了-看來你只好被留下來了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，我们不能再等了—看来你只好被留下来了。通话完毕。

Container.name: x10_detected
Container.situation: player reports to miller that he was detected by the enemy

Key.Original: Shit. Falcon, be advised, I've been spotted!
Key.Chinese: 該死。"獵鷹"，請注意，我已經被發現了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。"猎鹰"，请注意，我已经被发现了！

Key.Original: Understood. I'll do my best.
Key.Chinese: 了解。我盡我所能。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。我尽我所能。

Key.Original: ... Just don't lead them here - don't expose our boats - lose them first.
Key.Chinese: ...你只不要把他們帶到這邊就好了-不要暴露我們船的位置-先甩開他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...你只不要把他们带到这边就好了—不要暴露我们船的位置—先甩开他们。

Container.name: x05_millerInsatisfied
Container.situation: miller shows his in-satisfaction about previous mission

Key.Original: Understood, Falcon. Appreciate the heads up. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解了，Falcon。感謝提醒。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解了，"猎鹰"。感谢提醒。通话完毕。

Key.Original: This is Falcon, be advised, there's a CSAT team searching this village.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"獵鷹"，請注意，這裡目前有一支廣協同盟小隊在搜索村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"猎鹰"，请注意，这里目前有一支广协小组在搜索村庄。

Key.Original: If we'd taken our chance to cut our enemy's head off - they might be a little less organized now.
Key.Chinese: 假如我們能幹掉他們的領隊-他們對我們的威脅或許會比較少。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如我们能干掉他们的领队—或许能稍微降低他们的组织程度。

Key.Original: Just be careful - don't blow this operation.
Key.Chinese: 但請務必小心-不要搞砸了整個任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但请务必小心—不要搞砸了整个任务。

Container.name: x00_insertionFar
Container.situation: atv driver tells kerry why he cant take him to miller, and why they are still very far from his position

Key.Original: Here we are.
Key.Chinese: 我們到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们到了。

Key.Original: Sorry I can't take you any further, American, I'm running low on fuel - we still haven't managed to find any more.
Key.Chinese: 很抱歉我不能再把你送更遠了，美國佬，我的油快要用完了-我們目前還沒法弄到足夠多的油。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很抱歉我不能再把你送更远了，美国佬，我的油快要用完了—我们目前还没法弄到足够多的油。

Container.name: i00_stayUndetected
Container.situation: kerry is told how to effectively stay undetected from the enemy

Key.Original: Thanks for the advice Falcon.
Key.Chinese: 感謝你的建議Falcon。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢你的建议"猎鹰"。

Key.Original: Kerry, the enemy is not yet aware of your presence, or ours. It needs to stay that way.
Key.Chinese: 克里，敵人並不知道你跟我們的存在。你必須保持現況。
Key.Chinesesimp: "克里"，敌人并不知道你我的存在。你必须保持现况。

Key.Original: Make sure not to run in the open, the area is mostly abandoned by the population.
Key.Chinese: 確保不要跑到空曠地，這地方是個廢棄的村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确保不要跑到空旷地，这地方是个废弃的村庄。

Key.Original: So use the buildings, ridges and vegetation to stay hidden.
Key.Chinese: 所以請使用那些房屋或植被來隱藏你的行蹤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以请使用那些房屋或植被来隐藏你的行踪。

Key.Original: Yeah, right. Just make sure you don't compromise the operation, before we even start it. Out.
Key.Chinese: 恩，對阿。我只是確保你不會在任務開始前就把事情搞砸了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，对啊。我只是确保你不会在任务开始前就把事情搞砸了。通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_millerSatisfied
Container.situation: miller shows his satisfaction about previous mission

Key.Original: Okay. Eliminating that HVT should have given us an easier time getting off this island.
Key.Chinese: 好的。幹掉了那個高價值目標應該可以讓我們更容易地離開這座島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。干掉那个高价值目标应该可以让我们更容易地离开这座岛。

Key.Original: CSAT forces are scratching around like headless chickens for now. See you soon. Out.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟的部隊現在混亂的就像無頭雞一樣。期待見到你。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协部队现在混乱的就像无头鸡一样。期待见到你。通话完毕。

Container.name: 05_report
Container.situation: kerry reports to miller that he is on his way to his position

Key.Original: Falcon, I'm en route to your position now. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我正在前往你們位置的路上。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，我正在前往你们位置的路上。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 收到。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。请稍等。

Container.name: 00_insertionNear
Container.situation: driver lets kerry know why he can't take him to miller, enemy in the area

Key.Original: Okay, this is as far as it's safe to go.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我最遠就只能送你到這了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我最远就只能送你到这儿了。

Key.Original: Remember, we have reports of enemy movement in the area.
Key.Chinese: 請記住，有情報指出這片區域是有敵軍在活動的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请记住，有情报指出这片区域是有敌军在活动的。

Key.Original: Good luck on Stratis - bring our brother home.
Key.Chinese: 祝你在斯特拉蒂斯島上好運-帶我們的兄弟回家。
Key.Chinesesimp: 祝你在斯特拉蒂斯岛上好运—带我们的兄弟回家。

Key.Original: Kerry joins a small team bound for Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 克里加入一支將要前往斯特拉蒂斯島的小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里加入一支将要前往斯特拉蒂斯岛的小组。

Key.Original: Leave Stratis
Key.Chinese: 離開斯特拉蒂斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 离开斯特拉蒂斯

Key.Original: LEAVE
Key.Chinese: 離開
Key.Chinesesimp: 离开

Key.Original: Scuba dive to meet the extraction boat holding a position off the coast.
Key.Chinese: 使用潛水裝備前往撤離船隻的位置，他停在離岸邊有一段距離的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用潜水装备前往撤离船只的位置，他停在离岸边有一段距离的地方。

Key.Original: Extraction
Key.Chinese: 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离

Key.Original: EXTRACTION
Key.Chinese: 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离

Key.Original: Meet the extraction boat and leave Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 與撤離船隻碰面並離開斯特拉蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与撤离船只碰面并离开斯特拉蒂斯。

Key.Original: Scuba Equipment
Key.Chinese: 潛水裝備
Key.Chinesesimp: 潜水装备

Key.Original: EQUIPMENT
Key.Chinese: 裝備
Key.Chinesesimp: 装备

Key.Original: Use the Scuba diving equipment that the extraction unit left for your team.
Key.Chinese: 使用你小隊給你留下來的潛水裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用你小组给你留下来的潜水装备。

Key.Original: Create Distraction
Key.Chinese: 分散敵人的注意力
Key.Chinesesimp: 分散敌人的注意力

Key.Original: CHAOS
Key.Chinese: 分散注意力
Key.Chinesesimp: 分散注意力

Key.Original: Create as much chaos in your area of operation and force the enemy to divert assets south.
Key.Chinese: 在你的行動區域內大吵大鬧，使敵人分心，把部隊調往南邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在你的行动区域内制造混乱，使敌人把部队调往南边。

Key.Original: West
Key.Chinese: 西邊
Key.Chinesesimp: 西边

Key.Original: Insert from the west
Key.Chinese: 從西邊滲透
Key.Chinesesimp: 从西边渗透

Key.Original: South West
Key.Chinese: 西南邊
Key.Chinesesimp: 西南边

Key.Original: Insert from the south west
Key.Chinese: 從西南邊滲透
Key.Chinesesimp: 从西南边渗透

Key.Original: North West
Key.Chinese: 西北邊
Key.Chinesesimp: 西北

Key.Original: Insert from the north west
Key.Chinese: 從西北邊滲透
Key.Chinesesimp: 从西北渗透

Key.Original: East
Key.Chinese: 東邊
Key.Chinesesimp: 东边

Key.Original: Insert from the east
Key.Chinese: 從東邊滲透
Key.Chinesesimp: 从东边渗透

Key.Original: Weapons Depot
Key.Chinese: 武器倉庫
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器仓库

Key.Original: Stationary Chopper
Key.Chinese: 靜止的直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 静止的直升机

Key.Original: Road Block
Key.Chinese: 路障
Key.Chinesesimp: 路障

Key.Original: Lighthouse
Key.Chinese: 燈塔
Key.Chinesesimp: 灯塔

Key.Original: Camp
Key.Chinese: 營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 营地

Key.Original: Anti Air
Key.Chinese: 防空單位
Key.Chinesesimp: 防空单位

Key.Original: Enemy Camps
Key.Chinese: 敵軍營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军营地

Key.Original: Destroying Structures
Key.Chinese: 破壞建築物
Key.Chinesesimp: 破坏建筑物

Key.Original: Cause Chaos
Key.Chinese: 製造混亂
Key.Chinesesimp: 制造混乱

Key.Original: You successfully created enough chaos within your area of operation to force enemy units to divert south, enabling the CTRG team extract Nikos. However, you risked the entire operation by arriving late to the extraction point and were forced to swim to meet the extraction boat.
Key.Chinese: 你成功的製造了夠多的混亂，以至於敵方部隊被派往南方，這使得戰研大隊可以救出尼科斯。然而，你太晚抵達撤離點，以至於你必須用游泳的去找你的撤離船。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功的制造了够多的混乱，以至于敌方部队被派往南方，这使得战研大队可以救出尼科斯。然而，你太晚抵达撤离点，你不得不游泳去找你的撤离船。

Key.Original: You successfully created enough chaos within your area of operation to force enemy units to divert south, enabling the CTRG team to extract Nikos.
Key.Chinese: 你成功的製造了夠多的混亂，以至於敵方部隊被派往南方，這使得戰研大隊可以救出尼科斯尼科斯尼科斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功的制造了够多的混乱，以至于敌方部队被派往南方，这使得战研大队可以救出尼科斯。

Key.Original: You were not able to create enough chaos on the enemy area of operation. Nikos couldn't be extracted. This operation is a complete failure.
Key.Chinese: 你沒有製造出夠多的混亂。我們無法救出尼科斯尼科斯。這個行動被徹底的搞砸了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你没有制造出够多的混乱。我们无法救出尼科斯。这个行动被彻底搞砸了。

Key.Original: After discovering that %3Nikos%2 was being held in a AAF Stratis complex, %4Miller%2 has set up an operation to get him free from the AAF.%1%1The plan is for %4Miller's%2 team to rescue %3Nikos%2 personally, leaving us with the task of diverting the enemy attention from the complex where %3Nikos%2 is being held, in order for %4Miller%2 to go in and rescue %3Nikos%2 with the least problematic situations possible.%1%1Our window of operation should end in 45 minutes, at around 2025 hours is scheduled for Nikos to be transferred to the %5Airfield%2, we need to rescue him before this happens, otherwise, it will be impossible to get him back to safety.
Key.Chinese: 在我們發現%3尼科斯%2被阿爾蒂斯武裝力量囚禁在斯特拉蒂斯島上之後，%4米勒%2策劃了一場拯救行動。%1%1這行動主要是由%4米勒的小隊%2來拯救%3尼科斯尼科斯%2，把敵人放在%3尼科斯%2身上的注意力分散開來就是我們的工作了，為了使%4米勒%2拯救%3尼科斯%2的行動更為簡單。%1%1我們的任務時間只有45分鐘，在晚間20:25時刻尼科斯將被移動到%5機場去%2，我們必須在那之前救他出來，要不然，我們就沒法子把他弄回來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们发现%3尼科斯%2被 AAF 囚禁在斯特拉蒂斯岛上之后，%4米勒%2策划了一场拯救行动。%1%1这行动主要是由%4米勒的小组%2来拯救%3尼科斯%2，我们的任务则是分散敌人在%3尼科斯%2身上的注意力，为了使%4米勒%2拯救%3尼科斯%2的行动更为简单。%1%1我们的任务时间只有45分钟，在晚间20：25时刻尼科斯将被移动到%5机场%2去，我们必须在那之前救他出来，要不然我们就没法子把他弄回来了。

Key.Original:
Omega - Your team
Gamma - Insertion/Extraction unit
%4Falcon%2 - Miller's team
%3Stawman%2 - Nikos
Key.Chinese:
"歐米加"-你的小隊
"伽馬"-滲透/撤離單位
%4"獵鷹"%2-米勒的小隊
%3"稻草人"%2-尼科斯
Key.Chinesesimp:
"欧米加"-你的小组
"伽马"-渗透/撤离单位
%4"猎鹰"%2-米勒的小组
%3"稻草人"%2-尼科斯

Key.Original: Divert enemy attention by creating as much chaos you can in the %4south%2 to provide the CTRG team a window of opportunity in the %3north%2.
Key.Chinese: 藉由在%4南方%2製造混亂來分散敵人的注意力，好讓戰研大隊可以在%3北邊%2救出尼科斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 借由在%4南方%2制造混乱来分散敌人的注意力，让战研大队可以在%3北边%2救出尼科斯。

Key.Original:
1. Create %3chaos%2 in order to divert the enemy attention from the %4North%2.
2. Meet the extraction unit.
3. Leave Stratis.
Key.Chinese:
1. 製造%3混亂%2好來分散敵人在%4北邊%2的注意力。
2. 與撤離單位會合。
3. 離開斯特拉蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 制造%3混乱%2以分散敌人在%4北边%2的注意力。
2. 与撤离单位会合。
3. 离开斯特拉蒂斯。

Key.Original: Attention Deficit
Key.Chinese: 聲東擊西
Key.Chinesesimp: 声东击西

Container.name: 00_briefing
Container.situation: kerry selects insertion position and moves out

Key.Original: No, I got it. Let's do this.
Key.Chinese: 沒有，我都知道了。讓我們開始吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有，我都知道了。让我们开始吧。

Key.Original: Okay, listen up. This mission has two elements.
Key.Chinese: 好的，聽好了。這個任務將有兩個小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，听好了。这个任务将有两个分队。

Key.Original: A small force - led by me - will approach the location where Nikos - designated Strawman - is currently being held.
Key.Chinese: 較小的-由我領軍-我們將會靠近尼科斯-代號為"稻草人"-被扣押的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 较小的—由我带领—我们将会靠近尼科斯—代号为"稻草人"-被扣押的地方。

Key.Original: Now, we've ruled out a direct assault - there's simply too much enemy activity in the area.
Key.Chinese: 現在，我們已經排除了直接攻擊的這個選項-因為這裡有太多的敵軍在區域內活動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，我们已经排除了直接攻击的这个选项—因为有太多的敌军在区域内活动。

Key.Original: That's where you come in, Kerry. Your team's objective is to draw enemy forces south.
Key.Chinese: 然後我們就需要你了，克里。你小隊的任務是要負責把敵人的注意力吸到南方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然后我们就需要你了，克里。你小组的任务是把敌人的注意力吸到南方。

Key.Original: This should give us a fighting chance to get in, grab Nikos, and get out.
Key.Chinese: 這將使我們有機會救出並帶回尼科斯，然後離開這邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这将使我们有机会救出并带回尼科斯，然后离开。

Key.Original: We should have a window of 45 minutes before Nikos is moved, so keep that in mind.
Key.Chinese: 我們在尼克斯被轉移前有45分鐘的時間，所以請抓緊時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在尼科斯被转移前有45分钟的时间，所以请抓紧时间。

Key.Original: Any questions?
Key.Chinese: 有任何問題嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有任何问题吗？

Container.name: x10_timeoutWarning
Container.situation: kerry is warned by miller that his window to cause chaos is closing

Key.Original: We're on it, Falcon. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們在做了，"獵鷹"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在做了，"猎鹰"。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Look, we don't have much more time here.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，我們這裡的時間已經所剩不多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，我们这里的时间已经所剩不多。

Key.Original: Do what you can to pull enemy forces south. Over.
Key.Chinese: 盡你所能的把敵軍的部隊往南拉。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽你所能的把敌军的部队往南拉。完毕。

Container.name: x30_extractMeetingComplete
Container.situation: kerry and his team are able to meet the extraction boat away from the island and the boat driver tells him his position in relation to kerry's position

Key.Original: Shit, man, I'm glad you made it. Now let's get the fuck out out of here.
Key.Chinese: 天啊，兄弟，真高興看到你辦到了。現在讓我們離開這個鬼地方吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊，兄弟，真高兴看到你办到了。现在让我们离开这个鬼地方吧。

Container.name: x25_extractionFailure
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: boat driver leaves the extraction position and requests kerry to meet him away from the coast, using the scuba equipment left behind by him

Key.Original: Shit. I cannot wait any longer - I need to move. Over.
Key.Chinese: 幹。我真的不能再等了-我要走了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 操。我真的不能再等了—我要走了。完毕。

Key.Original: I cannot hold this position any longer! Look, I'm leaving diving equipment behind. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我真的已經沒法再待在這邊了!聽著，我有留下潛水裝備在這邊。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我真的已经没法再待在这边了！听着，我会在这儿留下潜水装备。完毕。

Key.Original: Get geared up and meet me away from the coast. I am sorry about this. Good luck. Out.
Key.Chinese: 穿上它然後游到遠離岸邊的位置來找我。我很抱歉會發生這種事。祝好運。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 穿上它然后游到远离岸边的位置来找我。对此我很遗憾。祝好运。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Dammit, Gamma, don't leave us behind - we're on the way. Over.
Key.Chinese: 該死，"伽馬"，不要留下我們-我們在路上了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，"伽马"，别丢下我们—我们在路上了。完毕。

Container.name: x20_extractionWarning
Container.situation: boat driver requests kerry to move faster because he won't be able to hold that position for much longer

Key.Original: Come on, guys, you have to move it!
Key.Chinese: 快點，兄弟，你們必須快點兒!
Key.Chinesesimp: 快点，兄弟，你们必须快点儿！

Key.Original: I have multiple contacts here - I won't be able to hold this position much longer. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我這裡已經看到了多名目標-我沒辦法在這裡繼續多待了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这里已经看到了多名目标—我没办法在这里继续多待了。完毕。

Container.name: x15_timeoutFailure
Container.situation: kerry fails the mission by not being able to cause enough chaos in time

Key.Original: Kerry, you guys have really blown this - Strawman is being moved as we speak.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你們搞砸了任務-"Strawman"在我們說話的同時已經被轉移走了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你们搞砸了任务-"稻草人"此时此刻已经被转移走了。

Key.Original: Prep to leave the island. Out.
Key.Chinese: 請準備離開這座島吧。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请准备离开这座岛吧。通话完毕。

Container.name: x05_lighthouse
Container.situation: miller sees the lighthouse being destroyed and felicitates the player for the idea

Key.Original: Uh, that's affirmative, Falcon.
Key.Chinese: 呃，這是真的，"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，是这样没错，"猎鹰"。

Key.Original: Are you kidding me? You lads took down the lighthouse?
Key.Chinese: 你不是在跟我開玩笑吧?你破壞了燈塔?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不是在跟我开玩笑吧？你们破坏了灯塔？

Key.Original: Fine work. That's certainly one way to get their attention.
Key.Chinese: 幹的棒極了。這也是吸引他們注意力的一種方法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的棒极了。这也是吸引他们注意力的一种方法。

Container.name: x03_position3
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: kerry orders the boat driver to move

Key.Original: Got it. Moving.
Key.Chinese: 了解。開始移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。开始移动。

Key.Original: Okay, we'll approach from the east.
Key.Chinese: 好，讓我們從東方靠近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，让我们从东方靠近。

Container.name: x02_position2
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: kerry orders the boat driver to move

Key.Original: Okay, let's move.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们走吧。

Key.Original: We're taking the south west insertion point.
Key.Chinese: 我們將從西南方滲透。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将从西南方渗透。

Container.name: x01_position1
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: kerry orders the boat driver to move

Key.Original: Copy that.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Key.Original: We're taking the western approach. Let's go.
Key.Chinese: 我們將從西方靠近。我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将从西方靠近。我们走吧。

Container.name: x00_selectionTimeout
Container.situation: miller orders kerry to move to some random position, he is taking too long to choose by himself

Key.Original: Come on, Corporal Kerry, expedite! Move out now.
Key.Chinese: 來吧，下士克里，加緊腳步!趕快行動了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧，克里下士，加紧脚步！赶快行动了。

Container.name: i10_instructorDestroyPointsOfInterest
Container.situation: kerry is told that destroying island structures that have a big silhouette will help making the enemy aware of something going on, on the south

Key.Original: Kerry, bringing down bigger structures may be a good way to feign a bigger attack. Keep it in mind. Out.
Key.Chinese: 克里，弄壞更大的建築物，能假裝出像是大部隊的攻擊行動。你好好記住這點。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，弄坏更大的建筑物，能假装出像是大部队的攻击行动。你好好记住这点。通话完毕。

Container.name: i05_instructorCamps
Container.situation: kerry is told how he should attack the enemy positions, effectivly

Key.Original: Try to hit and run. Make them think something big is going down in the south.
Key.Chinese: 請試著打帶跑。讓他們以為南方遭受了巨大的攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请试着打完就跑。让他们以为南方遭受了大规模攻击。

Key.Original: Strike enemy camps and small bases quickly; just don't get pinned down. Out.
Key.Chinese: 快速攻擊敵人的營地與基地;請記得不要被壓制了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快速攻击敌人的营地与基地;请记得不要被压制了。通话完毕。

Container.name: i00_instructorChaos
Container.situation: kerry is told how chaos actually work

Key.Original: Make sure to attack enemy camps and raid areas of enemy activity.
Key.Chinese: 請確保攻擊敵人的營地和該區域在活動的敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请确保攻击敌人的营地和该区域在活动的敌人。

Key.Original: Remember, try to confuse the enemy - create a mess so that they have to send more forces south. Out.
Key.Chinese: 請記住，試著迷惑敵人-創造更多的麻煩，以至於他們必須派遣軍隊到南方查看。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请记住，试着迷惑敌人—创造更多的麻烦，以至于他们必须派遣军队到南方查看。通话完毕。

Container.name: 70_extractComplete
Container.situation: boat driver tells kerry his position, they are very close to each other at this point

Key.Original: Hey! Over here! Let's get to the boat.
Key.Chinese: 嘿!在這邊!讓我們趕快上船吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿！在这边！让我们赶快上船吧。

Container.name: 65_nikosSecure
Container.situation: miller rescues nikos and lets kerry know they are now leaving the island

Key.Original: All teams, Strawman is secure. Exfiltrating now.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，"稻草人"已經成功救回。撤離中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各组都有，"稻草人"已经成功救回。撤离中。

Key.Original: Sterling work, gentlemen. Now, let's get off of this rock.
Key.Chinese: 各位都幹得非常好。現在，讓我們離開這個鳥不生蛋的地方吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各位都干得非常好。现在，让我们离开这个鸟不拉屎的地方吧。

Container.name: 60_extract
Container.situation: boat driver reaches the extraction position and let's kerry know about it

Key.Original: This is Gamma, I'm in position, waiting for you guys. Out.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"伽馬"，我就定位了，正在等待你們。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"伽马"，我就位了，正在等待你们。通话完毕。

Container.name: 55_chaosThreshold
Container.participants: EPB B Miller;EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: miller let's kerry know that the chaos threshold was reached and felicitates him

Key.Original: Understood. Moving to the extraction point. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。正在移動到撤離點。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。正在移动到撤离点。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Falcon. Gamma, we need extraction ASAP. Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"獵鷹"。"伽馬"，我們需要盡快撤離。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"猎鹰"。"伽马"，我们需要尽快撤离。完毕。

Key.Original: Alright, you lads have managed it, but watch yourselves, there's a small army headed your way.
Key.Chinese: 好的，你們成功了，但請小心，有一支小軍隊正在向你們靠近中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，你们成功了，但请小心，有一支小军队正在向你们靠近中。

Key.Original: Get the hell out of there, we're moving on Strawman now. Over.
Key.Chinese: 趕快離開這鬼地方吧，我們要去救Strawman了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 赶快离开这鬼地方吧，我们要去救"稻草人"了。完毕。

Container.name: 50_chaosThreeQuarters
Container.situation: miller let's kerry know that three quarters of the chaos threshold was reached

Key.Original: Copy that. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Update: Definite activity now, enemy movement increased.
Key.Chinese: 狀況更新:明確的活動正在增加，敵人開始加速移動了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 状况更新：绝对有动作，敌人机动开始频繁了。

Key.Original: Looks like they're briefing for something now. Not much longer.
Key.Chinese: 看來他們正在簡報些東西。我們離成功不遠了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来他们正在简报些东西。我们离成功不远了。

Container.name: 45_chaosTwoQuarters
Container.situation: miller let's kerry know that a half of the chaos threshold was reached

Key.Original: Copy that, Falcon, thanks for the heads up. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"獵鷹"，感謝你的提醒。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"猎鹰"，感谢你的提醒。通话完毕。

Key.Original: I don't know what your team just did, but it's working.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道你們幹了些什麼，但它有效果了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道你们干了些什么，但它有效果了。

Key.Original: Just watch out, you have an armed vehicle inbound.
Key.Chinese: 請小心，將有武裝載具前往你們那邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请小心，将有武装车辆前往你们那边。

Key.Original: Keep up the pressure - we almost have our window here. Over.
Key.Chinese: 請繼續對他們施加壓力-我們這邊快可以執行任務了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请继续对他们施加压力—我们这边快可以执行任务了。完毕。

Container.name: 40_chaosOneQuarter
Container.situation: miller let's kerry know that a quarter of the chaos threshold was reached

Key.Original: Copy that, Falcon. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"獵鷹"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"猎鹰"。通话完毕。

Key.Original: We've started to see some activity here at the camp. Maintain this pressure.
Key.Chinese: 我們這邊的營地開始有些動靜了。請保持下去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们这边的营地开始有些动静了。请保持下去。

Container.name: 35_firstContact
Container.situation: kerry reports to miller that his team just had enemy contact

Key.Original: Falcon, we've made contact. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我們已經交戰了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，我们已经接敌。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, but it's not yet enough - we see no reaction here at Tempest.
Key.Chinese: 了解，不過這還不夠-我們在坦皮斯特這邊沒有看見任何反應。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，不过这还不够—我们在坦皮斯特这边没有看见任何反应。

Container.name: 30_goLoud
Container.situation: kerry explains the plan to his team members

Key.Original: Okay, remember we're here to create a distraction.
Key.Chinese: 好的，請記住我們是要來讓敵人分心的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，请记住我们是要来让敌人分心的。

Key.Original: We need to go loud, strike fast, and await confirmation.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須搞出點聲音，狠狠打擊，然後等待確認。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须搞出点声音，狠狠打击，然后等待确认。

Key.Original: Falcon will only move on Strawman once it's clear.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"只會等到我們這邊成功時才會動身去救Strawman。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"只会等到我们这边成功时才会动身去救"稻草人"。

Container.name: 25_reportArrival
Container.situation: kerry reports his landing on stratis to miller

Key.Original: Falcon, we've just made our insertion; proceeding with the operation. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我們已經抵達了我們的滲透點;開始執行任務。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，我们已经抵达了我们的渗透点;开始执行任务。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that. Make some noise. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。盡情大吵大鬧吧。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。尽情制造动静吧。通话完毕。

Container.name: 20_goodLuck
Container.situation: boat driver wishes good luck to kerry and his team

Key.Original: We're here. Godspeed.
Key.Chinese: 我們到了。祝你們一路順風。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们到了。祝你们一路顺风。

Container.name: 15_quickBriefing2
Container.situation: miller lais down the main plan for the mission

Key.Original: Update: we have a visual on Strawman. Verified sighting.
Key.Chinese: 狀況更新:我們已經看到了"稻草人"。確認是他沒錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 状况更新：我们已经看到了"稻草人"。确认是他没错。

Container.name: 10_quickBriefing1
Container.situation: quick briefing from miller

Key.Original: Be advised, we're approaching Tempest.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，我們正在接近坦皮斯特。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，我们正在接近坦皮斯特。

Key.Original: Multiple contacts; vehicles and infantry. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 有多名目標;載具以及步兵。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有多名目标;车辆以及步兵。请稍等。

Container.name: 05_reportLanding
Container.situation: kerry reports to miller that they are reaching stratis coast

Key.Original: Falcon, we've arrived at the coast. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我們抵達海岸邊了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，我们抵达海岸边了。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。通话完毕。

Container.name: 04_slowDownBoat
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: kerry tells the boat driver to slow down, so they are not detected on their way in to the beach

Key.Original: Understood, nice and quiet.
Key.Chinese: 了解，會很安靜的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，会很安静的。

Key.Original: Ok, slow it down, we want to make a smooth landing without being detected.
Key.Chinese: 好的，慢下來，我們來做個軟登陸，不要被敵人發現了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，慢下来，我们来做个软登陆，不要被敌人发现了。

Container.name: 03_position0
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: kerry orders the boat driver to move

Key.Original: Copy that.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Key.Original: We're taking the northwest route. Let's move.
Key.Chinese: 我們去西北方的路線吧。我們走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们去西北方的路线吧。我们走。

Container.name: 02_selectLocation
Container.situation: miller tells kerry to select the position of him landing, through stratigic map

Key.Original: Got it.
Key.Chinese: 知道了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了。

Key.Original: Kerry, this is where we split up.
Key.Chinese: 克里，我們必須在這裡分開了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我们必须在这里分开了。

Key.Original: You're in charge of your team now. Pick a good insertion position and move in.
Key.Chinese: 你從現在開始接管你的小隊。選擇一個滲透點並登陸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你从现在开始接管你的小组。选择一个渗透点并登陆。

Container.name: 01_stopBoats
Container.situation: miller orders boats to stop

Key.Original: Alright, stop the boats.
Key.Chinese: 好的，停下船。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，停下船。

Key.Original: CTRG lead an operation to extract Nikos from Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 與戰研大隊一同從斯特拉蒂斯島上救出尼科斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与战研大队一同从斯特拉蒂斯岛上救出尼科斯。

Key.Original: RTB
Key.Chinese: 返回
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回

Key.Original: Get to Hideout
Key.Chinese: 前往藏身處
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往藏身处

Key.Original: Get to the %2hideout%1 to finish the mission.
Key.Chinese: 前往%2藏身處%1來結束這個任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往%2藏身处%1来结束这个任务。

Key.Original: ELIMINATE
Key.Chinese: 殲滅
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭

Key.Original: Eliminate HVT
Key.Chinese: 殲滅高價值目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭高价值目标

Key.Original: With the cistern out of the picture, the only thing you can do to save this mission from total disaster is to try to eliminate the HVT on your own. Time to adapt.
Key.Chinese: 隨著你把油料車交給了反抗軍，想要挽救這個快要失敗的任務，就只有靠你自己去殲滅高價值目標了。是時候該適應了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着油料车的损坏，你能从完全灾难中拯救这一任务的唯一方法就只有靠你自己去歼灭高价值目标了。是时候该适应了。

Key.Original: LEAVE THE CISTERN HERE
Key.Chinese: 在這裡留下油料車
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这里留下油料车

Key.Original: Divert Fuel
Key.Chinese: 轉讓油料車
Key.Chinesesimp: 转让油料车

Key.Original: If you hand over the cistern to %2Miller's man%1, he will use it to eliminate the high value target approaching your AO in a convoy.
Key.Chinese: 假如你將油料車交給%2米勒的人馬%1，他將使用它來殲滅掉正在靠近行動區域的高價值目標，他藏身在一個車隊裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你将油料车交给%2米勒的人马%1，他将使用它来歼灭掉正在靠近行动区域的车队中的高价值目标。

Key.Original: RTB
Key.Chinese: 返回
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回

Key.Original: Deliver Fuel
Key.Chinese: 運輸油料車
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输油料车

Key.Original: Take the cistern to our hideout.
Key.Chinese: 把油料車開到我們的藏身處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把油料车开到我们的藏身处。

Key.Original: STEAL
Key.Chinese: 偷竊
Key.Chinesesimp: 偷窃

Key.Original: Get a Full Cistern
Key.Chinese: 搞到一輛油料車
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞到一辆油料车

Key.Original: Our cistern is empty. We need to take the risk of assaulting a heavier guarded target. CSAT are storing some fuel on the %1construction site%2 near Alikampos. Go there and steal a cistern that actually has some fuel in it.
Key.Chinese: 我們原本的油料車已經被放空了。我們必須冒一點風險去攻擊防禦較森嚴的目標。廣協同盟儲存了一些油料在阿利卡姆波斯附近的%1工地%2中。想辦法偷倒一輛還有燃油的油料車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们原本的油料车已经被放空了。我们必须冒一点风险去攻击防御较森严的目标。广协在阿利卡姆波斯附近的%1工地%2中储存了一些油料。想办法偷到一辆还有燃油的油料车。

Key.Original: RETRIEVE CISTERN
Key.Chinese: 取回油料車
Key.Chinesesimp: 抢回油料车

Key.Original: Find the Cistern
Key.Chinese: 找到油料車
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到油料车

Key.Original: Retrieve our fuel truck, located in our former camp at the old %2industrial complex%1 south of Agios Dionysios.
Key.Chinese: 取回我們的油料車，它在聖迪奧尼西奧斯南方的一座%2老工業區%1內。
Key.Chinesesimp: 抢回我们的油料车，它在圣迪奥尼西奥斯南方的一座%2老工业区%1内。

Key.Original: ASSEMBLE
Key.Chinese: 整合
Key.Chinesesimp: 整合

Key.Original: Link Up (opt.)
Key.Chinese: 會合(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合（支线任务）

Key.Original: Link up with the rest of your team scattered in enemy territory - %3here%1 and %2here%1.
Key.Chinese: 與你在敵軍領土上分散的隊友會合-他們在%3這裡%1跟%2這裡%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与你在敌军领土上分散的队友会合—他们在%3这里%1跟%2这里%1。

Key.Original: Enter the AO
Key.Chinese: 進入行動區域
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入行动区域

Key.Original: In order to get to the AO, you'll have to cross the busy %2highway%1.
Key.Chinese: 要進入行動區域，你必須先跨越過一條繁忙的%2公路%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 要进入行动区域，你必须先跨越过一条繁忙的%2公路%1。

Key.Original: Highway
Key.Chinese: 公路
Key.Chinesesimp: 公路

Key.Original: Convoy Route
Key.Chinese: 車隊路線
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队路线

Key.Original: Hideout
Key.Chinese: 藏身處
Key.Chinesesimp: 藏身处

Key.Original: Cistern
Key.Chinese: 油料車
Key.Chinesesimp: 油料车

Key.Original: Team Kappa
Key.Chinese: "卡帕"小隊
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡帕"小组

Key.Original: Attacking the Complex
Key.Chinese: 攻擊工業區
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击工业区

Key.Original: Get out of the truck if you want to hand it over to Miller's team.
Key.Chinese: 假如你想將油料車交給米勒的小隊，那就請下車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你想将油料车交给米勒的小组，那就请下车。

Key.Original: Everyone's furious with you
Key.Chinese: 每個人都對你很生氣
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个人都对你很生气

Key.Original: The operation was a total disaster. You failed to deliver the fuel and the HVT got away.
Key.Chinese: 任務完全搞砸了。你不僅沒能運輸油料車，更讓高價值目標逃跑了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完全搞砸了。你不仅没能运输油料车，更让高价值目标逃跑了。

Key.Original: Cistern Destroyed
Key.Chinese: 油料車已毀
Key.Chinesesimp: 油料车已毁

Key.Original: The fuel is lost.
Key.Chinese: 我們失去油料車了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们失去油料车了。

Key.Original: You helped Miller eliminate his target. However, the FIA still remain very low on fuel.
Key.Chinese: 你幫助了米勒去殲滅掉他的目標。然而，FIA還是很缺乏燃油補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你帮助了米勒去歼灭他的目标。然而，FIA 还是很缺乏燃油补给。

Key.Original: You've decided that the FIA's need for the fuel were more important than Miller's.
Key.Chinese: 你已經決定了，那就是自由獨立同盟的需求更勝於米勒的任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你已经决定了，那就是 FIA 的需求更胜于米勒的任务。

Key.Original: FIA received the much needed fuel supplies. You've also eliminated a very important target all on your own. All in all, you did very well today.
Key.Chinese: 自由獨立同盟收到了久候多時的燃油補給。而且你也靠自己殲滅掉了高價值目標。你今天幹的真棒。
Key.Chinesesimp: FIA 收到了久候多时的燃油补给。而且你也靠自己歼灭掉了高价值目标。你今天干的真棒。

Key.Original: AAF and CSAT forces have stepped up their operations against us. It looks like the start of a significant, coordinated and ongoing effort. We need to be more mobile, able to move at a moment's notice. For that, we need fuel for our vehicles.%1However, as part of the recent offensive, several of our civilian supply trucks have been siezed. Several of them - including one of our fuel trucks - are being held at a small %3industrial complex%2 south of the %4Kavala highway%2, the main road from the airport to the old capital.%1We're asking Corporal Kerry here to lead a small team south of the road and raid the %3complex%2. We'll stash the vehicle in a %5safehouse%2 nearby until it's safe to move it again.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量與廣協同盟的部隊已經加緊腳步對我們進行打擊。看來他們一時半刻是不會停下腳步的。所以我們必須變得更機動-能在任何時刻移動到別的位置。要做到這點，我們的車必須要有油料。%1然而，由於敵人近幾次的進攻，我們擁有的幾輛民用補給卡車被他們扣押了。他們大部分都被收押在一座小工業區裡，其中包括了油料車，%3工業區%2在Kavala南方的公路上，這條%4公路%2連接著機場與前首都。%1我們請求下士Kerry帶領一支小隊潛入到道路的南方，並準備突襲%3工業區%2。我們將會把搶到的車藏匿到附近%5安全的地方%2，等到局勢安定下來再移動他。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 与广协部队已经加紧脚步对我们进行打击。看来他们一时半刻是不会停下脚步的。所以我们必须变得更机动—能在任何时刻移动到别的位置。要做到这点，我们的车必须要有油料。%1然而，由于敌人近几次的进攻，我们拥有的几辆民用补给卡车被他们扣押了。他们大部分都被收押在一座小工业区里，其中包括了油料车，%3工业区%2在卡瓦拉南方的高速公路上，这条%4公路%2连接着机场与前首都。%1我们要求克里下士带领一支小队潜入到道路的南方，并准备突袭%3工业区%2。我们将会把抢到的车藏匿到附近%5安全的地方%2，等到局势安定下来再移动他。

Key.Original: %2Omega%1 - Your team.%3%4Sigma%1 - Additional team you can link up with.%3%5Gamma%1 - Additional team you can link up with.%3Slingshot - Command.
Key.Chinese: %2"歐米加"%1-你的小隊。%3%4"西格瑪"%1-你可以與其會合的其他小隊。%3%5"伽馬"%1-你可以與其會合的其他小隊。%3"彈弓"-指揮官。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"欧米加"%1-你的小组。%3%4"西格玛"%1-你可以与其会合的其他小队。%3%5"伽马"%1-你可以与其会合的其他小队。%3"弹弓"-指挥官。

Key.Original: Locate our %3cistern%1 and safely deliver it to our %2hideout%1.
Key.Chinese: 找出我們的%3油料車%1並安全的送它到我們的%2藏身處%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找出我们的%3油料车%1并安全地送它到我们的%2藏身处%1。

Key.Original: Move south of the Kavala Highway.%3%5Find the %8cistern%1.%3%6Take the cistern to the %2hideout%1.
Key.Chinese: 移動到卡瓦拉公路的南方。%3%5尋找%8油料車%1。%3%6把油料車帶到我們的%2藏身處%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到卡瓦拉高速公路的南方。%3%5寻找%8油料车%1。%3%6把油料车带到我们的%2藏身处%1。

Key.Original: Bingo Fuel
Key.Chinese: 油料危機
Key.Chinesesimp: 燃料不足

Container.name: x20_Empty_Handed
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla C;
Container.situation: kerry returns to base without the cistern

Key.Original: Er, Kerry, where the hell is the cistern?
Key.Chinese: 呃，克里，那該死的油料車到底在哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，克里，那该死的油料车到底在哪里？

Key.Original: It's - uh - better if I explain face to face...
Key.Chinese: 這-呵-我最好當面講才比較說的清...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这—呵—我最好当面讲才比较说的清...

Container.name: x15_Miller_Impressed
Container.situation: kerry managed to kill the hvt on his own

Key.Original: Falcon, message. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，訊息。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，信息。完毕。

Key.Original: Your HVT is neutralized, over.
Key.Chinese: 你的高價值目標已經被殲滅了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的高价值目标已经被歼灭了，完毕。

Key.Original: We managed to take care of it on our own.
Key.Chinese: 我們成功的只靠我們就解決了目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们成功地只靠我们就解决了目标。

Key.Original: Receiving you, Omega, what do you want?
Key.Chinese: 收到了，"歐米加"，你想要什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到了，"欧米加"，你想要什么？

Key.Original: 'Opportunities like this sometimes require snap decisions'. Over.
Key.Chinese: '當機會出現時，現實總得變通一下'。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: '当机会出现时，现实总得变通一下'。完毕。

Key.Original: What on earth are you talking about, Omega?
Key.Chinese: 你究竟在說什麼，"歐米加"?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你究竟在说什么，"欧米加"？

Key.Original: Good lord. You might just make a decent soldier after all. Well done. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 好傢伙。你至少在最後還是做出了一個戰士該有的表現。幹的好。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好家伙。你至少在最后还是做出了一个士兵该有的表现。干的好。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: x10_Miller_Grateful
Container.situation: kerry decided to hand over the cistern to miller

Key.Original: Falcon, come in. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，接進。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，请回答。完毕。

Key.Original: Consequences? ... That's reassuring.
Key.Chinese: 承擔後果?...這還真令人欣慰阿。
Key.Chinesesimp: 承担后果？...这还真令人欣慰阿。

Key.Original: I hear you made the right choice; you won't regret it.
Key.Chinese: 我知道你做了正確的決定;你不會後悔的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道你做了正确的决定;你不会后悔的。

Key.Original: And don't worry, I'll deal with any consequences. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 還有別擔心，我會來承擔後果。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有别担心，我会来承担后果。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: x05_Cistern_Dead
Container.situation: the cistern kerry was supposed to steal was just destroyed

Key.Original: Oh, Jesus fuck, what now?
Key.Chinese: 喔，真是他媽的幹，現在該怎辦?
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，真是他妈的操，现在该怎办？

Key.Original: ... There's gotta be another way to stop that convoy.
Key.Chinese: ...應該還有其他的辦法來停止車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...应该还有其他的办法来阻止车队。

Container.name: x03_KappaOut
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla C;
Container.situation: kappa reports theyre pulling back

Key.Original: Omega, this is Kappa. We've done all we can - pulling back now. Over.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，這裡是"卡帕"。我們已經盡我們所能了-正在向後撤。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，这里是"卡帕"。我们已经尽我们所能了—正在向后撤。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood. Thanks for the assist. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。感謝你們的幫助。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。感谢你们的帮助。通话完毕。

Container.name: x01_Cistern_Dead_No_Matter
Container.situation: the empty cistern is destroyed (kerry doesn't know it was empty)

Key.Original: No, no, no! Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 不，不，不!幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，不，不！操！

Key.Original: Slingshot, Omega here. The cistern, I - it's done for - I'm sorry ... What now, over?
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，"歐米加"在這。油料車，它-它被毀了-我很抱歉...現在該怎辦，完畢?
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，"欧米加"呼叫。油料车，它—它被毁了—我很抱歉...现在该怎办，完毕？

Key.Original: Ah, typical American. Wait for new orders, Omega. Out.
Key.Chinese: 啊，典型的美國佬。請等待更進一步的命令，"歐米加"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，典型的美国佬。请等待更进一步的命令，"欧米加"。通话完毕。

Container.name: i05_Attacking_Complex_2
Container.situation: stavrou gives kerry some advice on attacking the second complex

Key.Original: If you call in team Kappa, you will have fewer guards to worry about before you approach your objective.
Key.Chinese: 假如你呼叫了"卡帕"小隊，在你靠近目標前將會遇到比較少的障礙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你呼叫了"卡帕"小组，在你靠近目标前将会遇到比较少的障碍。

Key.Original: Kappa's job is to hit and run - to give you a window of opportunity.
Key.Chinese: "卡帕"要做的是打帶跑-來提供一個機會給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡帕"要做的是打完就跑—来提供一个机会给你。

Key.Original: Get in and take the cistern. Don't stay there any longer than necessary - it's not up to you to seize that site.
Key.Chinese: 進去找到油料車。沒必要的話就不要久留-你目前的力量是無法肅清該區的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进去找到油料车。没必要的话就不要久留—你目前的力量是无法肃清该区的。

Key.Original: Godspeed to you all. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 祝你們好運。"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 祝你们好运。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Container.name: i01_Attacking_Complex_1
Container.situation: stavrou gives kerry some advice on attacking the first complex

Key.Original: Kerry, we don't have a lot of intel about the AAF garrison in the complex.
Key.Chinese: 克里，我沒有更多關於阿爾蒂斯武裝力量在工廠守軍的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我没有更多关于 AAF 在工厂守备力量的情报。

Key.Original: Team Gamma may have spotted some movement when they moved to their RV - I'd suggest asking them if you haven't already.
Key.Chinese: "伽馬"小隊應該在他們前往會合點的路上有看到一些動靜-我建議你可以去詢問他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: "伽马"小组应该在他们前往会合点的路上有看到一些动静—我建议你可以去询问他们。

Key.Original: Anyway, I would avoid moving in from the north - they're probably watching the dirt road.
Key.Chinese: 不管如何，我會建議你避開北邊-他們大概都在看守著那條泥路。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管如何，我会建议你避开北边—他们大概都在看守着那条泥路。

Key.Original: You could try sneaking in from the southwest or, perhaps, make a longer approach from the east.
Key.Chinese: 你可以試著從西南方潛入，或者可能的話，繞更遠的路到東方去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以试着从西南方潜入，或者可能的话，绕更远的路到东方去。

Key.Original: The high ground there should give you a good overview of the place.
Key.Chinese: 那裡的地勢較高，應該可以讓你的視野比較開闊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里的地势较高，应该可以让你的视野比较开阔。

Container.name: 35_Miller_angry
Container.situation: kerry decided to keep the fuel

Key.Original: Here we go...
Key.Chinese: 喝，該來的還是來了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 喝，该来的还是来了...

Key.Original: Falcon, these people risked their asses to get that fuel today. I made a judgement call. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這些人在今天賭上了一切就只為了拿到這臺油料車。我已經做出了我的判斷。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这些人在今天赌上了一切就只为了拿到这台油料车。我已经做出了我的判断。完毕。

Key.Original: This is Falcon. Respond. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"獵鷹"。請回答。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"猎鹰"。请回答。完毕。

Key.Original: 'Judgement', Corporal? I hope you realise that we may not have a shot like this again.
Key.Chinese: '判斷'，下士?我希望你能了解到這種機會是不會再次出現的。
Key.Chinesesimp: '判断'，下士？我希望你能了解到这种机会是不会再次出现的。

Key.Original: It's just so - forget it. I expected you see the bigger picture here.
Key.Chinese: 他就這樣跑了-忘了他吧。我本來期望你能更有遠見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他就这样跑了—忘了他吧。我本来期望你能更有远见。

Key.Original: Just make sure that fuel is put to good use. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 你只要確保那臺油料車能被好好利用就是了。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你只要确保那台油料车能被好好利用就是了。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 33_HVT_Decision
Container.situation: kerry talks to himself

Key.Original: Goddamn Brits. Why am I the one making all the decisions these days?
Key.Chinese: 天殺的英國人。為什麼這些天來都是由我來做決定?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的英国人。为什么这些天来都是由我来做决定？

Container.name: 32_HVT_Intel
Container.situation: miller tries to convince him to change the plan

Key.Original: Falcon - wait a second - what exactly's going on here?
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"-請稍等-現在究竟是怎麼一回事?
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"-请稍等—现在究竟是怎么一回事？

Key.Original: My task is to just deliver the cistern to the hideout. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我的任務只是要把這臺油料車給開回藏身處。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的任务只是要把这台油料车给开回藏身处。完毕。

Key.Original: Alright, here's the situation.
Key.Chinese: 好的，狀況如下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，状况如下。

Key.Original: Uh, I don't think I'm following you here.
Key.Chinese: 呃，我不認為在這個任務中我該聽你的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，我不认为在这个任务中我该听你的。

Key.Original: I - wait - are you sure the locals signed off on this? Over.
Key.Chinese: 我-等等-你確定反抗軍他們知道這件事嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我—等等—你确定抵抗组织认可这件事吗？完毕。

Key.Original: That depends. How would you like to take down the highest ranking officer on this island?
Key.Chinese: 這得看情況了。你認為你該怎麼在這個島上幹掉一個高階軍官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这得看情况了。你认为你该怎么在这个岛上干掉一个高级军官？

Key.Original: Use your imagination for once. Two thousand litres of fuel? That's a pretty big fireball.
Key.Chinese: 你試著用你的想像力去想一下。兩千公升的燃油?這可會產生出一個很大的火球。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你试着用你的想像力去想一下。两千公升的燃油？这可会炸出一个很大的火球。

Key.Original: Now, our target's MRAP just left the airbase. An armoured convoy will be passing through your AO.
Key.Chinese: 現在，我們目標的防地雷反伏擊車才剛剛離開空軍基地。一個武裝的車隊將會穿越過你的行動區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，搭载我们目标的防地雷反伏击车才刚刚离开空军基地。一个武装车队将会穿越过你的行动区域。

Key.Original: For reference, I'm sending you their route now. Over.
Key.Chinese: 做為參考，我正在向你發送他們會經過的路線。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 做为参考，我正在向你发送他们会经过的路线。完毕。

Key.Original: Look, neutralising this target is a game-changer. Opportunities like this sometimes require snap decisions.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，殲滅掉這個目標將會讓戰爭的局勢改變。當機會出現時，現實總得變通一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，歼灭掉这个目标将会让战争的局势改变。当机会出现时，现实总得变通一下。

Key.Original: It's up to you. One of my guys is en route to a small construction yard north of Alikampos.
Key.Chinese: 這看你如何決定了。我的其中一個隊友已經前往阿利卡姆波斯北邊一棟建築物的院子裡等你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这看你如何决定了。我的人已经前往阿利卡姆波斯北边一栋建筑物的院子里等你。

Key.Original: You have 10 minutes. Deliver the truck; we'll take it from there. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 你有10分鐘的時間可以考慮。把油料車開到那邊;我們將會從那邊接手。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有10分钟的时间可以考虑。把油料车开到那边;我们将会从那边接手。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 31_HVT_Hell
Container.situation: kerry is confusion

Key.Original: What the hell?
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼？

Container.name: 30_HVT_Wait
Container.situation: kerry just stole the full cistern, miller gets in touch suddenly

Key.Original: Slingshot, this is Omega. We've finally got our hands on a full cistern. Heading home now. Out.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，這裡是"歐米加"。我們終於搞到一臺油料車了。正在把它開回家。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，这里是"欧米加"。我们终于搞到了一辆油料车。正在把它开回家。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Kerry, Falcon here. Just hold on to that cistern for a bit.
Key.Chinese: 克里，"獵鷹"在這。請先留著那臺油料車一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，"猎鹰"呼叫。请先留一下那辆油料车。

Key.Original: I've got some new intel. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 我這裡有一些新情報。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这里有一些新情报。请稍等。

Container.name: 25_Team_2_Attack
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla C;
Container.situation: kerry orders a supporting infantry team to storm the construction site with a cistern

Key.Original: We hear you. Got it confirmed by Slingshot. On our way. Kappa out.
Key.Chinese: 我們聽到了。"彈弓"也已經確認了。我們上路了。"卡帕"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们听到了。"弹弓"也已经确认了。我们上路了。"卡帕"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Omega to Kappa, we'll need your help with the construction site. Move in, over.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"致"卡帕"，我們需要你們一同進攻工地。開始前進，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"呼叫"卡帕"，我们需要你们一同进攻工地。开始前进，完毕。

Container.name: 23_Approaching_Complex_2
Container.situation: kerry approaches the construction site

Key.Original: Slingshot to Omega, Kappa is in position in Alikampos. They wait for your signal.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"致"歐米加"，"卡帕"已經在阿利卡姆波斯就定位了。他們正在等待你的信號。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"呼叫"欧米加"，"卡帕"已经在阿利卡姆波斯就定位了。他们正在等待你的信号。

Key.Original: Remember, your priority is that fuel truck. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 請記住，你的最優先任務是奪取油料車。"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请记住，你的最优先任务是夺取油料车。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Container.name: 21_ItsOn
Container.situation: stavrou agrees

Key.Original: He's right, we must take that risk.
Key.Chinese: 他說的對，我們是必須冒點風險。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他说的对，我们是必须冒点风险。

Key.Original: Okay, listen carefully. Team Kappa is in the woods to the east of our hideout.
Key.Chinese: 好的，仔細聽好了。"卡帕"小隊正躲在藏身處東方的森林中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，仔细听好了。"卡帕"小组正躲在藏身处东方的森林中。

Key.Original: They will take up a position in Alikampos, wait for your order and, if needed, join the assault the construction site.
Key.Chinese: 他們將會先前往阿利卡姆波斯進行等待，假如你有需要，你可以呼叫他們跟你一起協同進攻工地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们将会先前往阿利卡姆波斯进行等待，假如你有需要，你可以呼叫他们跟你一起协同进攻工地。

Key.Original: Get it done with as little blood spilled as possible. Godspeed. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 盡可能的在最小損失範圍內完成這件事。祝好運。"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽可能地在最小损失范围内完成这件事。祝好运。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Container.name: 20_Plan_B
Container.situation: miller suggests attacking another outpost to find a full cistern

Key.Original: Falcon to Slingshot, I've got decent intel on a CSAT fuel truck nearby Alikampos, over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"致"彈弓"，我這裡有個不錯的情報，有一輛廣協同盟的油料車正停在阿利卡姆波斯附近，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"呼叫"弹弓"，我有确切情报称一辆广协的油料车正停在阿利卡姆波斯附近，完毕。

Key.Original: It was there an hour ago, parked up in the construction site. That's as sure as I can be.
Key.Chinese: 它停在那邊已經一個小時了，停在一處工地裡。我非常確認這個情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它停在那边已经一个小时了，停在一处工地里。我非常确认这个情报。

Key.Original: I suggest moving in while you still have assets in the area. It's up to you. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 我建議你可以派遣這區域裡的部隊過去。決定權在你。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我建议你可以派遣这区域里的部队过去。决定权在你。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Can you be sure, Falcon? Over.
Key.Chinese: 你確定嗎，"獵鷹"?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你确定吗，"猎鹰"？完毕。

Container.name: 15_Cistern_Empty
Container.situation: kerry finds out that the cistern is empty

Key.Original: Wait ... what the hell?
Key.Chinese: 等等...搞什麼鬼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等...搞什么鬼？

Key.Original: Slingshot, update. The cistern's empty, I say again, no fuel left in the cistern, over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，狀況更新。油料車是空的，我重複一遍，油料車裡啥都沒有剩下，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，状况更新。油料车是空的，我重复一遍，油料车里啥都没有剩下，完毕。

Key.Original: Ah, Goddammit. This was always a risk.
Key.Chinese: 喔，天殺的。為啥每次都這樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，活见鬼。为啥每次都这样。

Key.Original: Okay, wait for new orders, Kerry. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，請等待更進一步的命令，克里。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，请等待更进一步的命令，克里。通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_Cistern_Found
Container.situation: kerry sees the cistern he's supposed to steal

Key.Original: Alright, there it is.
Key.Chinese: 好的，它在那邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，它在那边。

Container.name: 08_Approaching_Complex_1
Container.situation: kerry approaches the industrial complex

Key.Original: Slingshot, be advised, we're closing in on the complex.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，請注意，我們正在靠近工廠。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，请注意，我们正在靠近工厂。

Key.Original: I'll report back once we've got the cistern. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我將在得到油料車後向你回報。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我将在得到油料车后向你报告。通话完毕。

Container.name: 06_Rendezvous_2
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: kerry meets up with another part of his team

Key.Original: Not much, but we were able to map out the last known position of guards in the main complex.
Key.Chinese: 不多，但至少我們描繪出了工廠守衛的最後位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不多，但至少我们大概确认了工厂守卫的最后位置。

Key.Original: Glad to see you made it here in one piece. Any new intel?
Key.Chinese: 真高興在這邊見到你們。有任何新情報嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴在这边见到你们。有任何新情报吗？

Container.name: 05_Rendezvous_1
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: kerry meets up with another part of his team

Key.Original: Good to see you, Kerry. We have increased movement around the main road.
Key.Chinese: 真高興見到你，克里。我們發現到主要道路上的活動增加了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴见到你，克里。我们发现到主要道路上的活动增加了。

Key.Original: Just give me a second - I can update their positions in your map.
Key.Chinese: 給我幾秒鐘一下-我將它的位置標記到你的地圖上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 给我几秒钟—我将它的位置标记到你的地图上。

Key.Original: Morning, guys, any update on Greenback activity?
Key.Chinese: 早安，兄弟們，有任何關於綠軍的活動情報嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 早安，兄弟们，有任何关于绿军的活动情报吗？

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Stavrou;EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB I Guerrilla B;
Container.situation: mission start

Key.Original: This is Gamma, we have taken cover in a junk yard to the south of the highway.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"伽馬"，我們正在公路南方的垃圾場中躲著。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"伽马"，我们正在公路南方的垃圾场中躲着。

Key.Original: Trying to get a better view of the situation now, over.
Key.Chinese: 正在試著尋找更好的觀察位置來了解狀況，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在试着寻找更好的观察位置来了解状况，完毕。

Key.Original: Slingshot, this is Omega, be advised, approaching the highway now. Over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，這裡是"歐米加"，請注意，正在靠近公路中。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，这里是"欧米加"，请注意，正在靠近公路中。完毕。

Key.Original: Good news. Continue with the mission. I will check in with the recon teams.
Key.Chinese: 好消息。請繼續你們的任務。讓我來跟其他的偵察小隊聯繫一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好消息。请继续你们的任务。让我来跟其他的侦察小队联系一下。

Key.Original: Gamma, Sigma, what is your status? Over.
Key.Chinese: "伽馬"，"西格瑪"，你們的狀況怎樣?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "伽马"，"西格玛"，你们的状况怎样？完毕。

Key.Original: Sigma here, we are in position in the woods. All is quiet here.
Key.Chinese: "西格瑪"在這，我們在森林中就定位了。這裡很正常。
Key.Chinesesimp: "西格玛"在这儿，我们在森林中就位了。这里一切正常。

Key.Original: Understood. Omega is now in the area. Hold your positions. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。"歐米加"正在行動區域內了。堅守你們的位置。"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。"欧米加"在行动区域内了。坚守你们的位置。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Key.Original: The FIA move in to retrieve a seized fuel truck.
Key.Chinese: 自由獨立同盟前往取回他們被拿走的油料車。
Key.Chinesesimp: FIA 前去夺回他们被抢走的油料车。

Key.Original: MOVE
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: Return to Orestes
Key.Chinese: 返回奧雷斯泰斯那邊
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回奥雷斯泰斯那边

Key.Original: When you're done with your mission, regroup with Orestes at the %2meeting point%1 and bring him to our base.
Key.Chinese: 當你完成了任務，請返回與奧雷斯泰斯在%2碰面點%1會合，然後帶他回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在完成任务后，请回去与奥雷斯泰斯在%2碰面点%1会合，然后带他回来。

Key.Original: SEEK AND DESTROY
Key.Chinese: 搜索並摧毀
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索并摧毁

Key.Original: Repair Depot Sabotage
Key.Chinese: 破壞維修站
Key.Chinesesimp: 破坏维修站

Key.Original: The enemy uses a %2farm%1 north-west of Katalakos as a repair depot for their damaged vehicles. If you eliminate the depot garrison along with the vehicle guarding it, Orestes will call in a fire mission to destroy all vehicles being repaired there.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍使用卡塔拉科斯西北邊的一個%2農場%1來當作維修他們載具的維修站。假如你能殲滅掉該處的守軍，奧雷斯泰斯將可呼叫轟炸支援來摧毀該處的所有載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军将卡塔拉科斯西北的一个%2农场%1作为车辆维修站。假如你能歼灭掉该处的守军，奥雷斯泰斯将可呼叫炮火支援来摧毁该处的所有车辆。

Key.Original: SEEK AND DESTROY
Key.Chinese: 搜索並摧毀
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索并摧毁

Key.Original: Helicopter Ambush
Key.Chinese: 伏擊直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击直升机

Key.Original: Orestes will request helicopter support in the area once you've eliminated the 5-man CSAT patrol on %2overwatch%1 near the wind turbines. When the chopper's in the area, mark the LZ with smoke, wait for it to land, and destroy it. Planted explosives are ideal. Make sure the pilot doesn't spot you!
Key.Chinese: 假如你能殲滅掉風力發電機附近在做%2監視%1的廣協同盟5人小隊，奧雷斯泰斯將會呼叫直升機支援。當直升機靠近時，請使用煙霧彈來標記降落點，等它一降落，就把它摧毀掉。如果能在降落點設置一顆炸藥，那就更為理想了。請確保直升機的駕駛沒有發現你，要不然它就會飛走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你能歼灭掉风力发电机附近执行%2监视%1任务的广协5人巡逻队，奥雷斯泰斯将会呼叫直升机支援。当直升机靠近时，请使用烟雾弹来标记降落点，等它一降落，就把它摧毁掉。如果能在降落点设置一颗炸药，那就更为理想了。请确保直升机的驾驶没有发现你，要不然它就会飞走！

Key.Original: Prepare Ambush
Key.Chinese: 準備伏擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备伏击

Key.Original: Pick one of the available opportunities for CSAT ambush. Eliminate the enemy presence in the selected area and let Orestes request a support run.
Key.Chinese: 選擇埋伏廣協同盟的時機。殲滅掉敵人將使奧雷斯泰斯可以呼叫支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择埋伏广协部队的时机。歼灭掉敌人将使奥雷斯泰斯可以呼叫支援。

Key.Original: INTERCEPT
Key.Chinese: 攔截
Key.Chinesesimp: 拦截

Key.Original: Intercept the pursuers
Key.Chinese: 攔截跟蹤者
Key.Chinesesimp: 拦截跟踪者

Key.Original: Your contact was followed to the meet. Get rid of the pursuers before they realize what's happening.
Key.Chinese: 你的線人被跟蹤了。請在他們了解發生了什麼事情之前就幹掉他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的线人被跟踪了。请在他们了解发生了什么事情之前就干掉他们。

Key.Original: WAIT
Key.Chinese: 等待
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: Wait
Key.Chinese: 等待
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: Wait for our AAF contact. He should arrive any minute now.
Key.Chinese: 等待我們在阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的線人。他應該就快要到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待我们在 AAF 内的线人。他应该就快要到了。

Key.Original: MOVE
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: Get to the RV
Key.Chinese: 前往會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往会合点

Key.Original: Our contact is on his way to the %2rendezvous%1 and you're running late. Get there quickly and wait for him.
Key.Chinese: 我們的線人正在前往%2會合點%1當中，而且你已經快要遲到了。請趕快抵達那邊並等待線人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的线人正在前往%2会合点%1，而且你已经快要迟到了。请赶快抵达那边并等待线人。

Key.Original: Helicopter
Key.Chinese: 直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机

Key.Original: Repair Depot
Key.Chinese: 維修站
Key.Chinesesimp: 维修站

Key.Original: Meeting
Key.Chinese: 碰面點
Key.Chinesesimp: 碰面点

Key.Original: Camp
Key.Chinese: 營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 营地

Key.Original: Stash
Key.Chinese: 藏匿點
Key.Chinesesimp: 藏匿点

Key.Original: Patrolling Ifrit
Key.Chinese: 巡邏中的"焰靈"
Key.Chinesesimp: 巡逻中的"焰灵"

Key.Original: Depot Raid
Key.Chinese: 突擊維修站
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击维修站

Key.Original: Helicopter Ambush
Key.Chinese: 伏擊直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击直升机

Key.Original: Choosing a Sabotage
Key.Chinese: 選擇破壞哪個目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择破坏哪个目标

Key.Original: Orestes is dead
Key.Chinese: 奧雷斯泰斯陣亡了
Key.Chinesesimp: 奥雷斯泰斯阵亡

Key.Original: Orestes was killed by CSAT forces. Without him, this operation is futile.
Key.Chinese: 奧雷斯泰斯被廣協同盟部隊給殺死了。沒有了他的幫助，這場行動根本就沒法完成。
Key.Chinesesimp: 奥雷斯泰斯被广协部队打死了。没了他的帮助，这场行动根本就没法完成。

Key.Original: The helicopter got away
Key.Chinese: 直升機跑走了
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机跑走了

Key.Original: You failed to destroy the helicopter.
Key.Chinese: 你沒能摧毀掉直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你没能摧毁掉直升机。

Key.Original: Not only will this complicate future lines of communication between the AAF and CSAT, but we have managed to strike a significant blow against the very CSAT forces that decimated our brothers in Kavala.
Key.Chinese: 我們打亂了阿爾蒂斯武裝力量與廣協同盟之間的通訊，這將使他們往後的溝通變得更為複雜，我們同時也為那些在卡瓦拉被廣協同盟屠殺的弟兄們報了仇。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这场行动不止加剧了 AAF 与广协之间的隔阂，同时也为那些在卡瓦拉被广协屠杀的兄弟报了仇。

Key.Original: A sympathetic AAF officer has approached us looking for a way out. He's been uncomfortable for many months, but the recent CSAT offensive - the bloody attack on Kavala, the ongoing crackdown - has proven to be the last straw.%1Now he and a few trusted comrades are ready to defect. As part of the deal - and before our enemy learns what's going on - we'll use his position of authority to strike a blow against the very CSAT forces that decimated Kavala.%1We've arranged to link up with this officer - codename Orestes - along with some of his men at an %3abandoned farm%2 to the north. We'll then use his security clearance to set the trap.
Key.Chinese: 一名阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的軍官靠近我們，表示他想投誠的決心。他的心底已經忐忑不安好幾個月了，隨著廣協同盟猛烈且血腥的掃蕩卡瓦拉，這壓倒了他的最後一根稻草。%1現在，他與幾名他信任的同志準備要投奔我們這邊。作為交易的一部分-也趕在我們的敵人了解發生什麼事之前-我們打算利用他現在的職權，設置埋伏來重創殘忍掃蕩卡瓦拉的廣協同盟部隊。%1他的代號將被稱為"奧雷斯泰斯"，而且我們已經跟他聯繫好了，將在北邊的一個%3廢棄農場%2中碰面。我們將利用他的職權來設置陷阱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一名同情游击队的 AAF 军官接近我们，表示他想投诚的决心。他已经动摇了几个月，而广协针对卡瓦拉猛烈且血腥的扫荡成了压倒了他的最后一根稻草。%1现在，他与几名他信任的同志准备要投奔我们这边。作为交易的一部分—也赶在我们的敌人了解发生什么事之前—我们打算利用他现在的职权，设置埋伏来重创残忍扫荡卡瓦拉的广协部队。%1他的代号为"奥雷斯泰斯"，而且我们已经跟他联系好了，将在北边的一个%3废弃农场%2中碰面。我们将利用他的职权来设置陷阱。

Key.Original: %2Omega%1 - Your team.
Key.Chinese: %2"歐米加"%1-你的小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"欧米加"%1-你的小队。

Key.Original: Meet our contact and exploit his position of authority to sabotage a CSAT element in the area.
Key.Chinese: 與我們的線人見面，並利用他的職權來摧毀該區的廣協同盟部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与我们的线人见面，并利用他的职权来摧毁该区的广协部队。

Key.Original: %2Link up with the AAF officer%1%3Eliminate enemy presence in the area you've selected for sabotage%1%4Have the officer call in support%1%5Exfiltrate
Key.Chinese: %2與阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的軍官碰面%1%3選擇你要破壞的任務目標%1%4讓軍官呼叫支援%1%5撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: %2与 AAF 军官碰面%1%3选择你要破坏的任务目标%1%4让军官呼叫支援%1%5撤退

Key.Original: Exit Strategy
Key.Chinese: 撤出戰略
Key.Chinesesimp: 脱离策略

Container.name: 15_Sabotage_Request_Artillery
Container.situation: the aaf officer requests arty support

Key.Original: Understood, Spartan-actual. We cannot allow them to raid our positions with such impunity.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"斯巴達-隊長"。我們不能讓他們這麼囂張。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"斯巴达—领队"。我们不能让他们这么嚣张地突袭我们的阵地。

Key.Original: Get to cover. We'll send heavy ordnance. Splash in 60 seconds. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 請找掩護。我們將會送大型轟炸過去。預計60秒後著彈。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请找掩护。我们将打重火力过去。预计60秒后着弹。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Griffin, this is Spartan-Actual, we have multiple enemy contacts at the Oreokastro depot.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"斯巴達-隊長"，我們發現到有多名敵人出現在奧雷奧卡斯特羅的維修站。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，这里是"斯巴达—领队"，我们在奥雷奥卡斯特罗维修站与一批敌人接触。

Key.Original: Looks like another raid on our position for weapons and vehicles - I don't think we can continue to hold them off.
Key.Chinese: 看來又是一場打算搶奪我們武器與載具的行動-我不認為我們可以繼續拖住他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来又是一场打算抢夺我们武器与车辆的突袭—我不认为我们可以继续拖住他们。

Key.Original: We've pulled back to higher ground for now - requesting immediate fire support on the position. Danger-close. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們正要撤退到比較高的位置-請求立即火力支援在該位置。危險距離。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正要撤退到比较高的位置—请求立即对该位置实施火力支援。危险距离。完毕。

Container.name: x10_Chopper_Getting_away
Container.situation: the helicopter pilot saw kerry's team and is flying away

Key.Original: Shit - I think he spotted us!
Key.Chinese: 該死-我認為它看到我們了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死—我认为它看到我们了！

Container.name: x05_Meeting_Late
Container.situation: orestes eliminated the csat patrol without player

Key.Original: Oh, so nice of you people to finally arrive.
Key.Chinese: 喔，你們可終於到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，你们可终于到了。

Key.Original: You know, it was a big risk neutralizing that patrol ourselves - I cannot say if we were discovered.
Key.Chinese: 你知道嗎，讓我們自己幹掉追兵真是個天大的風險-我不能保證我們是不是已經被發現了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道吗，让我们自己干掉追兵真是个天大的风险—我不能保证我们是不是已经被发现了。

Key.Original: ... Anyway, I hope you'll find yourself more interested in the rest of this operation.
Key.Chinese: ...不管如何，我希望你能對剩下的任務保持著興趣。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...不管如何，我希望你能对剩下的任务保持着兴趣。

Key.Original: So, we can only afford to pull off one strike. CSAT get suspicious very, very quickly.
Key.Chinese: 所以，我們的任務務必一次到位。廣協同盟將會查覺到事情的不對勁在非常，非常短的時間內。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，我们的任务务必一次到位。很短很短时间内广协就会查觉到事情不对劲。

Key.Original: Let me know once you're in position. Go.
Key.Chinese: 等你就定位了就通知我。走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等你就位了就通知我。走吧。

Container.name: x01_Orestes_Alone
Container.situation: player isn't at the meeting point when orestes gets there

Key.Original: This is Orestes, where the hell are you guys?!
Key.Chinese: 這裡是奥雷斯泰斯，你們他媽的在哪裡?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是奥雷斯泰斯，你们他妈的在哪里？！

Key.Original: CSAT are on their way to our position now - we need urgent help!
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟正在來到我們的位置當中-我們需要緊急支援!
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协部队正往我们这边来—我们需要紧急支援！

Container.name: i10_Sabotage_Headsup_Helicopter
Container.situation: the aaf officer gives advice to kerry before he starts his sabotage

Key.Original: Corporal, this is Orestes. If you've decided to take down the helicopter, you should have some smokeshells and explosives at hand.
Key.Chinese: 下士，這裡是奥雷斯泰斯。假如你決定要幹掉直升機，你應該要有帶著煙霧彈和炸藥在手上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 下士，这里是奥雷斯泰斯。假如你决定要干掉直升机，你应该带着烟雾弹和炸药。

Key.Original: Do you have somewhere to rearm in the area? Maybe check your map.
Key.Chinese: 你在這區裡應該有些補給點吧?請確認你的地圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在这区里应该有些补给点吧？在地图上确认一下。

Key.Original: After you've eliminated the patrol, report to me and I'll call it in.
Key.Chinese: 等到你殲滅掉巡邏兵，向我回報，我就會呼叫直升機過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等到你歼灭掉巡逻队，向我汇报，我就会呼叫直升机过来。

Key.Original: When it gets near, deploy smoke to mark its LZ. Pick a reasonable spot so the pilot can land as close to it as possible.
Key.Chinese: 當它靠近時，請釋放煙霧彈來標記降落點。請選擇一個合理的位置來讓駕駛好降落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当它靠近时，请释放烟雾弹来标记降落点。请选择一个合理的位置来让驾驶好降落。

Key.Original: You can then plant a satchel on the LZ or take it out with a rocket launcher. Orestes out.
Key.Chinese: 你也可以在降落點上放置炸藥，這樣就可以給它一點驚喜，或者你也可以選擇使用火箭筒。奥雷斯泰斯通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你也可以在降落点上放置炸药，这样就可以给它一点惊喜，或者你也可以选择使用火箭筒。奥雷斯泰斯通话完毕。

Container.name: i05_Sabotage_Headsup_Artillery
Container.situation: the aaf officer gives advice to kerry before he starts his sabotage

Key.Original: Kerry, this is Orestes. If you've decided to assault the depot, you might want to get some more men. I suppose you have more teams in the area, right?
Key.Chinese: 克里，這裡是奥雷斯泰斯。假如你決定要突擊維修站，你可能會需要更多的幫手。我猜你在這區裡應該還有其他隊伍吧，對嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，这里是奥雷斯泰斯。假如你决定要突击维修站，你可能会需要更多的帮手。我猜你在这区里应该还有其他队伍吧，对吗？
