Key.Original: After you've eliminated the garrison and the patrolling vehicle, report back and I'll call in the artillery. Out.
Key.Chinese: 等到你殲滅掉守軍與巡邏中的載具，請向我回報，我將會呼叫火炮攻擊。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等到你歼灭掉守军与巡逻中的车辆后，请向我报告，我将会呼叫炮火打击。通话完毕。

Container.name: i01_Sabotage_Pick
Container.situation: the aaf officer gives advice to kerry before he starts his sabotage

Key.Original: Okay, Kerry, assaulting the repair depot will put you and your men in more danger. You'll need to plan your attack carefully.
Key.Chinese: 好的，克里，突擊維修站是一件很危險的事。你必須小心策劃你的攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，克里，突击维修站是一件很危险的事。你必须小心策划你的攻击。

Key.Original: Luring in the chopper will require more stealth and finesse. If it spots you, it'll take defensive measures to protect the units in cargo.
Key.Chinese: 伏擊直升機則需要更多的隱蔽技巧。假如飛行員看到你，他將會採取防禦措施好保護機上的士兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击直升机则需要更多的隐蔽技巧。假如飞行员看到你，他将会采取防御措施好保护机上的士兵。

Key.Original: Ultimately, the choice is yours. Orestes out.
Key.Chinese: 最終，決定權在你。奥雷斯泰斯通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最终，决定权在你。奥雷斯泰斯通话完毕。

Container.name: 25_Suprise_Falcon
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Orestes;EPB B James;
Container.situation: kerry meets falcon at the rv with orestes

Key.Original: Just wanted to ensure our new friend makes it safely to the camp, that's all.
Key.Chinese: 我只是來確保我們的新朋友可以安全的回到營地，就這樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我只是来确保我们的新朋友可以安全回到营地，就这样。

Key.Original: We wouldn't want him to get lost on the way. Isn't that right, 'Orestes?'.
Key.Chinese: 我們只是不想讓他在回去的路上迷路。對不對阿，'奥雷斯泰斯?'。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们只是不想让他在回去的路上迷路。对不对啊，"奥雷斯泰斯"？

Key.Original: L-lieutenant? What are you doing here?
Key.Chinese: 上-上尉?為什麼你會在這裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 上—上尉？为什么你会在这里？

Key.Original: Nah, course not, el capitano.
Key.Chinese: 是，是，當然沒有，船長。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，是，当然没有，船长。

Key.Original: Alright, everyone, let's move.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，所有人，我們走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，所有人，我们走。

Key.Original: Just shut up and let's go. I told Miller, I have no business with you Brits.
Key.Chinese: 請你閉嘴，我們走吧。我告訴過米勒了，我跟你們英國人沒啥好合作的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请你闭嘴，我们走吧。我告诉过米勒了，我跟你们英国人没啥好合作的。

Container.name: 20_Good_Job
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Orestes;EPB I Stavrou;
Container.situation: everyone is happy with the outcome

Key.Original: Slingshot, this is Omega. The operation was a success. Orestes stood by his word. Over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，這裡是"歐米加"。任務已經成功。奥雷斯泰斯沒有失信於我們。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，这里是"欧米加"。任务已经成功。奥雷斯泰斯没有失信于我们。完毕。

Key.Original: We have a common enemy, Commander Stavrou. Let us not make it personal. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們有著共同的敵人，指揮官斯塔夫魯。希望我們能繼續好好合作。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们有着共同的敌人，斯塔夫鲁指挥员。希望我们能继续好好合作。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Corporal. Well done today, soldier.
Key.Chinese: 收到，下士。大兵，你們今天真幹得不錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，下士。大兵，你们今天真干得不错。

Key.Original: I am glad the Lieutenant came to see the true evil in our homeland.
Key.Chinese: 我很高興中尉能真正看清到底誰才是在我們家園肆虐的惡魔。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我很高兴中尉能真正看清到底谁才是在我们家园肆虐的恶魔。

Key.Original: Indeed.
Key.Chinese: 的確。
Key.Chinesesimp: 的确。

Key.Original: So, see you back at the camp, Omega, and keep your heads down.
Key.Chinese: 所以，期待在營地見到你們，"歐米加"，請繼續保持匿蹤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，期待在营地见到你们，"欧米加"，请继续保持低调。

Key.Original: CSAT will not react kindly when they discover this deception. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟在發現這是場騙局之后是不會善罷甘休的。"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协在发现这是场骗局之后是不会善罢甘休的。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_Sabotage_Request_Helicopter
Container.situation: the aaf officer requests helicopter support

Key.Original: Understood, Spartan-Actual. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 了解了，"斯巴達-隊長"。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解了，"斯巴达—领队"。请稍等。

Key.Original: Viper-Green, this is Griffin, we have a situation in the vicinity of Point Victor.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-綠"，這裡是"獅鷲"，我們在維克多點附近發生了點狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-$1"，这里是"狮鹫"，我们在 Victor 点附近发生了点状况。

Key.Original: Griffin, this is Spartan-Actual, my unit has made contact near Point Victor!
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"斯巴達-隊長"，我的小隊在維克多點附近遇敵了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，这里是"斯巴达—领队"，我的小队在 Victor 点附近接敌了！

Key.Original: We've secured the area but need urgent support - can you dispatch QRF to our position? Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經肅清了該區，但是需要緊急支援-請問可以派遣快速應變部隊來到我們的位置嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经肃清了该区，但是需要紧急支援—请问可以派遣快速反应部队来到我们的位置吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Board Hydra and we'll brief you en route. Expedite.
Key.Chinese: 請搭乘"九頭蛇"，在路上時我會向你們做簡報。加緊腳步。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请搭乘"九头蛇"，在路上我会向你们做简报。赶快。

Key.Original: Spartan-Actual, be advised, we're dispatching a chopper to your position, callsign Hydra.
Key.Chinese: "斯巴達-隊長"，請注意，我們已經派遣了一架直升機前往你們的位置，呼號是"九頭蛇"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "斯巴达—领队"，请注意，我们已经派遣了一架直升机前往你们的位置，呼号是"九头蛇"。

Key.Original: Regroup and mark the LZ. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 請整隊並標記降落點。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请整队并标记降落点。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Container.name: 08_Sabotage_Request
Container.situation: kerry makes the request

Key.Original: Orestes, we're in position. Call it in, over.
Key.Chinese: 奧雷斯泰斯，我們就定位了。呼叫支援吧，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 奥雷斯泰斯，我们就位了。呼叫支援吧，完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative, Kerry. I'll keep this channel open.
Key.Chinese: 收到了，克里。我會持續開著這個頻道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到了，克里。我会一直开着这个频道。

Container.name: 05_Pursuers_Eliminated
Container.situation: enemies pursuing the contact are eliminated

Key.Original: Good work, Kerry. Now, let's get this done.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，克里。現在，讓我們來辦正事吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，克里。现在让我们来办正事吧。

Key.Original: CSAT are well trained - they get suspicious very, very quickly. We can only pull off one strike.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟訓練精良-他們將會查覺到事情的不對勁在非常，非常短的時間內。所以我們能成功的機會就只有一次。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协训练精良—他们将在很短很短的时间内查觉到事情不对劲。所以我们的成功机会只有一次。

Key.Original: Let me know once you're in position. Good luck.
Key.Chinese: 當你就定位了就通知我。祝好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当你就位了就通知我。祝好运。

Key.Original: Oh, and one more thing, Corporal, one of my men has an AT launcher here.
Key.Chinese: 喔，還有件事，下士，我的其中一個人把反坦克發射器放在了這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，还有件事，下士，我的一个手下带着反坦克火箭筒。

Key.Original: If you would consider it to be helpful, you are welcome to it. Out.
Key.Chinese: 你可以考慮看看要不要使用，應該對你的任務有所幫助。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以考虑看看要不要使用，应该对你的任务有所帮助。通话完毕。

Container.name: 03_Contact_Arrival
Container.situation: the contact arrives at the meeting point

Key.Original: Orestes? Corporal Kerry, I'm with the FIA.
Key.Chinese: 奧雷斯泰斯?我是下士克里，我是FIA的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 奥雷斯泰斯？我是克里下士，我是 FIA 的人。

Key.Original: It's okay, we can fall back to the forest - we'll be gone before they get here.
Key.Chinese: 沒關係的，我們可以撤退回森林裡-我們會在他們到之前就消失不見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没关系的，我们可以撤退回森林里—我们会在他们到之前就消失不见。

Key.Original: Yes - Stavrou told me to expect an American - but listen carefully, Corporal, I think we've been followed.
Key.Chinese: 恩-斯塔夫魯跟我說過會有美國人在這-但先仔細聽好了，下士，我認為我被跟蹤了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩—斯塔夫鲁跟我说过会有美国人在这—但先仔细听好了，下士，我认为我被跟踪了。

Key.Original: As we turned onto this road, we spotted a CSAT vehicle a little way behind us. They must not discover us!
Key.Chinese: 當我們轉進這條路時，有發現到一臺廣協同盟的載具跟在我們後面。絕對不能讓他發現到我們!
Key.Chinesesimp: 当我们转到这条路上时，发现一辆广协的车子就跟在我们后面。绝对不能让他发现我们！

Key.Original: Listen to me, we only have one shot at this. You must intercept them. They cannot find out we work together - not yet!
Key.Chinese: 聽我說，我們在這邊就只有一次機會了。你必須攔截他們。不能讓他們發現到我們在合作-至少現在還不行!
Key.Chinesesimp: 听我说，我们只有一次机会。你必须拦截他们。不能让他们发现到我们在合作—至少现在还不行！

Container.name: 02_ChitChat
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: discussion about orestes' value at the mission start

Key.Original: Have you noticed? Stavrou seems really keen to have this traitor at our side.
Key.Chinese: 你有注意到嗎?看來斯塔夫魯真的很希望這個叛徒來到我們這邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有注意到吗？看来斯塔夫鲁真的很希望这个叛徒来到我们这边。

Key.Original: Perhaps - if we can trust him.
Key.Chinese: 大概吧-假如我們能相信他的話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大概吧—假如我们能相信他的话。

Key.Original: What's Miller's take on Orestes?
Key.Chinese: 為什麼米勒也想要奧雷斯泰斯?
Key.Chinesesimp: 为什么米勒也想找奥雷斯泰斯？

Key.Original: Yeah, I guess. Having a Greenback officer on hand must be an invaluable asset.
Key.Chinese: 是阿，我也是這樣猜。能獲得一個綠軍的軍官應該是個非常寶貴的資源吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，我也是这样猜。能获得一个绿军的军官应该是个非常宝贵的资源吧。

Key.Original: What do you mean, American?
Key.Chinese: 美國佬，你的意思是?
Key.Chinesesimp: 美国佬，你的意思是？

Key.Original: I - uh - no idea. Captain Miller hasn't once mentioned it since I last talked to him.
Key.Chinese: 我-呵-不知道。上校米勒自從我跟他最後一次談話後都沒有提及過這件事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我—嗯—不知道。米勒上校自从跟我最后一次谈话后都没有提过这事。

Key.Original: Though it's not like that means much.
Key.Chinese: 我也不太知道他的想法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我也不太知道他的想法。

Key.Original: Come on. We're running late.
Key.Chinese: 來吧。我們快要遲到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧。我们快要迟到了。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.situation: discussion about orestes' value at the mission start

Key.Original: We're just south of the RV now - minutes away - don't worry. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經在會合點的南方了-一分鐘之內會抵達-不要擔心。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经在会合点南面了—一分钟之内会抵达—不要担心。完毕。

Key.Original: Omega, what's your status? Are you going to make it there on time? Over.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，你們的狀況如何?你們能準時到達嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，你们的状况如何？你们能准时到达吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Good. Do not keep Orestes waiting - we can't afford to spook him now. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 很好。不要讓奧雷斯泰斯等太久-我們不能讓他太緊張。"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。不要让奥雷斯泰斯等太久—我们现在不能让他暴露。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Key.Original: An AAF officer looking to defect offers the guerrillas a chance for revenge.
Key.Chinese: 一名阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的軍官想要向我們投誠，並伺機對廣協同盟報仇。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一名 AAF 的军官想要向我们投诚，并伺机对广协报仇。

Key.Original: ESCAPE
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Escape
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Fighting the enemy attack would be suicidal. Run to the hills and head for our %2base%1.
Key.Chinese: 現在跟敵人硬碰硬無疑是自殺的行為。請翻過山頭並朝我們的%2基地%1撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在跟敌人硬碰硬无疑是自杀行为。请翻过山头并朝我们的%2基地%1撤退。

Key.Original: MOVE
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: Get to the Hideout
Key.Chinese: 前往藏身處
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往藏身处

Key.Original: The supply truck is immobile. Get to the %2hideout%1 and from there back to the base.
Key.Chinese: 補給卡車已經沒法移動了。請前往%2藏身處%1，並從那邊撤退回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给卡车已经没法移动了。请前往%2藏身处%1，并从那边撤退回基地。

Key.Original: MOVE
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: Hide the Truck
Key.Chinese: 隱藏卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 隐藏卡车

Key.Original: Drive the truck to our %2hideout%1.
Key.Chinese: 把卡車開到我們的%2藏身處%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把卡车开到我们的%2藏身处%1。

Key.Original: Set Up the Ambush
Key.Chinese: 設置伏擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置伏击

Key.Original: Position your team however you see fit to ambush the convoy.%1For details, you can check your %2field manual%3.
Key.Chinese: 將你的小隊安置在你認為很好伏擊的地方來埋伏車隊。%1想知道要如何做到，你可以打開%2野戰手冊%3來學習方法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将你的小队安置在你认为很好伏击的地方来埋伏车队。%1想知道要如何做到，你可以打开%2野战手册%3来学习方法。

Key.Original: Leave the Staging Area
Key.Chinese: 離開等待區
Key.Chinesesimp: 离开等待区

Key.Original: Order your team members to move to the position where you'll set up the ambush.%1For details, you can check your %2field manual%3.
Key.Chinese: 將你的小隊安置在你認為很好伏擊的地方來埋伏車隊。%1想知道要如何做到，你可以打開%2野戰手冊%3來學習方法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将你的小队安置在你认为很好伏击的地方来埋伏车队。%1想知道要如何做到，你可以打开%2野战手册%3来学习方法。

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: Board the Offroad
Key.Chinese: 搭乘越野皮卡貨車
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘越野皮卡货车

Key.Original: Order your team members to board the truck.%1For details, you can check your %2field manual%3.
Key.Chinese: 命令你的隊員搭乘越野皮卡貨車。%1想知道要如何做到，你可以打開%2野戰手冊%3來學習方法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 命令你的队员搭乘越野皮卡货车。%1想知道要如何做到，你可以打开%2野战手册%3来学习方法。

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: Regroup with Omega
Key.Chinese: 與"歐米加"會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"欧米加"会合

Key.Original: RV with Team Omega on their %2starting position%1.
Key.Chinese: 與"歐米加"在他們的%2初始點%1會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"欧米加"在他们的%2出发点%1会合。

Key.Original: REPAIR
Key.Chinese: 維修
Key.Chinesesimp: 维修

Key.Original: Repair the Truck
Key.Chinese: 維修卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 维修卡车

Key.Original: The supply truck is immobile. Your engineer can fix it up.%1For details, you can check your, %2field manual%3.
Key.Chinese: 補給卡車已經不能移動了。你的工兵可以幫你解決這難題。%1想知道要如何做到，你可以打開%2野戰手冊%3來學習方法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给卡车已经不能移动了。你的工兵可以帮你解决这难题。%1想知道要如何做到，你可以打开%2野战手册%3来学习方法。

Key.Original: Steal the Supply Truck
Key.Chinese: 偷補給卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 偷补给卡车

Key.Original: Ambush the %2convoy%1 and steal the supply truck.
Key.Chinese: 伏擊%2車隊%1並偷走補給卡車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击%2车队%1并偷走补给卡车。

Key.Original: Outpost
Key.Chinese: 前哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 前哨

Key.Original: Convoy Start
Key.Chinese: 車隊出發點
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队出发点

Key.Original: Convoy Ambush
Key.Chinese: 伏擊車隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击车队

Key.Original: Disobeyed orders
Key.Chinese: 違抗命令
Key.Chinesesimp: 违抗命令

Key.Original: Your orders were to assume command of team Omega, not running around pointlessly.
Key.Chinese: 你接到的命令是叫你去指揮Omega小隊，而不是在附近亂跑。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你接到的命令是叫你去指挥"欧米加"小队，而不是在附近乱跑。

Key.Original: Our hideout in the hills was discovered. We must now regroup our forces and reassess the situation.
Key.Chinese: 我們在山裡的藏身處被發現了。我們必須重整我們的部隊並重新評估局勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在山里的藏身处被发现了。我们必须重整我们的部队并重新评估局势。

Key.Original: The recent attack on Kavala hit us hard. We lost valuable equipment and munitions - many months of supplies. And - to make matters worse � with Nikos still missing in action, we've lost a key link in our supply network.%1We're not desperate - not yet, at least - but the situation is only going to get worse from here. We must act now. We must strengthen our hand while we still can. Our British friend here has offered us a solution.%1Part of Miller's team has been scouting enemy movement to the south. There's a weekly supply run between %3Agios Dionysios%2 and a CSAT outpost in %4Fotia%2. His team will move in, ambush the convoy, and deliver the supply truck to %5one of our teams%2.
Key.Chinese: 最近敵人對卡瓦拉的那次攻擊，著實讓我們損失慘重。我們失去了寶貴的裝備與彈藥-以及好幾個月的補給。還有-更糟的是–尼科斯現在仍然下落不明，我們失去了補給網路的核心。%1我們還沒有絕望-至少現在還沒-但從現在開始，情況只可能變得更糟。我們必須行動。我們必須趁我們還有能力掌握狀況時行動。我們的英國朋友在這邊提供了一個解決方案。%1米勒的部分隊員偵察到敵人在南部的動靜。那裡有一個每個禮拜都會進行補給運輸的補給線，介於%3聖迪奧尼西奧斯%2和廣協同盟在%4福蒂亞2的前哨之間。他的小隊將會移動到那邊，然後埋伏那個車隊，然後運輸補給卡車給我們的%5其中一個小隊%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最近敌人对卡瓦拉的攻击着实让我们损失惨重。我们失去了宝贵的装备与弹药—以及好几个月的补给。还有—更糟的是–由于尼科斯现在仍然下落不明，我们失去了补给网络的核心。%1但我们还没有绝望—至少现在还没—但从现在开始，情况只可能变得更糟。我们必须行动。我们必须趁我们还有能力掌握状况时行动。我们的英国朋友在这边提供了一个解决方案。%1米勒的手下侦察到敌人在南部的动静。那里有一个每个礼拜都会进行补给运输的补给线，介于%3圣迪奥尼西奥斯%2和广协在%4福蒂亚%2的前哨站之间。他的小组将会移动到那边，然后埋伏那个车队，然后运输补给卡车给我们的%5其中一个小组%2。

Key.Original: %3Falcon%2 - Your team.%1%4Omega%2 - Guerrilla team on standby.%1%Slingshot - Command.
Key.Chinese: %3"獵鷹"%2-你的小隊。%1%4"歐米加"%2-待命中的反抗軍小隊。%1%"彈弓"-指揮官。
Key.Chinesesimp: %3"猎鹰"%2-你的小组。%1%4"欧米加"%2-待命中的反抗军小组。%1%"弹弓"-指挥官。

Key.Original: Attack the CSAT %2convoy%1 passing through your AO, steal the supply truck and take it to our %3hideout%1.
Key.Chinese: 攻擊廣協同盟的%2車隊%1，偷走一輛補給卡車，然後把它開到我們的%3藏身處%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击广协的%2车队%1，偷走一辆补给卡车，然后把它开到我们的%3藏身处%1。

Key.Original: %5Intercept the enemy %3convoy%2 anywhere along its route.%1%6Steal the supply truck.%1%7Drive the truck to our %4hideout%2.
Key.Chinese: %5在你喜歡的地方埋伏敵方的%3車隊%2。%1%6偷走一輛補給卡車。%1%7把它開到我們的%4藏身處%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: %5在你喜欢的地方埋伏敌方的%3车队%2。%1%6偷走一辆补给卡车。%1%7把它开到我们的%4藏身处%2。

Key.Original: Supply Network
Key.Chinese: 補給網路
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给网络

Container.name: x01_Truck_Destroyed
Container.situation: the truck kerry was supposed to steal is destroyed

Key.Original: Ah, shit.
Key.Chinese: 喔，該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，该死。

Key.Original: I'm not gonna hear the end of this one...
Key.Chinese: 我不敢想像他們會怎麼念我了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不敢想像他们会怎么念我了...

Container.name: i01_Ambush
Container.situation: miller gives kerry some advice how to set up the ambush

Key.Original: Alright Kerry, since we've thrown you in at the deep end, here's a crash course on convoy ambush.
Key.Chinese: 好的克里，很抱歉我們一腳把你踹進這渾水裡，讓我來教你一點埋伏的基本知識。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的克里，很抱歉我们一脚把你踹进这浑水里，让我来教你一点埋伏的基本知识。

Key.Original: Picking a good spot is crucial. It's vital that you and your men all have good cover or concealment, but ensure that you have a clear view of the target, too.
Key.Chinese: 挑選一個好位置是至關重要的。好位置能讓你跟你的隊員有掩護或隱藏，但同時又能清楚的看到目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 挑选一个好位置是至关重要的。好位置能让你跟你的队员有掩护或隐藏，但同时又能清楚的看到目标。

Key.Original: I'd recommend moving to higher ground and making your squad hit the dirt.
Key.Chinese: 我建議你可以找高一點的位置，並命令你的隊員趴下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我建议你可以找高一点的位置，并命令你的队员趴下。

Key.Original: You should also consider ordering them to hold fire until the convoy gets close.
Key.Chinese: 你也得命令他們先停火，等到車隊靠近在開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你也得命令他们先停火，等到车队靠近在开火。

Key.Original: When placing the charges, keep in mind that you don't want the supply truck blown to bits along with the guards.
Key.Chinese: 放置炸藥時，你可不希望補給卡車跟著守衛一起被炸翻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 放置炸药时，你可不希望补给卡车跟着守卫一起被炸翻。

Key.Original: CSAT will probably call in reinforcements when you strike, so grab the truck and get out of there as fast as you can.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟可能會在你攻擊後就呼叫支援，所以搶到了目標就趕緊逃跑。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协可能会在你攻击后就呼叫支援，所以抢到了目标就赶紧逃跑。

Key.Original: Good luck. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 祝好運。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 祝好运。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 45_SwitchCamp
Container.situation: guerillas will be switching the position of their camp

Key.Original: Omega, are you still alive? Our camp here is under threat too - this offensive is a fucking extermination!
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，你們還活著嗎?我們的營地也遭受到攻擊-這攻勢他媽的根本是想把我們趕盡殺絕!
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，你们还活着吗？我们的营地也遭受到攻击—这攻势他妈的根本是想把我们赶尽杀绝！

Key.Original: We're falling back. The new RV is in an old factory not far from you, at grid 054-179. Godspeed!
Key.Chinese: 我們正在撤退。新的會合點在你們附近的老工廠中，座標是054-179。祝好運!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正在撤退。新的会合点在你们附近的老工厂中，座标是054-179。祝好运！

Container.name: 40_Blowjob
Container.situation: hideout is attacked by csat

Key.Original: Okay, listen carefully. If you can, blow the supply truck and fall back our camp! Go!
Key.Chinese: 好的，仔細聽好了。假如可以的話，請爆破掉補給卡車，然後撤退回我們的營地!行動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，仔细听好了。假如可以的话，请爆破掉补给卡车，然后撤退回我们的营地！行动！

Container.name: 35_Hideout_Attacked
Container.situation: hideout is attacked by csat

Key.Original: Oh, fuck!
Key.Chinese: 喔，幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，操！

Key.Original: Slingshot, come in! We've got CSAT forces inbound! Over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，接進!我們這裡遭遇了廣協同盟的部隊!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，请回答！我们这里遭遇了广协部队！完毕。

Key.Original: What?! How did they find our position? Hold there. Await orders.
Key.Chinese: 什麼?!他們是怎麼找到位置的?請堅守住。等待命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么？！他们是怎么找到位置的？请坚守住。等待命令。

Container.name: 30_Hideout_Reached
Container.situation: kerry arrives at the hideout

Key.Original: Slingshot, this is Omega, update: we're at the hideout. Over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，這裡是"歐米加"，狀況更新:我們已經在藏身處了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，这里是"欧米加"，状况更新：我们已经在藏身处了。完毕。

Key.Original: Alright, then. They need to get a move on.
Key.Chinese: 好吧。希望他們能快點抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。希望他们能快点抵达。

Key.Original: Understood. Wait for the spotters to regroup, then we'll start the debriefing. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。請等待其他偵察兵與你們會合，然後我們將會開始進行任務報告。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。请等待其他侦察兵与你们会合，然后我们将会开始进行任务报告。通话完毕。

Container.name: 25_Meeting_Spotters_2
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla B;EPB I Guerrilla C;EPB I Guerrilla D;EPB I Guerrilla E;
Container.situation: kerry meets a spotter when he's on his way back to the base

Key.Original: See you in the camp, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 回頭營地見，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 回头营地见，克里。

Key.Original: See you in the camp, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 回頭營地見，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 回头营地见，克里。

Key.Original: See you in the camp, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 回頭營地見，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 回头营地见，克里。

Key.Original: See you in the camp, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 回頭營地見，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 回头营地见，克里。

Container.name: 25_Meeting_Spotters_1
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla B;EPB I Guerrilla C;EPB I Guerrilla D;EPB I Guerrilla E;
Container.situation: kerry meets a spotter when he's at his post

Key.Original: Aren't you supposed to be preparing an ambush, Corporal? I'll let you know when I see the convoy.
Key.Chinese: 你不是要去準備埋伏嗎，下士?當我看到車隊時我會通知你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不是要去准备埋伏吗，下士？当我看到车队时我会通知你。

Key.Original: Aren't you supposed to be preparing an ambush, Corporal? I'll let you know when I see the convoy.
Key.Chinese: 你不是要去準備埋伏嗎，下士?當我看到車隊時我會通知你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不是要去准备埋伏吗，下士？当我看到车队时我会通知你。

Key.Original: Aren't you supposed to be preparing an ambush, Corporal? I'll let you know when I see the convoy.
Key.Chinese: 你不是要去準備埋伏嗎，下士?當我看到車隊時我會通知你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不是要去准备埋伏吗，下士？当我看到车队时我会通知你。

Key.Original: Aren't you supposed to be preparing an ambush, Corporal? I'll let you know when I see the convoy.
Key.Chinese: 你不是要去準備埋伏嗎，下士?當我看到車隊時我會通知你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不是要去准备埋伏吗，下士？当我看到车队时我会通知你。

Container.name: 20_Convoy_Info_4
Container.situation: spotter informs kerry about the convoy progress

Key.Original: Omega, The convoy's made it to the outpost - I hope you know what you're doing. Good luck.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，車隊已經抵達前哨了-我希望你知道自己在做什麼。祝好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，车队已经抵达前哨了—我希望你知道自己在做什么。祝好运。

Container.name: 20_Convoy_Info_3
Container.situation: spotter informs kerry about the convoy progress

Key.Original: The convoy just reached the coast. Be ready.
Key.Chinese: 車隊剛剛抵達海岸。請準備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队刚刚抵达海岸。请准备。

Container.name: 20_Convoy_Info_2
Container.situation: spotter informs kerry about the convoy progress

Key.Original: Hello, Omega? The convoy just arrived in Negades.
Key.Chinese: 哈囉，Omega?車隊剛剛抵達Negades。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈啰，"欧米加"？车队刚刚抵达内加泽斯。

Key.Original: I think I see troops in the rear of the second vehicle. See you back in the camp.
Key.Chinese: 我認為我有看到運兵車在第二臺載具的後面。回頭營地見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我认为我在第二辆车的后舱看到了士兵。回头营地见。

Container.name: 20_Convoy_Info_1
Container.situation: spotter informs kerry about the convoy progress

Key.Original: I see the convoy. It just drove past Kore.
Key.Chinese: 我看到車隊了。它剛開過科雷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我看到车队了。它刚开过科雷。

Key.Original: One armed Ifrit in front ... another to the rear.
Key.Chinese: 一臺武裝"焰靈"在前頭...其餘的都跟在後面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 打头的是一辆武装"焰灵"...其余的都跟在后面。

Key.Original: Our target is the second vehicle. Okay, I'm out of here.
Key.Chinese: 我們的目標是第二臺載具。好的，我要離開這裡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的目标是第二辆车。好的，我要离开这里了。

Container.name: 15_Rendezvous
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: kerry meets team alpha

Key.Original: Listen here. We follow you because commander Stavrou ordered us to, understood?
Key.Chinese: 聽我們說。我們會跟隨你只是因為指揮官斯塔夫魯的命令，明白了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 听我们说。我们会听你的只是因为指挥官斯塔夫鲁的命令，明白了吗？

Key.Original: I trust you know what you're doing and I suggest you keep it simple.
Key.Chinese: 我相信你知道自己在做什麼，還有我建議你保持簡單就好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我相信你知道自己在做什么，还有我建议你别把事情搞复杂。

Key.Original: Gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先生们。

Key.Original: That's fine by me. Let's get this done.
Key.Chinese: 我沒意見。讓我們去把事情搞定吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没意见。让我们去把事情搞定吧。

Container.name: 10_Recommendation
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla C;EPB I Stavrou;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: stavrou calls alpha, lets them know what's up

Key.Original: Yes, go ahead. Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到，請講。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，请讲。完毕。

Key.Original: Are you sure, Commander? I'm just saying - Gekas knows the plan, too.
Key.Chinese: 你確定嗎，指揮官?我認為傑卡斯也可以勝任，他也知道計劃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你确定吗，指挥官？我认为杰卡斯也可以胜任，他也知道计划。

Key.Original: This is Slingshot, come in. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"彈弓"，接進。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"弹弓"，请回答。完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative, Commander - we'll be at the RV.
Key.Chinese: 知道了，指揮官-我們會在會合點等待。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了，指挥员—我们会在会合点等待。

Key.Original: Be advised, Corporal Kerry will lead this operation.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，下士克里將會接手此次行動的指揮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，克里下士将会接手此次行动的指挥。

Key.Original: He will arrive shortly to assume command. Acknowledge, over.
Key.Chinese: 他很快就會抵達你們那邊並指揮你們。知道了嗎，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他很快就会抵达你们那边并指挥你们。知道了吗，完毕。

Key.Original: Well, alright, then.
Key.Chinese: 恩，好吧，就這樣了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，好吧，就这样了。

Key.Original: Listen to me: I am certain.
Key.Chinese: 聽我說:我敢肯定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听我说：我敢肯定。

Key.Original: We have increased CSAT activity near our camp - we simply cannot spare any further time or manpower.
Key.Chinese: 我們營地附近的廣協同盟部隊正在積極的活動-我們恐怕已經無法分出更多的時間與人力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们营地附近的广协部队正在积极活动—我们恐怕已经无法分出更多的时间与人力。

Key.Original: The American is familiar with this mission - Falcon has vouched for his ability.
Key.Chinese: 美國佬很熟悉這種任務-Falcon已經推薦了他的能力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 美国佬很熟悉这种任务-"猎鹰"已经推荐了他的能力。

Key.Original: There is no room for further discussion, understood?
Key.Chinese: 現在已經沒有時間在這邊爭論了，了解嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在已经没有时间争论了，了解吗？

Key.Original: Good. Your group will operate as callsign Omega. Godspeed, brothers. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 很好。你們小隊的呼號將被命名為"歐米加"。兄弟們，祝好運。"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。你们小队的呼号为"欧米加"。兄弟们，祝好运。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Container.name: 07_Brits2
Container.situation: kerry frustrated again

Key.Original: Goddamn it.
Key.Chinese: 真是見鬼了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是见鬼了。

Container.name: 06_Plan_B_Briefing
Container.situation: miller gets in touch with kerry explaining the situation

Key.Original: Copy, Falcon, on my way to the RV, over.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"獵鷹"，我正在前往會合點的路上，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"猎鹰"，我正在前往会合点的路上，完毕。

Key.Original: What, are you serious? What makes you think the FIA will accept that?
Key.Chinese: 什麼，你是認真的嗎?你是憑哪一點認為自由獨立同盟會接受這件事?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么，你是认真的吗？你是凭哪一点认为 FIA 会接受这件事？

Key.Original: This is Falcon, come in. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"獵鷹"，接進。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"猎鹰"，请回答。完毕。

Key.Original: Good. Now listen, I need you to step up and take command of this operation. Over.
Key.Chinese: 很好。現在聽好了，我要你接手並指揮此次任務。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。现在听好了，我要你接手并指挥此次任务。完毕。

Key.Original: There's no time for debate. The convoy's en route and you know the plan.
Key.Chinese: 現在已經沒有時間可以爭辯了。車隊要到了而且你知道計劃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在已经没有时间可以争辩了。车队要到了而且你知道计划。

Key.Original: Look, I wouldn't task you with this unless I thought you could handle it. Commander Stavrou's on board with it, too.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，我是知道你可以勝任才敢把這任務交給你。指揮官斯塔夫魯也同意這件事了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，我是知道你可以胜任才敢把这任务交给你。斯塔夫鲁指挥员也同意这件事了。

Key.Original: We'll let them know you're inbound. Good luck. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 我們會負責告知他們你的來到。祝好運。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们会负责告知他们你的来到。祝好运。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 04_Brits
Container.situation: kerry frustrated

Key.Original: Goddamn Brits.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的英國人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的英国人。

Container.name: 03_Plan_B
Container.situation: james relays info to the group

Key.Original: Okay, slight change of plan. We're needed elsewhere.
Key.Chinese: 好的，計劃有一點改變。我們將要前往別的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，计划有一点改变。我们将要前往别的地方。

Key.Original: Kerry, Miller wants you to link up with pocket of guerrillas and await new orders.
Key.Chinese: 克里，米勒希望你去與反抗軍會合，然後等待更進一步的命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，米勒希望你去与游击队员会合，然后等待更进一步的命令。

Key.Original: You ask a lot of questions, Corporal. Don't worry. Miller will be in touch soon. You'll know what to do.
Key.Chinese: 你問了很多問題，下士。別擔心。米勒等等會再跟你聯繫。你將會知道該怎麼做。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你问的问题太多了，下士。别担心。米勒等会儿会再跟你联系。你将会知道该怎么做。

Key.Original: We've got to go. I suggest you make your way to the new RV now. See you later.
Key.Chinese: 我們得走了。我建議你現在就開始前往新的會合點。等會兒見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们得走了。我建议你现在就开始前往新的会合点。等会儿见。

Key.Original: But - with respect - what about the convoy? Are we still on for that?
Key.Chinese: 但-不好意思-那車隊該怎辦?我們仍要去攔截它嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 但—不好意思—那车队该怎办？我们仍要去拦截它吗？

Key.Original: Alright, lads, move it!
Key.Chinese: 好吧，大夥，我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，大伙，我们走！

Container.name: 02_Wait
Container.situation: on the way to the ambush, james receives an important radio message

Key.Original: Hold on, lads.
Key.Chinese: 等等，大夥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，大伙。

Key.Original: Go ahead, Falcon. Over.
Key.Chinese: 請講，"獵鷹"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请讲，"猎鹰"。完毕。

Key.Original: What, now?
Key.Chinese: 什麼，現在嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么，现在吗？

Key.Original: Roger that, we'll be there. And Kerry? Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解，我們將會前往那邊。那克里呢?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，我们将会前往那边。那克里呢？完毕。

Key.Original: You sure about that?
Key.Chinese: 你確定嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你确定吗？

Key.Original: Alright. We'll see. Falcon-2 out.
Key.Chinese: 好吧。那就讓我們看看他能表現到如何吧。"獵鷹"-2通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。那就让我们看看他能表现到如何吧。"猎鹰-2"通话完毕。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.situation: mission start

Key.Original: Alright, lads, listen up.
Key.Chinese: 好的，小伙子們，聽好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，小伙子们，听好了。

Key.Original: 15 minutes till the convoy gets here. Let's move it.
Key.Chinese: 還有15分鐘車隊就會抵達這邊。我們走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有15分钟车队就会抵达这边。我们走。

Key.Original: CTRG prepare to ambush an enemy supply convoy.
Key.Chinese: 戰研大隊準備伏擊敵方的補給車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战研大队准备伏击敌方的补给车队。

Key.Original: Target Identification
Key.Chinese: 識別目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 识别目标

Key.Original: Beyond Recognition
Key.Chinese: 面目全非
Key.Chinesesimp: 面目全非

Key.Original: On the eve of a NATO invasion, the guerrillas launch a diversionary assault against a small airfield.
Key.Chinese: 在北約入侵的前夕，反抗軍們對一個小機場發動了牽制攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在北约入侵的前夕，反抗军们对一个小机场发动了牵制攻击。

Key.Original: Surprise Attack
Key.Chinese: 偷襲
Key.Chinesesimp: 偷袭

Key.Original: Fast Transport
Key.Chinese: 快速運輸
Key.Chinesesimp: 快速运输

Key.Original: Ambush
Key.Chinese: 伏擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击

Key.Original: The Pilot was Killed!
Key.Chinese: 飛行員陣亡了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞行员阵亡了！

Key.Original: With Nikos back at our side, the return of a legitimate government is a little closer. While it is unfortunate that our British friends could not be here themselves to celebrate this victory, there are more pressing matters at hand.%1Nikos has brought new information. Although we're still trying to verify his intel, we now believe that NATO is ready to launch an invasion.%2Miller and his team have already moved north. Their objective is to watch enemy movement and, if possible, establish contact with NATO command.%3So, while we do not know any specifics, only one target makes sense: %4the main airport%5, which operates under joint CSAT-AAF control. We'll watch the situation carefully, and prepare to make our own strike when the moment comes.%6Our target will be %7the AAC airfield%8 to the south, operated entirely by the AAF. We will draw the bulk of the AAF from the defence of the main airport, leaving NATO with CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 隨著尼科斯回到我們的身邊，我們也離創立合法政府的日子更靠近點兒了。雖然很可惜我們的英國朋友沒法在這邊一同分享我們的喜悅，但我們的手頭上還有別的事情要做。%1尼科斯帶來了新的情報。儘管我們還在設法核對他的情報，但我們相信，北約已經準備好要發動入侵了。%2米勒和他的小隊已經事先往北方移動了。他們的任務是監視敵人的動向，還有如果可能的話，建立與北約指揮官的通訊。%3所以，儘管我們不大確定所有的事情，但有一件事是肯定的:%4主機場%5目前是被廣協同盟與阿爾蒂斯武裝力量一同掌控。我們將仔細觀察，當時機來臨時，我們將會發動攻擊。%6我們的目標將會是南邊的%7阿爾蒂斯空中俱樂部機場%8，它是由阿爾蒂斯武裝力量負責把守。我們將吸引住阿爾蒂斯武裝力量在主機場防禦的注意力，把廣協同盟留給北約來處理。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着尼科斯回到我们的身边，我们也离恢复合法政府的日子更靠近点儿了。很可惜我们的英国朋友没法在这边一同分享我们的喜悦，他们手头上还有别的事情要做。%1尼科斯带来了新的情报。尽管我们还在设法核实，但我们相信，北约已经准备好要发动入侵了。%2米勒和他的小组已经事先往北方移动了。他们的任务是监视敌人的动向，还有如果可能的话，建立与北约指挥部的通信。%3所以，尽管我们不大确定所有的事情，但有一件事是肯定的：%4主机场%5目前被广协和 AAF 共同掌控。我们将仔细观察，当时机来临时，我们将会发动攻击。%6我们的目标将会是南边的%7阿尔蒂斯空中俱乐部机场%8，它由 AAF 负责把守。我们将吸引住 AAF 在主机场防御的注意力，把广协留给北约来对付。

Key.Original: %1Omega%2 - your team%3%4Sigma%5 - friendly reinforcements%6%7Slingshot%8 - HQ and main assault element
Key.Chinese: %1"歐米加"%2-你的小隊%3%4"西格瑪"%5-友軍援軍%6%7"彈弓"%8-指揮官與主攻單位
Key.Chinesesimp: %1"欧米加"%2-你的小队%3%4"西格玛"%5-友军援军%6%7"弹弓"%8-指挥官与主攻分队

Key.Original: As part of our assault on %1the airfield%2, we must neutralize %3a CSAT artillery position %4and assault %5the temporary command complex%6 established in Poliakko's town center.
Key.Chinese: 我們一部分的人將去攻擊%1機場%2，而我們小隊的任務是去殲滅在波利亞科鎮裡的%3廣協同盟火炮陣地%4並突擊他們的%5臨時指揮中心%6。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们一部分的人将去攻击%1机场%2，而我们的任务是去歼灭在波利亚科镇里的%3广协炮兵阵地%4并突击他们的%5临时指挥所%6。

Key.Original:
1. Destroy %1the CSAT artillery position%2.
2. Neutralize all hostiles at %3the command complex%4 and seize any intel you find.
3. Await further orders from %5Slingshot%6.
Key.Chinese:
1. 摧毀%1廣協同盟的火炮陣地%2。
2. 殲滅敵人的%3臨時指揮中心%4並搜索有用的情報。
3. 等待%5"彈弓"%6更進一步的命令。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 摧毁%1广协的炮兵阵地%2。
2. 歼灭敌人的%3临时指挥所%4并搜索有用的情报。
3. 等待%5"弹弓"%6更进一步的命令。

Key.Original: Retreat to the Airfield
Key.Chinese: 返回機場
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回机场

Key.Original: RETREAT
Key.Chinese: 返回
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回

Key.Original: %1Poliakko%2 is secure, but the area is too hot. Retreat to %3the airfield%4 and link up with %5Slingshot%6.
Key.Chinese: %1P波利亞科%2已經被肅清，但該區還是很危險。請撤退回%3機場%4並與%5"彈弓"%6會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1波利亚科%2已经被肃清，但该区还是很危险。请撤退回%3机场%4并与%5"弹弓"%6会合。

Key.Original: Defend Poliakko
Key.Chinese: 防禦波利亞科
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御波利亚科

Key.Original: Hold %1Poliakko%2 against any possible counterattacks.
Key.Chinese: 防禦%1波利亞科%2，抵抗敵人的所有反擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御%1波利亚科%2，粉碎敌人的所有反击。

Key.Original: Secure the Crash Site
Key.Chinese: 肅清墜機點
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清坠机点

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: A NATO Blackfoot went down nearby. With luck, its pilot may have survived. Secure %1the crash site%2 and establish communications with NATO.
Key.Chinese: 一臺北約的"黑足"墜落在附近。不過幸好駕駛還活著。請去肅清%1墜機點%2並透過飛行員來聯繫北約。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一架北约军的"黑足"坠落在附近。不过幸好飞行员还活着。请去肃清%1坠机点%2并通过飞行员来联系北约。

Key.Original: Clear the Command Complex
Key.Chinese: 肅清臨時指揮中心
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清指挥所

Key.Original: CLEAR
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: AAF and CSAT forces have set up %1a temporary command post%2 in the center of the town. Eliminate all hostiles and seize any intel you find.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量與廣協同盟的部隊在城鎮中設立了一個%1臨時指揮中心%2。殲滅所有的敵人，並搜索任何有用的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 与广协部队在城镇中设立了一个%1临时指挥所%2。歼灭所有的敌人，并搜索任何有用的情报。

Key.Original: Destroy the Artillery
Key.Chinese: 摧毀火炮陣地
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁炮兵阵地

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB B Player;EPB I Stavrou;
Container.situation: kerry begins attack, stavrou warns him of reinforcements heading to airfield

Key.Original: Hey... look, look! Neochori!
Key.Chinese: 嘿...你看，你看!内奧霍里那邊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿...你看，你看！内奥霍里！

Key.Original: Well, God damn - at last. Looks like that's our cue, then.
Key.Chinese: 哈，天殺的-終於來了。看來該是時候行動了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈，天杀的—终于来了。看来该是时候行动了。

Key.Original: Omega to Slingshot, I think it's safe to say the invasion's started. Over.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"致"彈弓"，我敢肯定入侵行動已經開始了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"致"弹弓"，我敢肯定入侵行动已经开始了。完毕。

Key.Original: Will do, Slingshot. Good luck. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"彈弓"。祝好運。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"弹弓"。祝好运。完毕。

Key.Original: Indeed, Omega, good news.
Key.Chinese: 的確，"歐米加"，真是好消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 的确，"欧米加"，真是好消息。

Key.Original: So, let us set our own plan into motion.
Key.Chinese: 來吧，讓我們把計劃付諸行動吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧，让我们把计划付诸行动吧。

Key.Original: Moving on Therisa now. Be careful of any reinforcements coming our way.
Key.Chinese: 開始往塞里薩移動。請小心任何的敵人援軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始往塞里萨移动。小心敌方增援。

Key.Original: And to you, my friend. Godspeed. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 你也是，我的朋友。一路順風。"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你也是，我的朋友。一路顺风。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Key.Original: DESTROY
Key.Chinese: 摧毀
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁

Key.Original: CSAT forces have set up %1an artillery position%2 on the outskirts of Poliakko. Destroy it.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟部隊在波利亞科的郊外設立了一個%1火炮陣地%2。請去摧毀它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协部队在波利亚科郊外设立了一个%1炮兵阵地%2。摧毁它。

Container.name: 70_Cease_Fire
Container.participants: EPB B Player;EPB B HQ;EPB B Larkin;
Container.situation: pilot calls nato, tells them to cease fire, nato sends sar

Key.Original: Uh, say again, November? Over.
Key.Chinese: 呃，請重發，November?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，再说一遍，November？完毕。

Key.Original: All units, cease fire on Objective Lima. I repeat, cease fire on Lima. Fall back to Point Echo.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，請對目標利馬停止開火。我重複一遍，請對利馬停止開火。全員撤回回聲點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，请对目标 Lima 停止开火。我重复一遍，请对 Lima 停止开火。全员撤回 Echo 点。

Key.Original: Crossroads, this is November, priority! Crossroads, priority!
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，這裡是November，優先命令!"交叉路"，優先命令!
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，这里是 November，紧急信息！"交叉路口"，紧急信息！

Key.Original: Cease fire on the airfield! We're firing on friendlies! Over!
Key.Chinese: 請停止對機場的開火!我們正在射擊友軍!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请停止对机场开火！我们正在射击友军！完毕！

Key.Original: November, stay put. Keep an eye on him. We're on our way. Out.
Key.Chinese: November，請先留在原地。請盯緊他。我們在路上了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: November，请先留在原地。盯紧他。我们在路上了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Friendly forces operating at the airfield.
Key.Chinese: 友軍正在機場內執行任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军正在机场内执行任务。

Key.Original: I've got a US Soldier here at the crash site - Corporal Scott Miller - part of TF Aegis, sir.
Key.Chinese: 我這裡有個美軍士兵在墜機點-下士斯考特·米勒-隸屬於""神盾""特遣隊，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这里有个美军士兵在坠机点—斯考特·米勒下士—隶属于"宙斯盾"特遣队，长官。

Container.name: i15_Target_Distinction
Container.situation: kerry reminds himself to be careful not to fire on the nato pilots

Key.Original: Omega, beware of enemy contacts, but make sure you don't hit the NATO pilots!
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，請小心的與敵人交戰，請當心不要誤擊到北約的飛行員!
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，小心敌人，但也要当心不要误击到北约飞行员！

Key.Original: We need them alive - you've got to put a stop to this attack!
Key.Chinese: 我們需要他們活著-你必須阻止這場攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要他们活着—你必须阻止这场攻击！

Container.name: i10_Fast_Transport
Container.situation: kerry thinks he should search for some fast transport to the crash site

Key.Original: Omega, you should hurry. There may be enemy units closing in on that crash site, too
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，你們必須加快腳步。敵人可能也會接近墜機點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，你们必须加快脚步。敌人可能也会接近坠机点。

Key.Original: If there's any way to get there sooner - I don't know, a truck in the town or something - I suggest you use it!
Key.Chinese: 如果有什麼東西能使你們加快的話-我不知道，城鎮裡可能會有卡車-我建議你可以使用它!
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果有什么东西能使你们加快的话—我不知道，城镇里可能会有卡车—我建议你使用它！

Container.name: i05_Ambush
Container.situation: stavrou tells kerry to wait for sf to come to them, ambush them

Key.Original: It sounds like you are dealing with CSAT special forces, Omega.
Key.Chinese: 聽起來你們好像正在對付廣協同盟的特種部隊，"歐米加"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来你们好像正在对付广协的特种部队，"欧米加"。

Key.Original: Avoid facing them directly, otherwise you will be in for a tough fight.
Key.Chinese: 請避免直接跟他們正面交鋒，要不然你們會陷入苦戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请避免直接跟他们正面交锋，要不然你们会陷入苦战。

Key.Original: Hold back and let them come to you. Out.
Key.Chinese: 堅守住並讓他們來找你。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚守住并让他们来找你。通话完毕。

Container.name: i01_Surprise_Attack
Container.situation: stavrou tells kerry to use the element of surprise

Key.Original: I Recommend you hold your fire until you are ready to strike, Omega. You will catch them off guard.
Key.Chinese: 直到要開始突擊之前，我建議你們可以先停火，"歐米加"。你們將會打得他們出奇不意。
Key.Chinesesimp: 直到要开始突击之前，我建议你们可以先停火，"欧米加"。你们得出奇不意。

Key.Original: Be sure you take advantage of it while you can. Just know that they won't be surprised forever. Out.
Key.Chinese: 請盡可能利用你們的優勢。請記住，他們是不會驚訝太久的。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请尽可能利用你们的优势。请记住，他们是不会惊讶太久的。通话完毕。

Container.name: 75_Failed_Invasion
Container.situation: kerry brought up to speed by nato commander, no idea who miller is, thought they were dead, need kerry's help

Key.Original: This is Corporal Miller?
Key.Chinese: 你是下士米勒?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是米勒下士？

Key.Original: Ah, I see. Well, at ease, Corporal.
Key.Chinese: 啊，我知道了。恩，稍息，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，我知道了。嗯，稍息，下士。

Key.Original: We had no idea guerrillas were so active here. Seems we were too late.
Key.Chinese: 我們並不知道反抗軍在這裡活動。看來我們已經太遲了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们并不知道游击队在这里活动。看来我们已经太迟了。

Key.Original: Uh, no sir, there was some miscommunication. Corporal Ben Kerry, TF Aegis. Reporting for duty, sir!
Key.Chinese: 呃，不，長官，你搞錯了。我是下士本·克里，"神盾"特遣隊。向你報到，長官!
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，不，长官，你搞错了。我是本·克里下士，"宙斯盾"特遣队。向你报到，长官！

Key.Original: I'm sorry, who?
Key.Chinese: 抱歉，誰?
Key.Chinesesimp: 抱歉，谁？

Key.Original: The British? The Brits are no longer operating in this area.
Key.Chinese: 英國人?英國老早就沒有在這區域活動了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 英国人？英国老早就没有在这区域活动了。

Key.Original: What about Captain Miller, sir? He was supposed to establish comms with your main force.
Key.Chinese: 請問上校米勒在哪，長官?他本來是要負責與你們建立聯繫的部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那米勒上校在哪儿，长官？他本该要负责与你们的部队建立联系啊。

Key.Original: To my knowledge, they've been out since May. And, regardless, we had no record of a Scott Miller.
Key.Chinese: 據我了解，他們五月前就都離開了。而且，不管如何，我們這邊並沒有任何有關於斯考特·米勒的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据我了解，他们五月前就都离开了。而且，不管如何，我们这边并没有任何有关于斯考特·米勒的情报。

Key.Original: Captain Scott Miller. UKSF? Kinda ... talks like he's got a stick up his ass all the time?
Key.Chinese: 上校斯考特·米勒。英國特種部隊?有點像...講話時蠻臭屁的那位?
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯考特·米勒上校。英国特种部队？有点像...一天到晚讲话特拽的那位？

Key.Original: Look, we're out of time. Come with us, Corporal.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，我們時間不多了。跟我們來，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，我们时间不多了。跟我们来，下士。

Key.Original: You need to be debriefed, and we need everyone we can get our hands on.
Key.Chinese: 你來做匯報，而且我們需要每一個能出力的人來幫忙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你来做汇报，而且我们需要每一个能出力的人来帮忙。

Key.Original: Wait, what?
Key.Chinese: 等等，什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，什么？

Container.name: 65_Stop_Attack
Container.situation: kerry reveals himself to the pilot, tells him the situation

Key.Original: Corporal Ben Kerry, Task Force Aegis, but listen to me: your helos are firing on friendlies!
Key.Chinese: 下士本·克里，"神盾"特遣隊，請先聽我說:你們的直升機正在向友軍開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 本·克里下士，"宙斯盾"特遣队，请先听我说：你们的直升机正在向友军开火！

Key.Original: Look, the FIA - the local resistance - they're assaulting that airfield, you're firing on friendly forces right now.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，自由獨立同盟-也就是當地的反抗軍-他們正在突擊機場，你們正在向自己人開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，FIA-也就是当地的反抗组织—他们正在突击机场，你们正在向自己人开火。

Key.Original: Jesus Christ! Who the fuck are you guys?
Key.Chinese: 我的老天!你們他媽的是誰?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的老天！你们他妈的是谁？

Key.Original: We're working alongside British Special Forces, Captain Scott Miller - just, please, get your command to suspend the attack on the airfield.
Key.Chinese: 我們正與英國特種部隊一起作戰，上校斯考特·米勒-就，拜託你了，請你讓機場的攻擊停止下來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正与英国特种部队一起作战，斯考特·米勒上校—就，拜托你了，告诉指挥部让他们停止攻击机场。

Key.Original: Friendlies? Aegis? Holy fuck, no, we thought we'd lost you guys!
Key.Chinese: 友軍?"神盾"?天啊，不會吧，我們本以為已經失去你們了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军？"宙斯盾"？天啊，不会吧，我们还以为你们全完了！

Key.Original: Fuck. That's not our intel ... we just ... hold on - just wait a second.
Key.Chinese: 幹。我們並沒有收到這個情報...我們只是...等等-等我幾秒鐘。
Key.Chinesesimp: 操。我们并没有收到这个情报...我们只是...等等—等我几秒钟。

Container.name: 60_Engine_Failure
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla B;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: one of the american helicopters' engines fail, has to make emergency landing, kerry uses this as opportunity to stop nato, heads to crash site

Key.Original: Omega, this is Sigma! Do you read us?
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，這裡是"西格瑪"!你有聽見我們嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，这里是"西格玛"！你有听见我们吗？

Key.Original: No idea, helicopters followed by explosions - we've lost comms with Slingshot!
Key.Chinese: 不知道，在我們看到直升機之後，緊接著就聽見爆炸聲了-然後我們就與"彈弓"失去聯繫!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不知道，在我们看到直升机之后，紧接着就听见爆炸声了—然后我们就与"弹弓"失去了联系！

Key.Original: But listen - we see a NATO helicopter going down - it's lost its tail rotor.
Key.Chinese: 但是請聽著-我們看到了一臺北約的直升機正在墜落中-它的尾翼失去控制了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是请听着—我们看到了一架北约直升机正在坠落—它的尾翼失去控制了。

Key.Original: Sigma? Thank god. What's the situation?
Key.Chinese: "西格瑪"?感謝老天。現在是什麼狀況?
Key.Chinesesimp: "西格玛"？感谢老天。现在是什么状况？

Key.Original: It looks to be making an emergency landing somewhere near your grid.
Key.Chinese: 看起來它打算在你的附近進行緊急著陸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看起来它打算在你的附近进行紧急着陆。

Key.Original: Fuck. Okay .. okay, thanks for the head's up.
Key.Chinese: 該死。好..好吧，感謝你們的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。好..好吧，感谢你们的情报。

Key.Original: We'll approach the crash site - look for survivors - try to get a handle on this clusterfuck.
Key.Chinese: 我們將會靠近墜機點-找尋生還者-試著釐清這整起事件。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将会靠近坠机点—找寻生还者—试着收住这烂摊子。

Key.Original: Just sit tight for now, Sigma. We'll update you asap.
Key.Chinese: 現在請你們先躲好，"西格瑪"。我們會很快在與你們回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在请你们先躲好，"西格玛"。我们很快再你们报告。

Container.name: 55_Friendly_Fire
Container.situation: stavrou's forces being fired on, stavrou dies

Key.Original: Slingshot? Say again, over
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"?請重發，完畢
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"？再说一遍，完毕

Key.Original: Slingshot, respond!
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，請回答!
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，请回答！

Key.Original: Omega, we are being engaged by NATO at the airfield! I repeat, NATO are-
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"，我們在機場遭受到北約的攻擊!我重複一遍，北約正在-
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"，我们在机场遭受到北约军的攻击！我重复一遍，北约正在-

Key.Original: Shit ... shit!
Falcon, this is Omega! Miller! Do you read me?!
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是"歐米加"!米勒!你有沒有聽到?!
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这是"欧米加"！"米勒"！你有没有听到？！

Container.name: 50_Airfield_Attack
Container.situation: helicopters begin attack on guerrillas on airfield, kerry surprised

Key.Original: Slingshot, be advised, NATO air assets closing in on your position. Over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，請注意，北約的空中單位正在靠近你們的位置。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，请注意，北约军的空中单位正在靠近你们的位置。完毕。

Key.Original: Slingshot, how copy?
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，有收到吗？

Container.name: 45_Americans
Container.situation: kerry spots the american helicopters

Key.Original: What the hell? US helicopters?
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?美軍直升機?
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼？美军直升机？

Container.name: 40_Town_Held
Container.situation: kerry informs stavrou the attack was defeated, stavrou orders retreat to the airfield

Key.Original: Alright, looks like that was the last of them.
Key.Chinese: 好的，看來那位是他們的最後一個了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，看来那位是他们的最后一个了。

Key.Original: Slingshot, this is Omega. We've beaten back the enemy counterattack, but we've suffered some losses. Please advise, over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，這裡是"歐米加"。我們擊敗了敵軍的反攻，但我們也承擔了些傷亡。請指示，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，这里是"欧米加"。我们挫败了敌军的反攻，但我们也承担了些伤亡。请指示，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, en route. Any word from Miller yet? Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到，在路上了。有任何來自米勒的消息嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，在路上了。有任何来自米勒的消息吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, Omega. That area is too hot. Better pull back to the airfield and link up with us. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"歐米加"。該地區太危險了。你最好撤回機場並與我們會合。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"欧米加"。该地区太危险了。你最好撤回机场并与我们会合。完毕。

Key.Original: Negative, Omega. We have been unable to raise him. We will keep trying. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 沒有，"歐米加"。我們無法跟他取得聯繫。但我們會繼續嘗試。Slingshot通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有，"欧米加"。我们无法跟他取得联系。但我们会继续尝试。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Container.name: 35_Reinforcements
Container.participants: EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: guerrilla reinforcements arrive

Key.Original: Gamma to Omega, we are in position - ready to lend a hand. Over.
Key.Chinese: "伽馬"致"歐米加"，我們就定位了-準備好援助你們了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "伽马"致"欧米加"，我们就位了—准备好援助你们了。完毕。

Key.Original: Good to hear from you, Gamma. Alright, everyone, get ready. We're holding this town!
Key.Chinese: 真高興聽見你們，"伽馬"。好的，所有人，請準備。我們將要鎮守這個城鎮!
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴听见你们，"伽马"。好的，所有人准备好。我们要守卫这个城镇！

Container.name: 30_Helicopter
Container.situation: kerry spots the black csat helicopter

Key.Original: Where the hell did he come from?
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，它到底從哪冒出來的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，它到底从哪冒出来的？

Container.name: 25_Lights_Off
Container.situation: lights in the town shut off, kerry tells stavrou, preparing for sf attack

Key.Original: What the fuck?
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼？

Key.Original: Omega to Slingshot, be advised: we just had the whole town power down on us. Expecting company shortly. Any ETA on Gamma? Over.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"致"彈弓"，請注意:我們這邊城鎮的電力全部中斷。預計不久後將會接敵。你知道"伽馬"啥時會到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"致"弹弓"，请注意：我们这边城镇的电力全部中断。预计不久后将会接敌。你知道"伽马"何时会到吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, Omega. Gamma are entering your AO now.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"歐米加"。"伽馬"正在進入你們的行動區域當中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"欧米加"。"伽马"正在进入你们的行动区域。

Container.name: 20_Town_Clear
Container.situation: kerry informs stavrou that the town is clear, stavrou starts assault on airfield, orders kerry to defend town, reinforcements inbound

Key.Original: Wilco. Take care of yourselves out there, Slingshot. Out.
Key.Chinese: 照辦。請小心安全，"彈弓"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 照办。请小心安全，"弹弓"。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Received, Omega. Good news. We are proceeding with our assault on the airfield.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"歐米加"。好消息。我們的攻擊正開始向機場推進。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"欧米加"。好消息。我们的攻击正开始向机场推进。

Key.Original: For now, dig in and wait for further orders. Over.
Key.Chinese: 現在，請你們堅守位置並等待更進一步的命令。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，请你们坚守位置并等待更进一步的命令。完毕。

Container.name: 15_Special_Forces
Container.situation: kerry realizes they are fighting csat special forces

Key.Original: Shit ... Slingshot, these aren't CSAT regulars here. They're something else. Special forces, maybe. Over.
Key.Chinese: 幹..."彈弓"，這些敵人並不是廣協同盟的常規軍。他們是別的。可能是特種部隊。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 操..."弹弓"，这些敌人并不是广协的常规军。他们是别的。可能是特种部队。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Omega. Take great care. Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"歐米加"。請特別小心。"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"欧米加"。请特别小心。"弹弓"通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_Complex_Cleared
Container.situation: kerry clears the command complex

Key.Original: Omega to Slingshot, we've just taken the command complex.
Key.Chinese: "歐米加"致"彈弓"，我們剛拿下了指揮中心。
Key.Chinesesimp: "欧米加"致"弹弓"，我们刚拿下了指挥所。

Key.Original: There's a lot of intel just lying around here.
Key.Chinese: 這裡有很多的情報躺在四周。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里到处都是情报。

Container.name: 05_Arty_Destroyed
Container.situation: kerry informs stavrou that the artillery is destroyed

Key.Original: Slingshot, be advised: we've neutralized the enemy artillery position.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，請注意:我們已經殲滅了敵人的火炮陣地。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，请注意：我们已经歼灭了敌人的炮兵阵地。

Key.Original: Bomos
Key.Chinese: 沃莫斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 沃莫斯

Key.Original: The remaining survivors join the guerrillas at a small camp near Bomos.
Key.Chinese: 剩餘的倖存者們加入了反抗軍，並在沃莫斯附近的小營地中集結。
Key.Chinesesimp: 剩余的幸存者们加入了反抗军，并在沃莫斯附近的小营地中集结。

Key.Original: After a damaging enemy offensive, the remaining survivors join the guerrillas as they regroup at a small camp near Bomos.
Key.Chinese: 在阻止敵人的進攻之後，剩餘的倖存者們加入了反抗軍，並在沃莫斯附近的小營地中集結。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在阻止敌人的进攻之后，剩余的幸存者们加入了反抗军，并在沃莫斯附近的小营地中集结。

Key.Original: 10 DAYS LATER...
Key.Chinese: 十天過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 十天过后...

Key.Original: FEW HOURS LATER...
Key.Chinese: 數小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 数小时过后...

Key.Original: Common Enemy
Key.Chinese: 共同的敵人
Key.Chinesesimp: 共同的敌人

Key.Original: The remaining survivors link up with the local guerrillas.
Key.Chinese: 剩下的倖存者們與反抗軍會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 剩下的幸存者们与当地游击队会合。

Key.Original: Undercover
Key.Chinese: 臥底
Key.Chinesesimp: 卧底

Key.Original: Fog
Key.Chinese: 濃霧
Key.Chinesesimp: 浓雾

Key.Original: You were Compromised!
Key.Chinese: 你被洩露了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你暴露了！

Key.Original: The Truck was Destroyed!
Key.Chinese: 卡車被摧毀了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡车被摧毁了！

Key.Original: Having linked up with %1Lt. James%2, the group waits for darkness to fall to rendezvous with %3the rest of the embedded special forces contingent%4, callsign Ice.%5The local guerilla cell, which intended to rendezvous with those from Stratis, is still under heavy assault in %6the city of Kavala%7, the former capital of Altis.%8CSAT forces are providing the bulk of the ground work, while the AAF have sealed off the town and the surrounding area.
Key.Chinese: 在與%1上尉詹姆斯%2會合後，小隊在原地等待直到晚上。他們準備出發去與%3剩下的特種部隊%4們會合，其呼號為"冰"。%5當地的反抗軍目前在阿爾蒂斯的前首都%6卡瓦拉%7遭受到猛烈的攻擊。%8廣協同盟的部隊正在城鎮中進行掃蕩，而阿爾蒂斯武裝力量則是負責封鎖城鎮與周邊地區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在与%1詹姆斯上尉%2会合后，小队在原地等待直到晚上。他们准备出发去与%3剩下的特种部队%4们会合，其呼号为"冰"。%5当地的反抗军目前在阿尔蒂斯的前首都%6卡瓦拉%7遭受到猛烈攻击。%8广协部队正在城镇中进行扫荡，而 AAF 则负责封锁城镇与周边地区。

Key.Original: Board the Truck
Key.Chinese: 搭乘卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘卡车

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: Get in the truck as the driver.
Key.Chinese: 進入卡車擔當駕駛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入卡车担当驾驶。

Key.Original: Rendezvous with Miller
Key.Chinese: 與米勒會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与米勒会合

Key.Original: RENDEZVOUS
Key.Chinese: 會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点

Key.Original: Drive to %1the rendezvous with Miller%2, north of %3the factory complex%4.
Key.Chinese: 前往%1與米勒會合%2，他的位置在%3工廠%4的北邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前去%1会合点与米勒会合%2，他的位置在%3工厂%4的北边。

Key.Original: Assist Miller
Key.Chinese: 協助米勒
Key.Chinesesimp: 协助米勒

Key.Original: ASSIST
Key.Chinese: 協助
Key.Chinesesimp: 协助

Key.Original: Cpt. Miller is %1pinned down%2 by CSAT forces and requires assistance.
Key.Chinese: 上校米勒正被廣協同盟%1牽制中%2並請求其他人的援助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒上校正被广协%1压制%2，需要援助。

Key.Original: Regroup
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点

Key.Original: Regroup with Miller at %1his position%2.
Key.Chinese: 與米勒在%1會合點%2會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与米勒在%1会合点%2会合。

Key.Original: Divert to the Powerplant
Key.Chinese: 開往發電廠
Key.Chinesesimp: 开往发电厂

Key.Original: MEET
Key.Chinese: 碰面
Key.Chinesesimp: 碰面

Key.Original: %1The RV%2 was compromised. Divert and meet the FIA cell at %3the abandoned powerplant%4.
Key.Chinese: %1會合點%2被暴露了。開車前往與自由獨立同盟在%3廢棄的發電廠%4碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1会合点%2暴露了。开车去与 FIA 在%3废弃的发电厂%4碰面。

Key.Original: Drive to the New RV
Key.Chinese: 開往新的會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 开往新的会合点

Key.Original: DRIVE
Key.Chinese: 前往
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往

Key.Original: Miller was forced to relocate. Drive to %1the new rendezvous%2.
Key.Chinese: 米勒被迫移動到新地點。請開往%1新的會合點%2與他見面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒被迫移动到新地点。请开往%1新的会合点%2与他见面。

Key.Original: Move to the RV
Key.Chinese: 前往會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往会合点

Key.Original: RENDEZVOUS
Key.Chinese: 會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点

Key.Original: Link up with %1the rest of team Ice%2.
Key.Chinese: 與%1"冰"剩下的隊員%2會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与%1"冰"小组剩下的队员%2会合。

Key.Original: Drop-off Guerrillas
Key.Chinese: 運送反抗軍
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送游击队员

Key.Original: DROP-OFF
Key.Chinese: 運送
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送

Key.Original: Drop off the guerrillas in %1Negardes%2.
Key.Chinese: 把反抗軍送到%1内加澤斯%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把反抗军送到%1内加泽斯%2。

Key.Original: Pass the 2nd Checkpoint
Key.Chinese: 通過第二個檢查哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过第二个检查哨

Key.Original: DRIVE
Key.Chinese: 前往
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往

Key.Original: Pass %1the CSAT checkpoint%2. Do not give yourself away.
Key.Chinese: 通過%1廣協同盟的檢查哨%2。不要暴露你自己。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过%1广协的检查哨%2。不要暴露你自己。

Key.Original: Pass the Checkpoint
Key.Chinese: 通過檢查哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过检查哨

Key.Original: DRIVE
Key.Chinese: 前往
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往

Container.name: x05_Ready_Ambushed
Container.situation: sniper only gets into position after the team is ambushed

Key.Original: I'm in position, but I see you've already met your CSAT friends!
Key.Chinese: 我就定位了，不過我看到你已經遇見了你的廣協同盟朋友們!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我就位了，不过我看到你已经遇见了你的广协朋友们！

Container.name: x01_Warnings
Container.situation: slingshot warns kerry as he's going to give them away (driving offroad, etc.)

Key.Original: American, what are you doing? Stick to the road!
Key.Chinese: 美國佬，你在搞什麼飛機?請沿著道路走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 美国佬，你在搞什么鬼？请沿着道路走！

Key.Original: Get back on the road, American!
Key.Chinese: 回到道路上，美國佬!
Key.Chinesesimp: 回到道路上，美国佬！

Container.name: i05_Fog
Container.situation: miller tells kerry to use the fog to his advantage

Key.Original: Use the fog to your advantage, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 使用濃霧來當作你的優勢，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用浓雾来当作你的优势，克里。

Key.Original: Most of the targets are trapped in it.
Key.Chinese: 大多數的目標都被困在裡面了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大多数的目标都被困在里面了。

Key.Original: Get above it and you should be able to even the odds.
Key.Chinese: 請尋找高處，這將使你的勝率大增。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请寻找高处，这将使你的胜率大增。

Container.name: i01_Undercover
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry what to do to stay undercover while driving

Key.Original: Stay on the road, drive normally.
Key.Chinese: 保持在路上，開的正常點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持在路上开，开的正常点。

Key.Original: Slow down when we reach the checkpoint.
Key.Chinese: 在靠近檢查哨時請減速。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在靠近检查哨时请减速。

Key.Original: And please, try to avoid hitting anyone or anything. I like this truck.
Key.Chinese: 還有件事，請試著不要刮傷我的車。我很喜歡它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有件事，麻烦别刮伤我的车。我很喜欢它。

Container.name: 95_Drop
Container.situation: slingshot tells the guerrillas to disembark

Key.Original: Okay, this is your stop, brothers.
Key.Chinese: 好的，兄弟們，你們到站了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，兄弟们，你们到站了。

Key.Original: Good luck. I will see you back at the camp.
Key.Chinese: 祝好運。我將與你們在營地碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 祝好运。我将与你们在营地碰面。

Container.name: 90_Stop
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to stop for the drop-off

Key.Original: Stop the truck, American.
Key.Chinese: 停下卡車，美國佬。
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下卡车，美国佬。

Container.name: 85_Corruption
Container.situation: kerry observes the aaf corruption

Key.Original: So the AAF really are as corrupt as they say.
Key.Chinese: 所以阿爾蒂斯武裝力量真像他們所說的那麼腐敗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以 AAF 真像他们所说的那么腐败。

Key.Original: Different how?
Key.Chinese: 怎樣不同?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么不一样？

Key.Original: Corrupt? Sure. But, with Orestes, the situation is different.
Key.Chinese: 腐敗?當然。但奧雷斯泰斯，他的狀況並不一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 腐败？当然。但奥雷斯泰斯，他的状况并不一样。

Key.Original: Just drive. Such things do not concern you.
Key.Chinese: 你只管開車。有些事情你並不需要知道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你只管开车。有些事情你并不需要知道。

Container.name: 80_Check_1_Continue
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to continue

Key.Original: Well?
Key.Chinese: 所以?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以？

Key.Original: Oh, sure thing, your Highness.
Key.Chinese: 喔，當然，一切聽你的，殿下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，当然，一切听你的，殿下。

Key.Original: Well nothing, American. Drive on when the way is clear.
Key.Chinese: 沒有所以，美國佬。等他們讓開我們就走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有所以，美国佬。等他们让开我们就走吧。

Container.name: 75_Returning
Container.situation: slingshot returns to the truck

Key.Original: Here we go.
Key.Chinese: 我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走吧。

Container.name: 70_Check_1_Wait
Container.situation: kerry talks while waiting at the first checkpoint

Key.Original: Does this usually take so long?
Key.Chinese: 一般會談這麼久嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 一般会谈这么久吗？

Key.Original: Great. First I'm stuck with spooks who can't say anything, now I'm stuck with farmers who won't.
Key.Chinese: 太棒了。首先我是跟了一個不能講任何事情的間諜，現在又跟這群農夫在這蝦攪和。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太棒了。最开始我跟一个不能说话的木桩子搭伴，现在又跟这群不想说话的农夫搅和。

Container.name: 65_Check_1
Container.situation: slingshot fills kerry in on the details of the first checkpoint

Key.Original: What? What is it?
Key.Chinese: 怎麼了?現在是怎樣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么了？现在怎样？

Key.Original: Great. What could possibly go wrong?
Key.Chinese: 棒極了。事情怎麼可能會出錯?
Key.Chinesesimp: 棒极了。事情怎么可能会出错？

Key.Original: Ah, good.
Key.Chinese: 恩，一切安好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，挺好。

Key.Original: The officer. We know him as 'Orestes'. He is... Sympathetic.
Key.Chinese: 那個軍官。他的名字是'奧雷斯泰斯'。他是...我們的人馬。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个军官。我们管他叫'奥雷斯泰斯'。他是...我们的同情者。

Key.Original: You wait here. I will be back.
Key.Chinese: 你在這裡稍等。我等會兒回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在这里稍等。我等会儿回来。

Container.name: 60_Check_1_Slow
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to slow down for the first checkpoint

Key.Original: Checkpoint? You're going to get me killed here!
Key.Chinese: 檢查哨?你是想讓我去送死嗎!
Key.Chinesesimp: 检查哨？你是想让我去送死吗！

Key.Original: Slow down, we have our first checkpoint ahead.
Key.Chinese: 慢下來，我們前面有第一個檢查哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 慢下来，我们前面有第一个检查哨。

Key.Original: Relax, American. We have our way.
Key.Chinese: 放鬆點，美國佬。我們有我們的辦法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 放松点，美国佬。我们有我们的办法。

Container.name: 55_Straight_1
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to continue straight

Key.Original: Do not turn. We go straight on.
Key.Chinese: 不要轉彎。請繼續直走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要转弯。请继续直走。

Container.name: 50_Question
Container.situation: kerry asks why he is the one driving

Key.Original: Remind me again why I'm the one driving?
Key.Chinese: 請跟我解釋下，為啥是我來開車?
Key.Chinesesimp: 请跟我解释下为啥是我来开车？

Key.Original: Oh. Great. I'm honored.
Key.Chinese: 喔。棒極了。這真是我的榮幸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔。棒极了。不胜荣幸。

Key.Original: You are the one they will shoot first.
Key.Chinese: 因為你是我們當中會最先被他們開火的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 因为他们会先打死你。

Container.name: 45_Follow
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to follow his directions

Key.Original: Follow the road. Carefully. Do not act suspicious.
Key.Chinese: 沿著道路走。請小心。不要有任何奇怪的行為發生。
Key.Chinesesimp: 沿着道路走。请小心。不要做任何令人生疑的行为。

Container.name: 40_Road
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to get on the road

Key.Original: Get on to the road. Drive us north.
Key.Chinese: 開上道路。向北邊開。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开上道路。向北边开。

Container.name: 36_GetIn
Container.situation: negotiator calls out to the others

Key.Original: Brothers, get in the truck! We go!
Key.Chinese: 兄弟們，上卡車吧!我們要走了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 兄弟们，上卡车吧！我们要走了！

Container.name: 35_Plan
Container.participants: EPB B James;EPB B Player;EPB I Stavrou;
Container.situation: james tells kerry the plan

Key.Original: Alright, Slingshot, take him to Miller.
Key.Chinese: 好的，"彈弓"，帶著他去見米勒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，"弹弓"，带着他去见米勒。

Key.Original: No time to explain, Kerry. Go with them.
Key.Chinese: 沒時間解釋了，克里。跟著他們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没时间解释了，克里。跟着他们走吧。

Key.Original: I've got to go back for the others.
Key.Chinese: 我必須回去找其他的隊員了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我必须回去找其他的队员了。

Key.Original: Miller? Miller's alive?
Key.Chinese: 米勒?米勒還活著?
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒？米勒还活着？

Key.Original: Whoa now, just wait a sec!
Key.Chinese: 喔，請稍等一下!
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，请稍等一下！

Key.Original: Hey, American, you are driving.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，美國佬，你來開車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，美国佬，你来开车。

Container.name: 30_Hurry
Container.participants: EPB I Stavrou;EPB B James;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: james forces guerrillas to wait

Key.Original: Don't fucking move, Slingshot! You owe us!
Key.Chinese: 你他媽的別給我走，"彈弓"!這是你欠我們的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你他妈的别给我走，"弹弓"！你欠我们人情的！

Key.Original: I am sorry, Falcon, we have to go - we have to go now!
Key.Chinese: 我很抱歉，"獵鷹"，我們必須走了-我們現在就必須走了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我很抱歉，"猎鹰"，我们必须走了—我们现在就必须走了！

Container.name: 25_Wait
Container.participants: EPB I Stavrou;EPB B James;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: james tells guerrillas to wait for them

Key.Original: We're close. Wait for us. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們很靠近了。請等等我們。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们很靠近了。请等等我们。完毕。

Key.Original: That helicopter is not good news, Falcon. We must get away from here fast!
Key.Chinese: 那臺直升機的出現並不是好現象，"獵鷹"。我們必須盡快離開這裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那台直升机的出现并不是好现象，"猎鹰"。我们必须尽快离开这里！

Key.Original: We cannot wait forever, Falcon! Out.
Key.Chinese: 我不能等太久，"獵鷹"!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不能等太久，"猎鹰"！通话完毕。

Container.name: 23_Compromised_2
Container.situation: group questions whether they've been compromised

Key.Original: We may have been compromised, Slingshot. I'm inbound from the southeast.
Key.Chinese: 我們的行蹤可能已經暴露了，"彈弓"。我們正從東南方靠近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的行踪可能已经暴露了，"弹弓"。我们正从东南方靠近。

Key.Original: I've got an American with me. Watch your fire.
Key.Chinese: 我這裡有一個美國佬跟著我。請小心誤擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这里有一个美国佬跟着我。请小心误击。

Key.Original: Slingshot to Falcon, we hear helicopters. What is going on? Over.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"致"獵鷹"，我們聽到直升機了。狀況怎樣?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"呼叫"猎鹰"，我们听到直升机声了。什么情况？完毕。

Container.name: 20_Compromised
Container.situation: group questions whether they've been compromised

Key.Original: No idea.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道。

Key.Original: Just keep moving, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 不管怎樣，請繼續移動，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管怎样，请继续移动，克里。

Key.Original: How did they find us, Lieutenant?
Key.Chinese: 他們是怎樣找到我們的，上尉?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们是怎样找到我们的，上尉？

Key.Original: We were compromised?
Key.Chinese: 我們被暴露了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们暴露了？

Container.name: 200_Explain
Container.situation: kerry tries to get an explanation from miller

Key.Original: Lieutenant James. He left me with the guerrillas some place south of here.
Key.Chinese: 是上尉詹姆斯。他在現在的南邊某處，把我留給了反抗軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 詹姆斯上尉。他在南边的什么地方把我留给了游击队。

Key.Original: I think he had some sort of operation in that area?
Key.Chinese: 我認為他在這區域中還有別的任務?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我认为他在这区域中还有别的任务？

Key.Original: Kerry, just how did you end up here?
Key.Chinese: 克里，你剛剛是怎樣來這邊的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你是怎样来这边的？

Key.Original: Uh, some new guys. Brits, I guess.
Key.Chinese: 呃，一些新傢伙。我猜是英國人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，一些新家伙。我猜是英国人。

Key.Original: ****TO TRANSLATE****
Yes, of course. So you met with the rest of his team?
Key.Chinese: 是的，當然。所以你見到了他的其他隊員?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，当然。所以你见到了他的其他队员？

Key.Original: Who?
Key.Chinese: 誰?
Key.Chinesesimp: 谁？

Key.Original: For now, Corporal, let's focus on getting to their camp - Commander Stavrou will explain the situation.
Key.Chinese: 現在，下士，讓我們先專心前往他們的營地吧-指揮官斯塔夫魯將會解釋狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，下士，让我们先专心前往他们的营地吧—斯塔夫鲁指挥员将会解释状况。

Container.name: 195_Regrouped
Container.situation: kerry regroups with miller

Key.Original: Come on. Let's get out of here, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 跟上。讓我們離開這裡吧，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟上。让我们离开这里吧，克里。

Container.name: 190_Regroup
Container.situation: miller tells kerry to regroup with him

Key.Original: Okay, form on me, Kerry. We've got to move.
Key.Chinese: 好的，跟著我，克里。我們得開始移動了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，跟着我，克里。我们得开始移动了。

Container.name: 185_Slingshot_Dead
Container.situation: miller finds out slingshot's vehicle is down

Key.Original: Slingshot, get over here with the truck.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，請帶著卡車到我們這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，请带着卡车到我们这里。

Key.Original: Shit. Slingshot, do you copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: 該死。"彈弓"，你是否有收到?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。"弹弓"，你是否有收到？完毕。

Key.Original: Goddammit, Falcon, our truck is wrecked - CSAT will be all over this area in no time.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，"獵鷹"，我們的卡車已經成了一團廢鐵-廣協同盟將會開始掃蕩這片區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，"猎鹰"，我们的卡车完了—广协将会开始扫荡这片区域。

Key.Original: We must split up. Head north. Stick to the forests. Meet at our camp.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須分開行動。請往北走。保持在森林裡。跟我在我們的營地中見面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须分开行动。请往北走。保持在森林里。跟我在我们的营地中见面。

Key.Original: And, Falcon, you people owe us for saving your life again today! Slingshot out.
Key.Chinese: 還有一件事，"獵鷹"，你的人今天又欠了我們一次人情!"彈弓"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有一件事，"猎鹰"，你的人今天又欠了我们一次人情！"弹弓"通话完毕。

Container.name: 180_Clear
Container.situation: miller tells kerry he's clear

Key.Original: Okay, I'm clear.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我這裡安全了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我这里安全了。

Container.name: 175_Engage
Container.situation: guerrilla sniper and miller open fire

Key.Original: Engaging.
Key.Chinese: 開始交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始交战。

Container.name: 170_Sniper
Container.participants: EPB I Stavrou;EPB I Guerrilla A;EPB B Miller;
Container.situation: the guerrilla sniper arrives on station

Key.Original: Slingshot, I am in position above you.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，我就定位了，目前在你們位置的上方。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，我就位了，目前在你们位置的上方。

Key.Original: Falcon - just south of you - I see four CSAT soldiers. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"-我在你的南邊-我有看見四名廣協同盟士兵。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"-我在你的南边—我有看见四名广协士兵。完毕。

Key.Original: Yes, of course.
Key.Chinese: 是的，當然。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，当然。

Key.Original: Roger that.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Key.Original: Ok, Kerry, there's at least four right on top of me as well. I'll open up once you move in.
Key.Chinese: 好的，克里，在我前面至少有四個人。等你到了後我就會開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，克里，在我前面至少有四个人。等你到了后我就会开火。

Key.Original: You up top? Fire on my lead. Understood?
Key.Chinese: 你往上走?聽我指揮再開火。了解嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你往上走？听我指挥再开火。了解吗？

Key.Original: ****TO TRANSLATE****

Container.name: 167_TruckStay
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to stop while approaching miller's location

Key.Original: I will stay with the truck, American. We must get away from here quickly.
Key.Chinese: 我會與卡車待在這裡，美國佬。我們必須盡快離開這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会与卡车待在这里，美国佬。我们必须尽快离开这里。

Container.name: 165_Near_New_RV
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to stop while approaching miller's location

Key.Original: Stop the truck.
Key.Chinese: 停下卡車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下卡车。

Container.name: 160_Left
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to turn left

Key.Original: Okay, left.
Key.Chinese: 好，左轉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，左转。

Container.name: 15_Heli
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Member A;EPB B James;EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: group spots the helicopter

Key.Original: Falcon, I don't think that helo's holding in a patrol pattern anymore!
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我不認為那臺直升機?在做巡邏!
Key.Chinesesimp: 猎鹰，我不认为那架直升机还在巡逻路线上！

Key.Original: Okay, take the Yank and get to the powerplant. We'll take this from here.
Key.Chinese: 好的，你帶著美國佬前往發電廠。我們會自己從這邊過去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，你带着美国佬前往发电厂。我们会自己从这边过去。

Key.Original: Fuck. Agreed.
Key.Chinese: 該死。我同意。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。我同意。

Key.Original: Roger that. See you at the objective.
Key.Chinese: 了解。等會兒在目標見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。等会儿在目标见。

Key.Original: Alright, let's move, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我們走吧，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们走吧，克里。

Key.Original: Diesel. Abandoned. Move it.
Key.Chinese: 是柴油發電廠。被廢棄的。我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 柴油发电厂。废弃的。走吧。

Key.Original: A powerplant?
Key.Chinese: 發電廠?
Key.Chinesesimp: 发电厂？

Container.name: 155_Right
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to turn right

Key.Original: Turn right.
Key.Chinese: 右轉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 右转。

Container.name: 150_Surrounded
Container.participants: EPB B Miller;EPB I Stavrou;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: miller is surrounded

Key.Original: Um, you know, there's only two of us - and you don't have a gun.
Key.Chinese: 痾，你知道嗎，這裡只有我們兩個人-而且你並沒有槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 痾，你知道吗，这里只有我们两个人—而且你并没有枪。

Key.Original: Slingshot, come in.
Key.Chinese: "彈弓"，接進。
Key.Chinesesimp: "弹弓"，请回答。

Key.Original: CSAT have compromised my position. Recommend you avoid a direct approach, over.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟已經發現到我的位置了。建議你們不要直接靠近，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协已经发现我的位置了。建议你们不要直接靠近，完毕。

Key.Original: This is Slingshot.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"彈弓"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"弹弓"。

Key.Original: Understood, Falcon. We will be there shortly. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解了，"獵鷹"。我們會很快抵達。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解了，"猎鹰"。我们会很快抵达。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Three. I have another man on his way.
Key.Chinese: 是三個。我有一個夥伴正在過來的路上了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是三个。我有一个伙伴正在过来的路上了。

Container.name: 145_Aware
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to stay alert

Key.Original: I do not like the look of this. Not at all.
Key.Chinese: 我不喜歡這個樣子。真的很不喜歡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不喜欢这个样子。真的很不喜欢。

Key.Original: Stay alert.
Key.Chinese: 保持警戒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持警戒。

Container.name: 140_Inform
Container.situation: kerry tells slingshot about the change in plans

Key.Original: Yeah, I just spoke to Captain Miller.
Key.Chinese: 恩，我剛剛才與上校米勒通話過。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，我刚刚才与米勒上校通话过。

Key.Original: I - yeah, long story - anyway, he wants you to know he's had to move the rendezvous.
Key.Chinese: 我-恩，故事有點長-不管如何，他想要你知道他已經移動到新的會合點了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我—嗯，故事有点长—不管如何，他想要你知道他已经移动到新的会合点了。

Key.Original: Change of plan, American. We must divert left.
Key.Chinese: 計劃改變，美國佬。我們必須左轉了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 计划改变，美国佬。我们必须左转了。

Key.Original: So, looks like we're going left anyway.
Key.Chinese: 所以，看來我們也只能左轉了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，看来我们也只能左转了。

Key.Original: You know Miller?
Key.Chinese: 你認識米勒?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你认识米勒？

Key.Original: Fine. Drive on.
Key.Chinese: 好吧。上路了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。上路了。

Container.name: 135_Recon
Container.situation: miller tells kerry about the change in plans

Key.Original: Miller? It's Kerry. Slingshot is, uh, occupied right now - I read you loud and clear, over.
Key.Chinese: 米勒?這裡是克里。"彈弓"正在，恩，處理麻煩的事情-我可以代為跟你溝通，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒？这里是克里。"弹弓"现在，嗯，正忙—我听得很清楚，完毕。

Key.Original: Yeah, I can kinda see that. We're at the factory now - this place is crawling with them.
Key.Chinese: 是阿，我從這裡能觀察到。我們目前在工廠這裡-這地方到處都爬滿了他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，我从这里能观察到。我们目前在工厂这里—这地方到处有他们。

Key.Original: Falcon to Slingshot, come in, over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"致"彈弓"，接進，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"呼叫"弹弓"，请回答，完毕。

Key.Original: Will do. Looks like we'll have to head that direction anyway.
Key.Chinese: 照辦。反正看來不管如何我們都會往那個方向移動了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 照办。反正看来不管如何我们都会往那个方向走了。

Key.Original: Ah, I didn't think you made it, Corporal.
Key.Chinese: 喔，我並不知道你能撐過來，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，我没想到你能活下来，下士。

Key.Original: Anyway, I've had to change the rendezvous. CSAT moved in.
Key.Chinese: 不管如何，我已經改變了會合點。廣協同盟剛剛闖入了我的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管如何，我已经改变了会合点。广协刚刚闯入了我的位置。

Key.Original: Indeed. The new RV is at 048-170.
Key.Chinese: 的確。新的會合點在048-170。
Key.Chinesesimp: 的确。新的会合点在048-170。

Key.Original: That should be just northwest of where you are now. Make sure Slingshot knows. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這地方位在你們目前位置的西北方。請代為通知"彈弓"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这地方在你们目前位置的西北方。请代为通知"弹弓"。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy. See you soon. It's good to hear from you, Kerry. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。等會兒見。真高興聽見你的聲音，克里。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。等会儿见。真高兴听见你的声音，克里。通话完毕。

Container.name: 130_Stress
Container.situation: kerry is getting stressed at the second checkpoint

Key.Original: This doesn't feel right.
Key.Chinese: 這感覺不太對。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这感觉不太对。

Container.name: 125_Check_2
Container.situation: slingshot fills kerry in on the details of the second checkpoint

Key.Original: You know, I'm really starting to love this little arrangement we have here!
Key.Chinese: 你知道嗎，我真的開始喜歡上這裡的各種小安排了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道吗，我真的开始喜欢上这里的各种小安排了！

Key.Original: No familiar faces here, I am afraid.
Key.Chinese: 這裡沒有我熟悉的面孔，我擔心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里没有我熟悉的面孔，我担心。

Key.Original: Keep the engine running.
Key.Chinese: 保持引擎持續運轉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 发动机别熄火。

Container.name: 120_Check_2_Slow
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to slow down for the second checkpoint

Key.Original: Another checkpoint, American. Slow down.
Key.Chinese: 另一個檢查哨，美國佬。慢慢減速。
Key.Chinesesimp: 另一个检查哨，美国佬。慢慢减速。

Container.name: 115_Factory
Container.situation: slingshot spots csat at the factory

Key.Original: Huh... We were not expecting CSAT out here.
Key.Chinese: 咦...我們並沒有預期到廣協同盟會出現在這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯...我没想到到广协会出现在这里。

Container.name: 110_Straight_3
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to go straight again

Key.Original: Straight again.
Key.Chinese: 再直走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再直走。

Container.name: 10_Near_RV
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B Echo Member A;EPB B Player;
Container.situation: echo lead signals that they are approaching

Key.Original: Understood Ice-1. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"冰-1"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"冰-1"。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Ice-2, Ice-1. We're inbound from the west.
Key.Chinese: "冰-2"，"冰-1"。我們正從西面靠近。
Key.Chinesesimp: "冰-2"，"冰-1"。我们正从西面靠近。

Key.Original: I've got Falcon-2 and a Yank with me. Watch your fire, over.
Key.Chinese: 我這裡有"獵鷹"-2跟美國佬在我們隊裡。小心不要誤擊，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这里有"猎鹰-2"跟美国佬在我们队里。小心不要误击，完毕。

Container.name: 105_Straight_2
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to go straight

Key.Original: Go straight on.
Key.Chinese: 往前直走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 往前直走。

Container.name: 100_All_Out
Container.situation: slingshot tells kerry to continue

Key.Original: Alright. You can continue, American.
Key.Chinese: 好的。你可以繼續開了，美國佬。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。你可以继续开了，美国佬。

Container.name: 05_Moving
Container.situation: james signals to move

Key.Original: Time to move.
Key.Chinese: 時間到，我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该走了。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EPB B Echo Member A;EPB B Player;EPB B Echo Lead;EPB B James;
Container.situation: kerry receives his new equipment

Key.Original: Ice-1, Ice-2. We're in position at the RV, over.
Key.Chinese: "冰-1"，"冰-2"。我們正在監視點，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "冰-1"，"冰-2"叫。我们正在会合点，完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that, en route. ETA 2 mikes. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，在路上了。預計2分鐘後抵達。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，在路上了。预计2分钟后抵达。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Hey kid, there's an extra rifle in my pack if you need it.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，小子，在我的背包裡有一些額外的步槍，看你需不需要。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，小子，在我的背包里有一支额外的步枪，看你需不需要。

Key.Original: Oh, thank God, finally. I'm dying out here.
Key.Chinese: 喔，感謝老天，終於要走了。我快要在這裡悶死了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，感谢老天，终于要走了。我快要在这里闷死了。

Key.Original: Alright, we're moving out. 30 seconds.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我們要移動了。30秒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们要移动了。30秒。

Key.Original: Pass %1the AAF checkpoint%2 on the way to %3Negardes%4. Do not give yourself away.
Key.Chinese: 在前往%3内加澤斯%4的路上會通過%1阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的檢查哨%2。不要暴露你自己。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在前往%3内加泽斯%4的路上会通过%1AAF 的检查哨%2。不要暴露你自己。

Key.Original: 12 HOURS LATER...
Key.Chinese: 12小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 12小时过后...

Key.Original: SOMETIME LATER...
Key.Chinese: 過些時候...
Key.Chinesesimp: 过些时候...

Key.Original: Gori
Key.Chinese: 戈里
Key.Chinesesimp: 戈里

Key.Original: The guerrillas regroup at an abandoned industrial complex near Gori.
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍在靠近戈里附近的廢棄工業區中集結。
Key.Chinesesimp: 游击队在靠近戈里附近的废弃工业区中集结。

Key.Original: Under pressure from the coninued offensive, the guerrillas are forced to regroup at an abandoned industrial complex near Gori.
Key.Chinese: 由於在不斷的攻擊壓力之下，反抗軍被迫在靠近戈里附近的廢棄工業區中集結。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在不断的攻击压力之下，反抗军被迫在靠近戈里附近的废弃工业区中集结。

Key.Original: Topolia
Key.Chinese: 托珀利亞
Key.Chinesesimp: 托珀利亚

Key.Original: The guerrillas reorganise their forces at a larger camp near Topolia.
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍在靠近托珀利亞附近更大的營地中集結。
Key.Chinesesimp: 反抗军在托珀利亚附近更大的营地中集结。

Key.Original: With the return of Nikos, the guerrillas reorganise their growing forces at a larger camp near Topolia.
Key.Chinese: 隨著Nikos的回歸，反抗軍在靠近托珀利亞附近更大的營地中集結，越變越強。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着尼科斯的回归，反抗军在托珀利亚附近更大的营地中集结，越变越强。

Key.Original: Scouting
Key.Chinese: 偵察
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察

Key.Original: Cpl. Kerry scouts the surrounding area.
Key.Chinese: 下士克里出外偵察周邊區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里下士出外侦察周边区域。

Key.Original: Various pieces of intel indicate recent activity in the surrounding area, which may be worth investigating for additional supplies and information.
Key.Chinese: 各項情報指出周邊區域內有著各種活動，這可使我們獲得更多情報或補給品。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各项情报指出周边区域内有着各种活动，这可使我们获得更多情报或补给品。

Key.Original: 'Adapt or perish, now as ever, is nature's inexorable imperative.' - H.G. Wells
Key.Chinese: '適應或滅亡，一如往昔，這是大自然一貫的規則。'-赫伯特喬治威爾斯
Key.Chinesesimp: '适应或灭亡，一如往昔，这是大自然一贯的规则。'-赫伯特·乔治·威尔斯

Key.Original: 'Adaptability is the law which governs survival in war as in life.' - B.H. Liddell Hart
Key.Chinese: '適應性不管對於戰爭還是生活同樣都是必要的技能。'-巴塞爾亨利李德哈特
Key.Chinesesimp: '适应性不管对于战争还是生活同样都是必要的技能。'-巴塞尔·亨利·李德—哈特

Key.Original: 'A leader is a man who can adapt principles to circumstances.' - General George S. Patton, Jr.
Key.Chinese: '一個領導應當能適應任何情況。'-喬治史密斯巴頓二世將軍
Key.Chinesesimp: '一个领导应当能适应任何情况。'-小乔治·史密斯·巴顿将军

Key.Original: 'You can strike with the few and be many if you strike your adversary in his gaps.' - Sun Tzu
Key.Chinese: '我專為一，敵分為十，是以十攻其一也，則我眾而敵寡。能以眾擊寡者，則吾之所與戰者，約矣。'-孫武
Key.Chinesesimp: '我专为一，敌分为十，是以十攻其一也，则我众而敌寡。能以众击寡者，则吾之所与战者，约矣。'-孙武

Key.Original: 'A fast moving environment can evolve more quickly than a complex plan can be adapted to it. By the time you have adapted, the target has changed.' - Carl von Clausewitz
Key.Chinese: '在快速改變的環境中適合簡單快速的計畫。如果你使用複雜的計劃，等到計畫適應了環境，目標也早已改變。'-卡爾馮克勞塞維茲
Key.Chinesesimp: '在快速改变的环境中适合简单快速的计划。如果你使用复杂的计划，等到计划适应了环境，目标也早已改变。'-卡尔·冯·克劳塞维兹

Key.Original: 'It is not the strongest that survives; but the species [...] that is able best to adapt.' - Leon C. Megginson
Key.Chinese: '這並不是說生存就是最強;但品種[...]是最能適應的。'-萊昂西麥金森
Key.Chinesesimp: '这并不是说生存就是最强;但品种[...]是最能适应的。'-莱昂·西·麦金森

Key.Original: 'Water shapes its course according to the nature of the ground over which it flows; the soldier works out his victory in relation to the foe whom he is facing.' - Sun Tzu
Key.Chinese: '水因地而制行，兵因敵而制勝。'-孫武
Key.Chinesesimp: '水因地而制行，兵因敌而制胜。'-孙武

Key.Original: 'People used to think the large would eat the small; instead, it is the swift who are eating the slow.' - Curtis E. Sahaian
Key.Chinese: '人們總是認為大的會吃掉小的;相反的，小的才能迅速的吃掉大的慢速。'-柯蒂斯伊薩哈伊恩
Key.Chinesesimp: '人们总是认为大的会吃掉小的;相反的，小的才能迅速的吃掉大的慢速。'-柯蒂斯·伊·萨哈伊恩

Key.Original: Abandoned Battlefield
Key.Chinese: 廢棄的戰場
Key.Chinesesimp: 废弃的战场

Key.Original: Our forces managed to eliminate an AAF patrol in a large forest, but were unable to collect any weapons or ammo from the fallen due to the dense fog. Try to find the battlefield and recover any valuable equipment you're able to find.
Key.Chinese: 我們的部隊成功的在一處森林裡殲滅了阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的巡邏隊，但由於濃霧作祟，我們無法收集任何的武器或彈藥。請試著前往戰場並收集任何有用的裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的部队成功的在一处森林里歼灭了 AAF 的巡逻队，但由于浓雾作祟，我们无法收集任何的武器或弹药。请试着前往战场并收集任何有用的装备。

Key.Original: Abandoned Battlefield
Key.Chinese: 廢棄的戰場
Key.Chinesesimp: 废弃的战场

Key.Original: A small guerrilla group destroyed an AAF motorized patrol near the great dump, but - concerned about enemy reinforcements - Stavrou ordered them to pull back. Get to the area and try to retrieve any valuable equipment left behind.
Key.Chinese: 一支反抗軍小隊成功在垃圾堆存場附近摧毀了阿爾蒂斯武裝力量摩托化巡邏隊，但由於斯塔夫魯擔心敵人會有援軍過來，所以下令撤退。請試著前往戰場並收集任何有用的裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一支反抗军小队成功在垃圾堆存场附近摧毁了 AAF 的摩托化巡逻队，但斯塔夫鲁由于担心敌人会有援军下令撤退。请试着前往战场并收集任何有用的装备。

Key.Original: Abandoned Battlefield
Key.Chinese: 廢棄的戰場
Key.Chinesesimp: 废弃的战场

Key.Original: One of ours long-range scouting teams destroyed a CSAT mechanized patrol; however, due to their own casualties, they were only able to return with a limited amount of useful equipment. Get there, search for anything you find valuable and return it to our camp.
Key.Chinese: 我們的一支長距離偵察部隊成功的殲滅了廣協同盟機械化巡邏隊;然而他們自己也損失慘重，所以他們只能攜帶一點點戰利品回來。前往戰場，搜尋任何有用的裝備並返回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的一支远程侦察部队成功的歼灭了广协的机械化巡逻队;然而他们自己也损失惨重，所以他们只能携带一点点战利品回来。前往战场，搜寻任何有用的装备并返回基地。

Key.Original: Enemy Checkpoint
Key.Chinese: 敵軍檢查哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军检查哨

Key.Original: The AAF are in the process of constructing another checkpoint but, so far, have only sent small group ahead to prepare the ground. This gives us a great opportunity to strike before it reaches its full strength.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量正在建立一處新檢查哨，到目前為止，他們只先派遣了一支小隊前往進行準備工作。這給予了我們一個機會，讓我們在檢查哨完全建立前就先摧毀它
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 正在建立一处新检查哨，到目前为止，他们只先派遣了一支小队前往进行准备工作。这给予了我们一个机会，让我们在检查哨完全建立前就先摧毁它

Key.Original: Enemy Checkpoint
Key.Chinese: 敵軍檢查哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军检查哨

Key.Original: Our scouts have discovered a new AAF checkpoint near the coast. Destroy it to enable our forces to travel along the coast with more freedom.
Key.Chinese: 我們的偵察回報，一個新的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量檢查哨在海岸邊被發現了。摧毀掉它，這將使我們在海岸邊的通行更為自由。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的侦察回报在海岸边发现了一个新的 AAF 检查哨。摧毁掉它，这将使我们在海岸边的通行更为自由。

Key.Original: Enemy Checkpoint
Key.Chinese: 敵軍檢查哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军检查哨

Key.Original: CSAT has established a new checkpoint along one of the main roads. Although well guarded, it's located between two forests, which gives us the a chance to approach quietly and destroy its' garrison.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟正沿著主要幹道設立一處新的檢查哨。儘管防守森嚴，但他們的位置卻處在兩處森林之間，這給予我們能悄悄地靠近並幹掉他們的機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协正沿着主要干道设立一处新的检查哨。尽管防守森严，但他们的位置却处在两处森林之间，这给予我们能悄悄地靠近并干掉他们的机会。

Key.Original: Hellcat Down
Key.Chinese: "潑婦"墜落
Key.Chinesesimp: "泼妇"坠落
